    16                                  ;Note: This code is a part of Retro DOS 4.0 kernel source code
    17                                  ;     (as included binary, 'IOSYS5.BIN') 
    18                                  ;     Equivalent of MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, BIOSCODE and BIOSDATA and SYSINIT
    19                                  ;						        (except MSLOAD code)  
    20                                        
    21                                  ;------ Retro DOS v2 (v3) boot sector loads RETRODOS.SYS (MSDOS.SYS)
    22                                  ;	at 1000h:0000h and loader (initialization) part of RETRODOS kernel
    23                                  ;	moves IO.SYS (DOSBIOSCODE & DOSBIOSDATA, 'IOSYS5.BIN') to 70h:0000h.
    24                                  ;	Then SYSINIT code to the next segment (46Dh for original MSDOS 5.0)..
    25                                  ;	SYSINIT code relocates itself and DOSBIOSCODE and MSDOS.SYS
    26                                  ;	(MSDOS5.BIN) according to request/setting in 'config.sys' file.
    27                                  
    28                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
    29                                  
    30                                  ;bpbx		struc ;	(sizeof=0x19)	
    31                                  ;
    32                                  ;bytespersec	dw ?			; base 10
    33                                  ;secperclust	db ?			; base 10
    34                                  ;rsvdsecs	dw ?			; base 10
    35                                  ;numfats	db ?			; base 10
    36                                  ;rootdirents	dw ?			; base 10
    37                                  ;totalsize16	dw ?			; base 10
    38                                  ;mediaid	db ?
    39                                  ;fatsecs	dw ?			; base 10
    40                                  ;secpertrack	dw ?			; base 10
    41                                  ;heads		dw ?			; base 10
    42                                  ;hiddensecs_lw	dw ?			; base 10
    43                                  ;hiddensecs_hw	dw ?			; base 10
    44                                  ;totalsecs_lw	dw ?			; base 10
    45                                  ;totalsecs_hw	dw ?			; base 10
    46                                  ;
    47                                  ;bpbx		ends

   142                                  ;============================================================================
   143                                  ;
   144                                  ;     for dos 4.00, msload program has been changed to allow:
   145                                  ;	  1. 32 bit calculation,
   146                                  ;	  2. reading a fat sector when needed, instead of reading the whole
   147                                  ;	     fat sectors at once. this will make the boot time faster,
   148                                  ;	     and eliminate the memory size limitation problem,
   149                                  ;	  3. solving the limitation of the file size (29 kb) of io.sys0,
   150                                  ;	  4. adding the boot error message. show the same boot error message
   151                                  ;	     and do the same behavior when the read operation of io.sys
   152                                  ;	     fails as the msboot program, since msload program is the

   271                                  ;   TotalSectorsL = maximum sector number in this media ;j.k.

   494                                  ; Relocate
   495                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   496                                  ;
   497                                  ; NOTES:
   498                                  ;
   499                                  ;   Relocates the loader code to top-of-memory.
   500                                  ;
   501                                  ; INPUT:     none
   502                                  ;
   503                                  ; OUTPUT:    code and data relocated.
   504                                  ;	     AX,CX,SI,DI destroyed
   505                                  ;
   506                                  ; calls:     none
   507                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   508                                  ;
   509                                  ; Determine the number of paragraphs (16 byte blocks) of memory.
   510                                  ; this involves invoking the memory size determination interrupt,
   511                                  ; which returns the number of 1k blocks of memory, and then
   512                                  ; converting this to the number of paragraphs.
   513                                  ; Find out whether RPL code is present at top of memory and modify the
   514                                  ; available amount of memory in AX
   515                                  ; leave the number of paragraphs of memory in ax.
   516                                  ;
   517                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   518                                  ; copy code from start to top of memory.
   519                                  ;
   520                                  ; the length to copy is EndOfLoader
   521                                  ;
   522                                  ; jump to relocated code
   523                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   524                                  
   525                                  		; 14/09/2023

   648                                  ; FindClusterSize

   650                                  ;
   651                                  ; INPUT:     bpb information in loaded boot record at 0:7c00h
   652                                  ;

   694                                  ;   to find out what system id byte is.
   695                                  ;
   696                                  ; INPUT:
   697                                  ;
   698                                  ; OUTPUT:
   699                                  ;

   701                                  ;   all other registers destroyed

   706                                  		; 14/09/2023

   765                                  
   766                                  ; ReadInFirstCluster
   767                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   768                                  ;
   769                                  ; NOTES: read the start of the clusters that covers at least IbmLoadSize
   770                                  ;	 fully.  for example, if sector/cluster = 2, and IbmLoadSize=3
   771                                  ;	 then we are going to re-read the second cluster to fully cover
   772                                  ;	 msload program in the cluster boundary.
   773                                  ;
   774                                  ; INPUT:
   775                                  ;   IbmLoadSize - make sure this value is the same as the one in
   776                                  ;		  msboot program when you build the new version!!!!!
   777                                  ;
   778                                  ;   SecPerCluster
   779                                  ;   ClusterSize
   780                                  ;   FirstSectorL
   781                                  ;   FirstSectorH
   782                                  ;
   783                                  ; OUTPUT: msload program is fully covered in a cluster boundary.
   784                                  ;	  ax = # of clusters we read in so far.
   785                                  ;
   786                                  ; calls:     ReadSectors
   787                                  ; logic:
   788                                  ;	ax; dx = IbmLoadSize / # of sector in a cluster.
   789                                  ;	if dx = 0 then ok. (msload is in a cluster boundary.)
   790                                  ;      else		   (has to read (ax+1)th cluster to cover msload)
   791                                  ;	read (ax+1)th cluster into the address after the clusters we
   792                                  ;	read in so far.
   793                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   794                                  
   795                                  ; 09/12/2022
   796                                  ; BiosStart equ 51Ah ; AX = IO.SYS starting cluster
   797                                  ; IbmLoadSize equ 3  ; AX = Number sectors in MSLOAD
   798                                  ; BiosOffset equ 700h ; Address where loader was read in
   799                                  	
   800                                  ReadInFirstCluster:
   801                                  		; 24/12/2022
   802                                  		;;mov	ax, [BioSStart]
   803                                  		;mov	ax, [51Ah]	; IO.SYS First Cluster
   804                                  		;dec	ax		; Root dir buffer at 500h (segment=0)
   805                                  		;			; IO.SYS first cluster ptr at 51Ah
   806                                  		;dec	ax		; AX = word [51Ah] - 2

   818                                  		;;div	byte [cs:SecPerCluster]

   820                                  					; AH = remaining sectors in last cluster

   823                                  		; If cluster size = 2, al = 1, ah = 1
   824                                  		; If cluster size = 1, al = 3, ah = 0
   825                                  		; If ah = 0, nothing remaining in last cluster

   834                                  		;cmp	ah, 0
   835 00000160 743A                    		jz	short SetNextClusterNum	; next cluster

   838                                  		; 06/10/2023

   840                                  		;push	ax		; AX = total clusters in the loader
   841                                  					; already read in

   845                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecL], cx    ; area in StartSecH:StartSecL
   846                                  		mov	cx, [cs:FirstSectorH]
   847                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecH], cx

   849                                  		add	[cs:StartSecL], ax ; Add number of sectors already loaded
   850                                  		adc	word [cs:StartSecH], 0 ; to start sector
   851                                  		;mov	ax, [BiosStart]
   852                                  		mov	ax, [51Ah] ; AX = [51Ah] = IO.SYS 1st clust
   853                                  		dec	ax
   854                                  		dec	ax

   875                                  		inc	ax		; AX = total clust read	in now
   876                                  SetNextClusterNum:			; ...

   986                                  ; SaveLoadedBios
   987                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   988                                  ;
   989                                  ; NOTES:
   990                                  ;
   991                                  ;   Determine how much of iosys was loaded in when the loader was loaded
   992                                  ;   by the boot record (only the portion that is guaranteed to be contiguous)
   993                                  ;
   994                                  ; INPUT:
   995                                  ;   AX:Total cluster already read in (loader & bios)
   996                                  ;   CS:CurrentCluster = number of clusters used for loader+2
   997                                  ;
   998                                  ; OUTPUT:
   999                                  ;	ES = 70h
  1000                                  ;	DI = next offset to load iosys code
  1001                                  ;	AX,BX,CX,DX,SI destroyed
  1002                                  ;
  1003                                  ;	CS:NextBioLocation = di on output
  1004                                  ;	CS:last_cluster = last cluster loaded
  1005                                  ;
  1006                                  ; calls:     none
  1007                                  ;
  1008                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1009                                  ;
  1010                                  ; Multiply cluster * cluster size in bytes to get total loaded for msload
  1011                                  ;
  1012                                  ; Subtract total_loaded - (EndOfLoader) to get loaded io.sys in last cluster
  1013                                  ;
  1014                                  ; Relocate this piece of iosys down to 70:0
  1015                                  ;
  1016                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1017                                  
  1018                                  SaveLoadedBios:
  1019                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1020                                  		;push	ds
  1021                                  		
  1022                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1023                                  		; ds = cs

  1026                                  		;mul	word [cs:ClusterSize]
  1027                                  					; Get total bytes loaded by
  1028                                  					; this is always < 64k, so
  1029                                  					; lower 16 bits ok
  1030                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1031                                  		; ax = [clusterSize] * (loaded cluster count)
  1032                                  SaveLoadedBios2:
  1033                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1034 000001A6 1E                      		push	ds
  1035                                  
  1036                                  		;sub	ax, EndOfLoader ; (OFFSET EndOfLoader)-(OFFSET Start)

  1053                                  		;mov	[NextBioLocation], di

  1055                                  
  1056                                  		; es:di = (the next) buffer address for next read
  1057                                  
  1058 000001B4 1F                      		pop	ds		; Save where location for next read
  1059                                  
  1060                                  ; GetContigClusters
  1061                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1062                                  ;
  1063                                  ; NOTES: go find clusters as long as they are contiguous
  1064                                  ;
  1065                                  ;
  1066                                  ; INPUT:
  1067                                  ;   CS:NextBioLocation
  1068                                  ;   CS:
  1069                                  ;
  1070                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1071                                  ;
  1072                                  ; calls: GetNextFatEntry
  1073                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1074                                  ;
  1075                                  ;Set CS:SectorCount to sectors per cluster
  1076                                  ;
  1077                                  ;Call GetNextFatEntry to get next cluster in file
  1078                                  ;
  1079                                  ;Call check_for_eof
  1080                                  ;
  1081                                  ;if (nc returned)
  1082                                  ;
  1083                                  ;   {call GetNextFatEntry
  1084                                  ;
  1085                                  ;    if (new cluster is contig to old cluster)
  1086                                  ;	{add sectors per cluster to CS:SectorCount
  1087                                  ;
  1088                                  ;	 call check_for_eof
  1089                                  ;
  1090                                  ;	 if (nc returned)

  1094                                  ; 09/12/2022
  1095                                  ; END_OF_FILE equ 0FFh
  1096                                  ; DosLoadSeg equ 70h

  1098                                  GetContigClusters:
  1099                                  
  1100                                  ; 24/12/2022
  1101                                  %if 0	
  1102                                  		xor	ah, ah
  1103                                  		mov	al, [cs:SecPerCluster]	; Assume we will get one cluster
  1104                                  		mov	[cs:SectorCount], ax	; Sector count = sectors in 1 cluster
  1105                                  		push	word [cs:SectorCount]

  1107                                  		pop	word [cs:SectorCount]

  1109                                  		cmp	byte [cs:EndOfFile], 0FFh ; END_OF_FILE
  1110                                  		jz	short GoToBioInit
  1111                                  		xor	dx, dx
  1112                                  		;sub	ax, 2			; Zero base the cluster
  1113                                  		; 10/12/2022
  1114                                  		dec	ax
  1115                                  		dec	ax
  1116                                  		xor	ch, ch
  1117                                  		mov	cl, [cs:SecPerCluster]
  1118                                  		mul	cx			; How many sectors (before next cluster) 
  1119                                  		add	ax, [cs:FirstSectorL]	; See where the data sector starts
  1120                                  		adc	dx, [cs:FirstSectorH]
  1121                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecL], ax	; Save it (used by ReadSectors)
  1122                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecH], dx
  1123                                  		mov	di, [cs:NextBioLocation] ; Get where to put code
  1124                                  		push	word [cs:SectorCount]	; Save how many sectors
  1125                                  		;mov	ax, DosLoadSeg
  1126                                  		mov	ax, 70h
  1127                                  		mov	es, ax
  1128                                  		call	ReadSectors
  1129                                  		pop	ax			; Get back total sectors read in
  1130                                  		mul	word [cs:BytesPerSec]	; Get number of bytes we loaded
  1131                                  		add	[cs:NextBioLocation], ax ; Point to where to load next	
  1132                                  		jmp	short GetContigClusters
  1133                                  %endif
  1134                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1135                                  		; ds = cs
  1136 000001B5 A1[1200]                		mov	ax, [SecPerCluster]	; Assume we will get one cluster
  1137 000001B8 A3[0C00]                		mov	[SectorCount], ax	; Sector count = sectors in 1 cluster
  1138                                  		;push	word [SectorCount]

  1140 000001BC E8D500                  		call	GetNextFatEntry		; Returns next cluster to read in AX	
  1141 000001BF 8F06[0C00]              		pop	word [SectorCount]

  1143

  1145 000001CB 741A                    		je	short GoToBioInit ; 23/12/2022

  1163

  1166                                  		
  1167 000001E5 EBCE                    		jmp	short GetContigClusters

  1169                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1170                                  
  1171                                  ; GoToBiosInit
  1172                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1173                                  ;
  1174                                  ; NOTES:
  1175                                  ;
  1176                                  ;  Set up required registers for iosys, then jump to it (70:0)
  1177                                  ;
  1178                                  ; INPUT:     none
  1179                                  ;
  1180                                  ;   CS:MediaByte = media byte
  1181                                  ;   CS:BootDrive = int 13 drive number we booted from
  1182                                  ;   CS:FirstSectorL = first data sector on disk (low) (0-based)
  1183                                  ;   CS:FirstSectorH = first data sector on disk (high)
  1184                                  ;
  1185                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1186                                  ;
  1187                                  ;   required by msinit
  1188                                  ;   DL = int 13 drive number we booted from
  1189                                  ;   CH = media byte
  1190                                  ;   BX = first data sector on disk (0-based)
  1191                                  ;   AX = first data sector on disk (high)
  1192                                  ;   DI = sectors/fat for the boot media.
  1193                                  ;
  1194                                  ; calls:     none
  1195                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1196                                  ;
  1197                                  ; set up registers for msinit then do far jmp
  1198                                  ;
  1199                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1200                                  
  1201                                  GoToBioInit:	
  1202                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1203                                  		; ds = cs	
  1204                                  		;mov	ch, [cs:MediaByte]
  1205                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:BootDrive]
  1206                                  		;mov	bx, [cs:FirstSectorL]
  1207                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:FirstSectorH]
  1208                                  
  1209 000001E7 8A2E[2800]              		mov	ch, [MediaByte] ; Restore regs required for msint
  1210 000001EB 8A16[2600]              		mov	dl, [BootDrive] ; Physical drv number we booted from.
  1211 000001EF 8B1E[2200]              		mov	bx, [FirstSectorL] ; AX:BX = first data sector of disk
  1212 000001F3 A1[2400]                		mov	ax, [FirstSectorH]
  1213                                  
  1214                                  		; 15/09/2023 (retrodos 4.s, retrodos41.s, retrodos42.s)
  1215                                  		; (This is not necessary but BP value will be 7C00h
  1216                                  		; when the RetroDOS boot sector code starts the kernel.
  1217                                  		; Retro DOS 4 Kernel source code contains a comment that
  1218                                  		; 'bp = 7C00h' at the init stage. But RetroDOS kernel
  1219                                  		; doesn't use it later. However, i want to leave BP
  1220                                  		; as equal to SP here.) ---rd4load.s---
  1221                                  		;
  1222                                  		; 15/09/2023 (iosys5.s, iosys51.s, iosys6.s)
  1223                                  		; (The BP value here will not be used by IO.SYS later.
  1224                                  		;  It is not necessary to set.) 
  1225                                  		;
  1226                                  		;mov	bp, sp	; 7C00h ; 15/09/2023
  1227                                  
  1228 000001F6 EA00007000              		jmp	70h:0	; Far jump to IoSysAddr	(DOSBIOS)
  1229                                  
  1230                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  1231                                  
  1232                                  ; ReadSectors
  1233                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1234                                  ; notES:
  1235                                  ;
  1236                                  ;  read in the CS:SectorCount number of sectors at ES:di
  1237                                  ;
  1238                                  ;
  1239                                  ; INPUT:
  1240                                  ;
  1241                                  ;   DI = OFFSET of start of read
  1242                                  ;   ES = segment of read
  1243                                  ;   CS:SectorCount = number of sectors to read
  1244                                  ;   CS:StartSecL = starting sector (low)
  1245                                  ;   CS:StartSecH = starting sector (high)
  1246                                  ;   following is bpb info that must be setup prior to call
  1247                                  ;   CS:NumHeads
  1248                                  ;   CS:number_of_sectors
  1249                                  ;   CS:BootDrive
  1250                                  ;   CS:SecPerTrack
  1251                                  ;
  1252                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1253                                  ;
  1254                                  ;   AX,BX,CX,DX,SI,DI destroyed
  1255                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1256                                  ; divide start sector by sectors per track
  1257                                  ; the remainder is the actual sector number, 0 based
  1258                                  ;
  1259                                  ; increment actual sector number to get 1 based
  1260                                  ;
  1261                                  ; the quotient is the number of tracks - divide by heads to get the cyl
  1262                                  ;
  1263                                  ; the remainder is actual head, the quotient is cylinder
  1264                                  ;
  1265                                  ; figure the number of sectors in that track, set al to this
  1266                                  ;
  1267                                  ; do the read
  1268                                  ;
  1269                                  ; if error, do reset, then redo the int 13h
  1270                                  ;
  1271                                  ; if successful read, subtract # sectors read from SectorCount, add to logical
  1272                                  ; sector, add #sectors read * BytesPerSec to bx;
  1273                                  ;
  1274                                  ; if SectorCount <> 0 do next read
  1275                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1276                                  
  1277                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1278                                  ReadSectors:
  1279                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1280                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1281                                  ReadSectors:
  1282 000001FB B90500                  		mov	cx, 5			; 5 retries
  1283                                  
  1284                                  		; Convert a logical sector into track/sector/head. AX has the
  1285                                  		; logical sector number
  1286                                  TryRead:
  1287                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1288                                  		; ds = cs
  1289 000001FE 51                      		push	cx
  1290                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:StartSecL]	; Get starting sector
  1291                                  		;mov	dx, [cs:StartSecH]
  1292                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1293                                  		;mov	ax, [StartSecL]	; *	; Get starting sector
  1294                                  		;mov	dx, [StartSecH]
  1295                                  		;push	ax ; *
  1296                                  		;mov	ax, dx
  1297 000001FF A1[0800]                		mov	ax, [StartSecH]
  1298 00000202 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  1299                                  		;;div	word [cs:SecPerTrack]
  1300                                  		;div	word [SecPerTrack]
  1301                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1302 00000204 8B1E[1600]              		mov	bx, [SecPerTrack]
  1303 00000208 F7F3                    		div	bx
  1304                                  
  1305                                  		;mov	[TempH], ax
  1306                                  		;;mov	[cs:TempH], ax
  1307                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1308 0000020A 89C5                    		mov	bp, ax ; [TempH]
  1309                                  		;pop	ax ; *
  1310 0000020C A1[0600]                		mov	ax, [StartSecL] ; *
  1311 0000020F F7F3                    		div	bx
  1312                                  		;div	word [SecPerTrack]
  1313                                  		;;div	word [cs:SecPerTrack]	; [TempH]:ax = track,
  1314                                  						; dx = sector number
  1315                                  
  1316                                  		;mov	bx, [cs:SecPerTrack]	; Get number of sectors we can
  1317                                  						; read in this track
  1318 00000211 29D3                    		sub	bx, dx
  1319                                  		;mov	si, bx
  1320 00000213 8B36[0C00]              		mov	si, [SectorCount]
  1321                                  
  1322 00000217 39DE                    		cmp	si, bx
  1323 00000219 7602                    		jna	short GotLength
  1324                                  		;cmp	[SectorCount], si
  1325                                  		;;cmp	[cs:SectorCount], si	; Is possible sectors in track more
  1326                                  		;jnb	short GotLength		; than what we need to read?
  1327 0000021B 89DE                    		mov	si, bx
  1328                                  		;mov	si, [SectorCount]
  1329                                  		;;mov	si, [cs:SectorCount]	; Yes, only read what we need to
  1330                                  ;GotLength:
  1331                                  
  1332                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1333                                  		; IO.SYS < 40KB (segment override is not possible)
  1334                                  		; 700h+0F8FFh < 64KB address 
  1335                                  		;	(there is not an override risk up to 63743 bytes)
  1336                                  ; 24/12/2022
  1337                                  %if 0
  1338                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1339                                  		; dma boundary check for >64KB reads
  1340                                  		; Also, Segment Override risk !
  1341                                  		or	di, di
  1342                                  		jz	short dma_boundary_ok ; no problem for the 1st read
  1343                                  		;cmp	byte [BootDrive], 80h
  1344                                  		;;cmp	byte [cs:BootDrive], 80h
  1345                                  		;jnb	short dma_boundary_ok ; no problem for hard disks
  1346                                  dma_boundary_chk:
  1347                                  		cmp	si, 1
  1348                                  		jna	short dma_boundary_ok 
  1349                                  				; 1 sector read will not cause a boundary error			
  1350                                  		push	dx
  1351                                  		push	ax
  1352                                  		mov	ax, si
  1353                                  		sub	dx, dx
  1354                                  		mul	word [BytesPerSec]
  1355                                  		mov	bx, es
  1356                                  		mov	cl, 4
  1357                                  		shl	bx, cl	; convert paragraphs to bytes
  1358                                  		; bx = segment start position (for 64K memory sections)
  1359                                  		add	bx, ax	; byte count to read
  1360                                  		pop	ax
  1361                                  		pop	dx
  1362                                  		add	bx, di	; add current buffer offset to byte count
  1363                                  		jnc	short dma_boundary_ok
  1364                                  		
  1365                                  		; Sector count must be decreased to prevent
  1366                                  		; DMA boundary error or segment override risk!
  1367                                  		dec	si
  1368                                  		jmp	short dma_boundary_chk
  1369                                  dma_boundary_ok:
  1370                                  %endif
  1371                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1372                                  GotLength:
  1373                                  		;inc	dl			; Sector numbers are 1-based
  1374                                  		; 18/12/2022
  1375 0000021D 42                      		inc	dx
  1376 0000021E 88D3                    		mov	bl, dl			; Start sector in BL
  1377                                  		
  1378                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1379                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1380                                  		;mov	dx, [TempH]		; DX:AX = Track
  1381                                  		;;mov	dx, [cs:TempH]		; DX:AX = Track
  1382                                  		
  1383 00000220 50                      		push	ax
  1384                                  		;mov	ax, dx
  1385                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1386 00000221 89E8                    		mov	ax, bp ; [TempH]
  1387 00000223 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  1388                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1389 00000225 F736[1800]              		div	word [NumHeads]
  1390                                  		;div	word [cs:NumHeads]	; Start cyl in AX, head in dl
  1391                                  		;mov	[TempH], ax
  1392                                  		;;mov	[cs:TempH], ax
  1393 00000229 58                      		pop	ax
  1394 0000022A F736[1800]              		div	word [NumHeads]
  1395                                  		;div	word [cs:NumHeads]	; [TempH]:AX = Cylinder, DX = Head
  1396                                  
  1397                                  			; At this moment, we assume that TempH = 0,
  1398                                  			; ax <= 1024, dx <= 255
  1399                                  
  1400 0000022E 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl
  1401                                  		
  1402 00000230 B106                    		mov	cl, 6
  1403 00000232 D2E4                    		shl	ah, cl			; Shift cyl high bits up
  1404 00000234 08DC                    		or	ah, bl			; Mix in with sector bits
  1405 00000236 88C5                    		mov	ch, al			; Setup cyl low
  1406 00000238 88E1                    		mov	cl, ah			; Setup cyl/high - sector
  1407 0000023A 89FB                    		mov	bx, di			; Get back OFFSET
  1408                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1409 0000023C 8A16[2600]              		mov	dl, [BootDrive]		; Get drive
  1410                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:BootDrive]	; Get drive
  1411 00000240 89F0                    		mov	ax, si			; Get number of sectors to read (al)
  1412 00000242 B402                    		mov	ah, 2			; Read sectors
  1413                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1414                                  		;push	ax
  1415                                  		;push	di
  1416                                  
  1417                                  			; Issue one read request. ES:BX have the transfer address,
  1418                                  			; AL is the number of sectors.	
  1419                                  
  1420 00000244 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  1421                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  1422                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  1423                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  1424                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1425                                  		;pop	di
  1426                                  		;pop	ax
  1427                                  
  1428                                  		; 13/12/2023
  1429                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1430                                  		;mov	ah, 0
  1431                                  		
  1432 00000246 59                      		pop	cx		; Get retry count back
  1433 00000247 7309                    		jnc	short ReadOk	; 23/12/2022

  1520                                  
  1521                                  		; Wait for a keypress on the keyboard.

  1526                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  1527                                  
  1528                                  		; We have to restore the address of the original rom disk

  1530                                  		; of this original table has been saved previously in

  1598                                  
  1599                                  ; GetNextFatEntry
  1600                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1601                                  ;
  1602                                  ; NOTES:
  1603                                  ;
  1604                                  ;   given the last cluster found, this will return the next cluster of
  1605                                  ;   iosys. if the last cluster is (f)ff8 - (f)fff, then the final cluster
  1606                                  ;   of iosys has been loaded, and control is passed to goto_iosys
  1607                                  ;   msload can handle maximum fat area size of 128 kb.
  1608                                  ;
  1609                                  ; INPUT:
  1610                                  ;
  1611                                  ;    CS:CurrentCluster
  1612                                  ;    CS:FatSize
  1613                                  ;
  1614                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1615                                  ;
  1616                                  ;   CS:CurrentCluster (updated)
  1617                                  ;
  1618                                  ; calls:  GetFatSector
  1619                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1620                                  ; get CurrentCluster
  1621                                  ;
  1622                                  ; if (16 bit fat)
  1623                                  ;    {if (CurrentCluster = fff8 - ffff)
  1624                                  ;	 {jmp goto_iosys}
  1625                                  ;     else
  1626                                  ;	{get OFFSET by multiply cluster by 2}
  1627                                  ;
  1628                                  ; else
  1629                                  ;    {if (CurrentCluster = ff8 - fff)
  1630                                  ;	 {jmp goto_iosys}
  1631                                  ;     else
  1632                                  ;	{get OFFSET by	- multiply cluster by 3
  1633                                  ;
  1634                                  ;	 rotate right to divide by 2
  1635                                  ;
  1636                                  ;	 if (cy set - means odd number)
  1637                                  ;	    {shr 4 times to keep high twelve bits}
  1638                                  ;
  1639                                  ;	 else
  1640                                  ;	    {and with 0fffh to keep low 12 bits}
  1641                                  ;	}
  1642                                  ;    }
  1643                                  ;
  1644                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1645                                  
  1646                                  ; 09/12/2022
  1647                                  ; FAT_12_BIT equ 1
  1648                                  ; NOT_END_OF_FILE equ 0  ; ~END_OF_FILE ; END_OF_FILE equ 0FFh
  1649                                  
  1650                                  GetNextFatEntry:
  1651 00000294 06                      		push	es
  1652                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1653                                  		; ds = cs
  1654                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:FatSegment]
  1655 00000295 A1[3200]                		mov	ax, [FatSegment]
  1656 00000298 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax		; ES-> FAT area segment
  1657                                  		; 09/12/2022
  1658                                  		;;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], END_OF_FILE
  1659                                  		;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], 0FFh ; Assume last cluster
  1660                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:CurrentCluster] ; Get last cluster
  1661                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1662                                  		; ds = cs
  1663 0000029A C606[2900]FF            		mov	byte [EndOfFile], 0FFh ; Assume last cluster
  1664 0000029F A1[0E00]                		mov	ax, [CurrentCluster] ; Get last cluster
  1665                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1666 000002A2 29D2                    		sub	dx, dx
  1667                                  		; dx = 0
  1668 000002A4 803E[2700]01            		cmp	byte [Fatsize], 1
  1669                                  		;;cmp	byte [cs:FatSize], FAT_12_BIT
  1670                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:Fatsize], 1
  1671 000002A9 7539                    		jne	short Got16Bit	; 23/12/2022
  1672                                  Got12Bit:
  1673 000002AB 89C6                    		mov	si, ax
  1674 000002AD D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  1675 000002AF 01C6                    		add	si, ax		; SI = AX * 1.5 = AX + AX/2
  1676                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1677 000002B1 56                      		push	si ; (**)
  1678                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1679                                  		;push	dx
  1680                                  		;xor	dx, dx
  1681                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1682                                  		;sub	dx, dx ; 23/12/2022
  1683 000002B2 E84700                  		call	GetFatSector
  1684                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1685 000002B5 5E                      		pop	si ; (**)
  1686                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1687                                  		;pop	dx
  1688 000002B6 7512                    		jnz	short ClusterOk
  1689 000002B8 268A07                  		mov	al, [es:bx]
  1690                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1691                                  		;mov	[cs:TempCluster], al
  1692                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1693 000002BB 50                      		push	ax ; (*)
  1694 000002BC 46                      		inc	si
  1695                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1696                                  		;push	dx
  1697 000002BD 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  1698 000002BF E83A00                  		call	GetFatSector	; Read next fat sector
  1699                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1700                                  		;pop	dx
  1701                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1702                                  		;mov	al, [es:0]
  1703                                  		;mov	[cs:TempCluster+1], al
  1704                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:TempCluster]
  1705                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1706                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1707 000002C2 58                      		pop	ax ; (*) 
  1708 000002C3 268A260000              		mov	ah, [es:0]
  1709 000002C8 EB03                    		jmp	short EvenOdd
  1710                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1711                                  
  1712                                  ClusterOk:				
  1713 000002CA 268B07                  		mov	ax, [es:bx]
  1714                                  EvenOdd:	
  1715                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1716                                  		; ds = cs
  1717 000002CD F606[0E00]01            		test	byte [CurrentCluster], 1
  1718                                  		; 10/12/2022		
  1719                                  		;test	byte [cs:CurrentCluster], 1 ; 09/12/2022
  1720                                  		;;test	word [cs:CurrentCluster], 1 ; Was last cluster odd?
  1721 000002D2 7505                    		jnz	short OddResult		; If not zero it was odd
  1722 000002D4 25FF0F                  		and	ax, 0FFFh		; Keep low 12 bits
  1723 000002D7 EB04                    		jmp	short TestEOF
  1724                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1725                                  
  1726                                  OddResult:				
  1727 000002D9 B104                    		mov	cl, 4			; Keep high 12 bits for odd
  1728 000002DB D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl
  1729                                  TestEOF:				
  1730 000002DD 3DF80F                  		cmp	ax, 0FF8h		; Is it last cluster?
  1731 000002E0 7318                    		jnb	short GotClusterDone	; Yep, all done here
  1732 000002E2 EB11                    		jmp	short NotLastCluster
  1733                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1734                                  
  1735                                  Got16Bit:
  1736                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1737                                  		;push	dx
  1738                                  		;xor	dx, dx
  1739                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1740                                  		; ax = cluster number
  1741                                  		; dx = 0
  1742                                  		;sub	dx, dx ; 23/12/2022
  1743 000002E4 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1			; Multiply cluster by 2
  1744                                  		;adc	dx, 0
  1745                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1746 000002E6 11D2                    		adc	dx, dx ; 0
  1747 000002E8 89C6                    		mov	si, ax			; Get the final buffer OFFSET
  1748 000002EA E80F00                  		call	GetFatSector
  1749                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1750                                  		;pop	dx
  1751 000002ED 268B07                  		mov	ax, [es:bx]
  1752 000002F0 83F8F8                  		cmp	ax, 0FFF8h
  1753 000002F3 7305                    		jnb	short GotClusterDone
  1754                                  NotLastCluster:	
  1755                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1756                                  		; ds = cs			
  1757                                  		;;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], NOT_END_OF_FILE ; ~END_OF_FILE
  1758                                  		;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], 0	; Assume not last cluster
  1759 000002F5 C606[2900]00            		mov	byte [EndOfFile], 0	; Assume not last cluster
  1760                                  GotClusterDone:				
  1761 000002FA 07                      		pop	es
  1762                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1763                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1764                                  ;EndRead:
  1765 000002FB C3                      		retn
  1766                                  
  1767                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  1768                                  
  1769                                  ; GetFatSector
  1770                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1771                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ES:0
  1772                                  ;
  1773                                  ;in). SI = offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find.
  1774                                  ;     ES = fat sector segment
  1775                                  ;     CS:BytesPerSec
  1776                                  ;
  1777                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  1778                                  ;      BX = offset value of the corresponding fat entry in the fat sector.
  1779                                  ;      CX destroyed.
  1780                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e. when 12 bit fat entry
  1781                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  1782                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  1783                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat).
  1784                                  ;
  1785                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1786                                  
  1787                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1788                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1789                                  GetFatSector:
  1790                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1791                                  		;push	ax
  1792                                  		;push	si
  1793 000002FC 57                      		push	di
  1794 000002FD 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  1795                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1796                                  		; ds = cs
  1797                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:BytesPerSec]
  1798                                  		;div	cx			; AX = Sector number, DX = Offset
  1799 000002FF F736[1000]              		div	word [BytesPerSec]
  1800 00000303 3B06[0A00]              		cmp	ax, [LastFatSector]
  1801                                  		;cmp	ax, [cs:LastFatSector]	; The same fat sector?
  1802 00000307 7421                    		je	short SplitChk		; Don't need to read it again.
  1803 00000309 A3[0A00]                		mov	[LastFatSector], ax
  1804                                  		;mov	[cs:LastFatSector], ax
  1805 0000030C 52                      		push	dx
  1806                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1807 0000030D 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  1808                                  		;add	ax, [cs:HiddenSectorsL]
  1809                                  		;adc	dx, [cs:HiddenSectorsH]
  1810                                  		;add	ax, [cs:ReservSectors]
  1811                                  		;adc	dx, 0
  1812                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1813                                  		; ds = cs
  1814 0000030F 0306[2E00]              		add	ax, [FatStartSecL]
  1815 00000313 1316[3000]              		adc	dx, [FatStartSecH]
  1816 00000317 A3[0600]                		mov	[StartSecL], ax
  1817 0000031A 8916[0800]              		mov	[StartSecH], dx		; Set up for ReadSectors
  1818                                  		;mov	[cs:StartSecL], ax
  1819                                  		;mov	[cs:StartSecH], dx	; Set up for ReadSectors
  1820                                  		
  1821 0000031E C706[0C00]0100          		mov	word [SectorCount], 1	; 1 sector
  1822                                  		;mov	word [cs:SectorCount], 1 ; 1 sector
  1823 00000324 31FF                    		xor	di, di ; 0
  1824                                  		; es:di = FATSEGMENT:0000h
  1825 00000326 E8D2FE                  		call	ReadSectors
  1826 00000329 5A                      		pop	dx
  1827                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1828                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:BytesPerSec]
  1829                                  SplitChk:
  1830                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1831 0000032A 8B0E[1000]              		mov	cx, [BytesPerSec]
  1832 0000032E 49                      		dec	cx			; CX = SECTOR SIZE - 1
  1833 0000032F 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx			; If last byte of sector, splitted entry.
  1834 00000331 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx			; set bx to dx
  1835 00000333 5F                      		pop	di
  1836                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1837                                  		;pop	si
  1838                                  		;pop	ax
  1839                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1840                                  ;EndWrite:		; 10/12/2022
  1841 00000334 C3                      		retn
  1842

  1844                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1845

  1852                                  		;db 0	; (word alignment)
  1853                                  NonSystemDiskMsg:
  1854 00000335 0D0A                    		db 0Dh,0Ah		; ...
  1855 00000337 4E6F6E2D5379737465-     		db 'Non-System disk or disk error',0Dh,0Ah
  1855 00000340 6D206469736B206F72-
  1855 00000349 206469736B20657272-

  1856 0000035F 6E6420707265737320-

  1874                                  ;=============================================================================
  1875                                  ; DOS BIOS (IO.SYS) DATA SEGMENT 
  1876                                  ;=============================================================================
  1877                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  1878                                  
  1879                                  section .BIOSDATA vstart=0
  1880                                  
  1881                                  ;--- DOSBIOS data segment ----------------------------------------------------
  1882                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1883                                  
  1884                                  ;Bios_Data segment
  1885                                  
  1886                                  BData_start:				
  1887 00000000 E96317                  hdrv_pat:	jmp	init		; MSBIO1.ASM, MSSBDATA.INC
  1888                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1889                                  
  1890 00000003 0000                    DosDataSg:	dw 0
  1891                                  
  1892                                  ; DOS's int 2f handler will exit via a jump through here.
  1893                                  ; This is how the BIOS hooks int2f
  1894                                  			
  1895 00000005 EA                      bios_i2f:	db 0EAh			; far jump to int_2f (segment may not be at 70h)
  1896 00000006 [8808]                  off_706:	dw int_2f
  1897 00000008 7000                    word_708:	dw 70h			; KERNEL_SEGMENT
  1898                                  
  1899 0000000A 0000                    romstartaddr:	dw 0			; The start address for the romfind routines
  1900                                  					; This is to maintain binary compatibility
  1901                                  					; with DISK based DOS 5.0
  1902                                  
  1903                                  ; This is a byte used for special key handling in the resident

  2053 00000119 [4E03]                  start_bds:	dw bds1			; Start	of linked list of BDS's
  2054 0000011B 7000                    		dw 70h			; KERNEL_SEGMENT
  2055                                  
  2056                                  ; (MSDOS 3.3) NOTE:
  2057                                  ; Some floppy drives do not have changeline support. The result is a
  2058                                  ; large amount of inefficiency in the code. A media-check always returns
  2059                                  ; "I don`t know". This cause DOS to reread the FAT on every access and
  2060                                  ; always discard any cached data.
  2061                                  ;    We get around this inefficiency by implementing a "Logical Door Latch".
  2062                                  ; The following three items are used to do this. The logical door latch is
  2063                                  ; based on the premise that it is not physically possible to change floppy
  2064                                  ; disks in a drive in under two seconds (most people take about 10). The
  2065                                  ; logical door latch is implemented by saving the time of the last successful
  2066                                  ; disk operation (in the value TIM_DRV). When a new request is made the
  2067                                  ; current time is compared to the saved time. If less than two seconds have
  2068                                  ; passed then the value "No Change" is returned. If more than two seconds
  2069                                  ; have passed the value "Don't Know" is returned.
  2070                                  ;    There is one complecation to this algorithm. Some programs change the
  2071                                  ; value of the timer. In this unfortunate case we have an invalid timer.
  2072                                  ; This possibility is detected by counting the number of disk operations
  2073                                  ; which occur without any time passing. If this count exceeds the value of
  2074                                  ; "AccessMax" we assume the counter is invalid and always return "Don't
  2075                                  ; Know". The variable "AccessCount" is used to keep track of the number
  2076                                  ; of disk operation which occur without the time changing.
  2077                                  
  2078 0000011D 00                      accesscount:	db 0			
  2079 0000011E FF                      tim_drv:	db 0FFh			
  2080 0000011F 00                      medbyt:		db 0
  2081                                  wrtverify:	; 15/10/2022			
  2082 00000120 02                      rflag:		db 2			; 2 for	read, 3	for write
  2083 00000121 00                      verify:		db 0			; 1 if verify after write
  2084 00000122 0000                    seccnt:		dw 0			
  2085 00000124 00                      		db 0			; -- pad where hardnum was
  2086 00000125 01                      dsktnum:	db 1			; number of diskette drives			
  2087                                  
  2088                                  ; (MSDOS 3.3) NOTE:
  2089                                  ; Some of the older versions of the IBM rom-bios always assumed a seek would
  2090                                  ; have to be made to read the diskette. Consequently a large head settle
  2091                                  ; time was always used in the I/O operations. To get around this problem
  2092                                  ; we need to continually adjust the head settle time. The following
  2093                                  ; algorithm is used:
  2094                                  ;
  2095                                  ;   Get the current head settle value.
  2096                                  ;   If it is 1, then
  2097                                  ;	set slow = 15
  2098                                  ;   else
  2099                                  ;	set slow = value
  2100                                  ;   ...
  2101                                  ;   if we are seeking and writing then
  2102                                  ;	use slow
  2103                                  ;   else
  2104                                  ;	use fast
  2105                                  ;   ...
  2106                                  ;   restore current head settle value
  2107                                  
  2108 00000126 00                      motorstartup:	db 0			; value from table
  2109 00000127 00                      settlecurrent:	db 0			; value	from table
  2110 00000128 00                      settleslow:	db 0			; slow settle value
  2111 00000129 00                      nextspeed:	db 0			; value	of speed to be used
  2112 0000012A 00                      save_head_sttl:	db 0			; used by read_sector routine
  2113 0000012B 00                      save_eot:	db 0			; saved	eot from the default DPT
  2114 0000012C 09                      eot:		db 9			
  2115 0000012D 00000000                dpt:		dd 0			; pointer to Disk Parameter Table			
  2116 00000131 00                      cursec:		db 0			; current sector
  2117 00000132 00                      curhd:		db 0			; current head
  2118 00000133 0000                    curtrk:		dw 0			; current track
  2119 00000135 0000                    spsav:		dw 0			; save the stack pointer
  2120 00000137 08                      formt_eot:	db 8			; eot used for format
  2121 00000138 00                      hdnum:		db 0			; head number
  2122 00000139 0000                    trknum:		dw 0			; track	being manipulated
  2123 0000013B 50                      gap_patch:	db 50h			; format gap patched into dpt
  2124

  2178                                  ;	of list. # of cylinders in maxparms initialized to -1 to indicate

  2500                                  ; 01/10/2022 - Erdogan Tan

  2507                                  					; at 2C7h:43h =	70h:25B3h
  2508                                  ttticks:	dw 396h, 2C7h		; time_to_ticks

  2539                                  ;************************************************************************
  2540                                  ;*									*
  2541                                  ;*	strategy - store es:bx (device driver request packet)		*
  2542                                  ;*		     away at [ptrsav] for next driver function call	*
  2543                                  ;*									*
  2544                                  ;************************************************************************
  2545                                  
  2546                                  strategy:	; proc far		
  2547 000006EC 2E891E[1200]            		mov	[cs:ptrsav], bx ; store es:bx (device driver request packet)
  2548                                  					; away at [ptrsav] for next driver function call
  2549 000006F1 2E8C06[1400]            		mov	[cs:ptrsav+2], es
  2550 000006F6 CB                      		retf
  2551                                  
  2552                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2553                                  
  2554                                  ;************************************************************************
  2555                                  ;*									*
  2556                                  ;*	device driver entry points. these are the initial		*
  2557                                  ;*	  'interrupt' hooks out of the device driver chain.		*
  2558                                  ;*	  in the case of our resident drivers, they'll just		*
  2559                                  ;*	  stick a fake return address on the stack which		*
  2560                                  ;*	  points to dispatch tables and possibly some unit		*
  2561                                  ;*	  numbers, and then call through a common entry point		*
  2562                                  ;*	  which can take care of a20 switching				*
  2563                                  ;*									*
  2564                                  ;************************************************************************
  2565                                  
  2566                                  ; 01/10/2022 - Erdogan Tan
  2567                                  ; (disassembled MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS code here with fixed table
  2568                                  ;  addresses, they will be changed to table labels later)
  2569                                  
  2570                                  ; 09/12/2022
  2571                                  
  2572                                  con_entry:				
  2573 000006F7 E84000                  		call	cdev_entry
  2574                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2575                                  		;dw 0E4h		; con_table
  2576 000006FA [E300]                  		dw con_table

  2578                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2579

  2585                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  2586 00000701 0000                    		db 0, 0

  2588

  2595 00000708 0001                    		db 0, 1

  2673                                  
  2674                                  ;************************************************************************
  2675                                  ;*									*
  2676                                  ;*	Ensure A20 is enabled before jumping into code in HMA.		*
  2677                                  ;*	This code assumes that if Segment of Device request packet is	*
  2678                                  ;*	DOS DATA segment then the Device request came from DOS & that	*
  2679                                  ;*	A20 is already on.						*
  2680                                  ;*									*
  2681                                  ;************************************************************************
  2682                                  
  2683                                  cdev_entry:	; proc near		
  2684 0000073A 2E803E[0D00]00          		cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0
  2685 00000740 740D                    		jz	short ce_enter_codeseg
  2686                                  				; optimized for DOS in HMA
  2687 00000742 50                      		push	ax
  2688 00000743 2EA1[0300]              		mov	ax, [cs:DosDataSg]
  2689 00000747 2E3906[1400]            		cmp	[cs:ptrsav+2], ax
  2690 0000074C 58                      		pop	ax
  2691 0000074D 7505                    		jnz	short not_from_dos
  2692                                  				; jump is coded this way to fall thru
  2693                                  				; in 99.99% of the cases
  2694                                  ce_enter_codeseg:
  2695 0000074F 2EFF2E[D506]            		jmp	far [cs:cdev]			
  2696                                  		;jmp	dword ptr cs:cdev
  2697                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2698                                  
  2699                                  not_from_dos:				
  2700 00000754 E86200                  		call	EnsureA20On
  2701 00000757 EBF6                    		jmp	short ce_enter_codeseg
  2702                                  
  2703                                  ;************************************************************************
  2704                                  ;*									*
  2705                                  ;*	outchr - this is our int 29h handler. it writes the		*
  2706                                  ;*	   character in al on the display using int 10h ttywrite	*
  2707                                  ;*									*
  2708                                  ;************************************************************************
  2709                                  
  2710                                  outchr:					
  2711 00000759 50                      		push	ax		; int 29h handler
  2712 0000075A 56                      		push	si
  2713 0000075B 57                      		push	di
  2714 0000075C 55                      		push	bp
  2715 0000075D 53                      		push	bx
  2716 0000075E B40E                    		mov	ah, 0Eh
  2717 00000760 BB0700                  		mov	bx, 7
  2718 00000763 CD10                    		int	10h		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTER AND	ADVANCE	CURSOR (TTY WRITE)
  2719                                  					; AL = character, BH = display page (alpha modes)
  2720                                  					; BL = foreground color	(graphics modes)
  2721 00000765 5B                      		pop	bx
  2722 00000766 5D                      		pop	bp
  2723 00000767 5F                      		pop	di
  2724 00000768 5E                      		pop	si
  2725 00000769 58                      		pop	ax
  2726 0000076A CF                      		iret
  2727                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2728                                  
  2729                                  ;************************************************************************
  2730                                  ;*									*
  2731                                  ;*	block13 - our int13 hooker					*
  2732                                  ;*									*
  2733                                  ;************************************************************************
  2734                                  
  2735                                  block13:				
  2736 0000076B 2E803E[0D00]00          		cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0
  2737 00000771 7408                    		jz	short skipa20
  2738 00000773 E85400                  		call	IsA20Off	; A20 Off?
  2739 00000776 7503                    		jnz	short skipa20
  2740 00000778 E84300                  		call	EnableA20	; assure a20 enabled
  2741                                  
  2742                                  skipa20:				
  2743 0000077B 2E8C1E[1C00]            		mov	[cs:i13_ds], ds	; save caller's ds for call-through
  2744 00000780 9C                      		pushf			; fake interrupt
  2745 00000781 2EFF1E[E106]            		call	far [cs:i13x]
  2746                                  		;call	dword ptr cs:i13x
  2747                                  					; call through Bios_Code entry table
  2748 00000786 2E8E1E[1C00]            		mov	ds, [cs:i13_ds]
  2749 0000078B CA0200                  		retf	2
  2750                                  
  2751                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  2752                                  
  2753                                  ; the int13 hook calls back here to call-through to the ROM
  2754                                  ; this is necessary because some people have extended their
  2755                                  ; ROM BIOSs to use ds as a parameter/result register and
  2756                                  ; our int13 hook relies heavily on ds to access Bios_Data
  2757                                  
  2758                                  call_orig13:	; proc far		
  2759 0000078E 8E1E[1C00]              		mov	ds, [i13_ds]	; get caller's ds register
  2760 00000792 9C                      		pushf			; simulate an int13
  2761 00000793 2EFF1E[B400]            		call	far [cs:Orig13]
  2762                                  		;call	cs:Orig13
  2763 00000798 2E8C1E[1C00]            		mov	[cs:i13_ds], ds
  2764 0000079D 0E                      		push	cs
  2765 0000079E 1F                      		pop	ds		; restore ds ->	Bios_Data before return
  2766                                  
  2767 0000079F 9C                      		pushf
  2768                                  		; 10/12/2022
  2769                                  		; ds = cs
  2770 000007A0 803E[0D00]00            		cmp	byte [inHMA], 0	; 16/10/2022
  2771                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0
  2772 000007A5 7408                    		jz	short corig13_popf_retf
  2773 000007A7 E82000                  		call	IsA20Off
  2774 000007AA 7503                    		jnz	short corig13_popf_retf
  2775 000007AC E80F00                  		call	EnableA20
  2776                                  corig13_popf_retf:			
  2777 000007AF 9D                      		popf
  2778 000007B0 CB                      		retf
  2779                                  
  2780                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2781                                  
  2782                                  ; BIOSDATA:07BBh (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  2783                                  ; BIOSDATA:07BBh (MSDOS 5.0, IO.SYS) ; 16/10/2022
  2784                                  
  2785 000007B1 9000FFFF                HiMem:		dd 0FFFF0090h		
  2786 000007B5 80000000                LoMem:		dd 80h
  2787

  2789
