 10743 000006A1 EBE8                    		jmp	short getret
 10744                                  
 10745                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10746                                  
 10747                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10748                                  
 10749                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------
 10750                                  ; read in the boot sector. set carry if error in reading sector.
 10751                                  ; bx is set to 1 if the boot sector is invalid, otherwise it is 0.
 10752                                  ;
 10753                                  ;	assumes es:di -> bds, ds-> Bios_Data
 10754                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------
 10755                                  
 10756                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10757                                  
 10758                                  readbootsec:	
 10759 000006A3 B600                    		mov	dh, 0		; head 0
 10760 000006A5 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; cylinder 0, sector 1
 10761 000006A8 E8BF00                  		call	read_sector
 10762 000006AB 7243                    		jb	short err_ret
 10763 000006AD 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx		; assume valid boot sector
 10764                                  
 10765                                  		; put a sanity check for the boot sector in here to detect
 10766                                  		; boot sectors that do not have valid bpbs. we examine the
 10767                                  		; first two bytes - they must contain a long jump (69h) or a
 10768                                  		; short jump (EBh) followed by a nop (90h), or a short jump
 10769                                  		; (E9h). if this test is passed, we further check by examining
 10770                                  		; the signature at the end of the boot sector for the word
 10771                                  		; AA55h. if the signature is not present, we examine the media
 10772                                  		; descriptor byte to see if it is valid. for dos 3.3, this
 10773                                  		; logic is modified a little bit. we are not going to check
 10774                                  		; signature. instead we are going to sanity check the media
 10775                                  		; byte in bpb regardless of the validity of signature. this is
 10776                                  		; to save the already developed commercial products that have
 10777                                  		; good jump instruction and signature but with the false bpb
 10778                                  		; informations
 10779                                  
 10780                                  ; that will crash the diskette drive operation. (for example, symphony diskette).
 10781                                  
 10782                                  		; 02/09/2023
 10783                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10784                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector], 69h ; is it a direct jump?
 10785                                  		;jz	short check_bpb_mediabyte ; don't need to find a nop
 10786                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector], 0E9h ; dos 2.0 jump?
 10787                                  		;jz	short check_bpb_mediabyte ; no need for	nop
 10788                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector], 0EBh ; how about a short jump?
 10789                                  		;jnz	short invalidbootsec
 10790                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+2], 90h ; is next one a nop?
 10791                                  		;jnz	short invalidbootsec
 10792                                  
 10793                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 10794 000006AF A0[4E01]                		mov	al, [disksector]
 10795 000006B2 3C69                    		cmp	al, 69h		; is it a direct jump?
 10796 000006B4 740F                    		je	short check_bpb_mediabyte
 10797                                  					; don't need to find a nop
 10798 000006B6 3CE9                    		cmp	al, 0E9h	; dos 2.0 jump?
 10799 000006B8 740B                    		je	short check_bpb_mediabyte
 10800                                  					; no need for nop
 10801 000006BA 3CEB                    		cmp	al, 0EBh	; how about a short jump?
 10802 000006BC 7530                    		jne	short invalidbootsec
 10803 000006BE 803E[5001]90            		cmp	byte [disksector+2], 90h ; is next one a nop?
 10804 000006C3 7529                    		jne	short invalidbootsec
 10805                                  
 10806                                  ; 15/10/5022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10807                                  ;
 10808                                  ;; 10/03/2019
 10809                                  ;; (MSDOS 3.3, MSDISK.ASM, 1988)
 10810                                  ;;
 10811                                  ;; Don't have to perform the following signature check since
 10812                                  ;; we need to check the media byte even with the good signatured diskette.
 10813                                  ;;
 10814                                  ;;check_signature:
 10815                                  ;;		cmp	word [cs:disksector+1FEh],0AA55h ; see if non-ibm
 10816                                  ;;							 ; disk or 1.x media.
 10817                                  ;;		jz	short checksinglesided ; go see if single sided medium.
 10818                                  ;;					       ; may need some special handling
 10819                                  
 10820                                  ; check for non-ibm disks which do not have the signature AA55h at the
 10821                                  ; end of the boot sector, but still have a valid boot sector. this is done
 10822                                  ; by examining the media descriptor in the boot sector.
 10823                                  
 10824                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10825                                  check_bpb_mediabyte:			
 10826 000006C5 A0[6301]                		mov	al, [disksector+15h]
 10827                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 10828 000006C8 50                      		push	ax ; 02/09/2023
 10829 000006C9 24F0                    		and	al, 0F0h
 10830 000006CB 3CF0                    		cmp	al, 0F0h	; allow	for strange media
 10831 000006CD 58                      		pop	ax ; 02/09/2023
 10832 000006CE 751E                    		jnz	short invalidbootsec
 10833                                  
 10834                                  ; there were some (apparently a lot of them) diskettes that had been formatted
 10835                                  ; under dos 3.1 and earlier versions which have invalid bpbs in their boot
 10836                                  ; sectors. these are specifically diskettes that were formatted in drives
 10837                                  ; with one head, or whose side 0 was bad. these contain bpbs in the boot
 10838                                  ; sector that have the sec/clus field set to 2 instead of 1, as is standard
 10839                                  ; in dos. in order to support them, we have to introduce a "hack" that will
 10840                                  ; help our build bpb routine to recognise these specific cases, and to
 10841                                  ; set up out copy of the bpb accordingly.
 10842                                  ; we do this by checking to see if the boot sector is off a diskette that
 10843                                  ; is single-sided and is a pre-dos 3.20 diskette. if it is, we set the
 10844                                  ; sec/clus field to 1. if not, we carry on as normal.
 10845                                  
 10846                                  checksinglesided:
 10847                                  		;mov	al, [disksector+15h]
 10848                                  		; 02/09/2023
 10849                                  		; al = [disksector+15h]
 10850 000006D0 3CF0                    		cmp	al, 0F0h
 10851 000006D2 741B                    		jz	short gooddsk
 10852 000006D4 A801                    		test	al, 1
 10853 000006D6 7517                    		jnz	short gooddsk
 10854 000006D8 813E[5601]332E          		cmp	word [disksector+8], 2E33h ; "3."
 10855 000006DE 7507                    		jnz	short mustbeearlier
 10856 000006E0 803E[5801]32            		cmp	byte [disksector+0Ah], 32h ; "2"
 10857 000006E5 7308                    		jnb	short gooddsk
 10858                                  
 10859                                  ; we must have a pre-3.20 diskette. set the sec/clus field to 1
 10860                                  
 10861                                  mustbeearlier:				
 10862 000006E7 C606[5B01]01            		mov	byte [disksector+0Dh], 1
 10863                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERCLUSTER]
 10864 000006EC EB01                    		jmp	short gooddsk
 10865                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10866                                  
 10867                                  invalidbootsec:				
 10868 000006EE 43                      		inc	bx		; indicate that boot sector invalid
 10869                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10870                                  movbpb_ret:
 10871                                  gooddsk:				
 10872 000006EF F8                      		clc
 10873                                  err_ret:
 10874 000006F0 C3                      		retn
 10875                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10876                                  
 10877                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10878                                  ;err_ret:				
 10879                                  		;retn
 10880                                  
 10881                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10882                                  
 10883                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10884                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10885                                  ; 'movbpb' moves the bpb read from the boot sector into registers for use by
 10886                                  ; getbp routine at has1
 10887                                  ;
 10888                                  ; if the set_id_flag is 1, and if an extended boot record, then set volume
 10889                                  ; serial number, volume label, file system id in bds according to
 10890                                  ; the boot record.  after that, this routine will set the set_id_flag to 2
 10891                                  ; to signal that volume label is set already from the extended boot record
 10892                                  ; (so, don't set it again by calling "set_volume_id" routine which uses
 10893                                  ; the volume label in the root directory.)
 10894                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10895                                  
 10896                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10897                                  
 10898                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10899                                  movbpb:	
 10900 000006F1 8A36[5B01]              		mov	dh, [disksector+0Dh]
 10901                                  					; disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERCLUSTER]
 10902                                  					; sectors per unit
 10903 000006F5 8A3E[5F01]              		mov	bh, [disksector+11h]
 10904                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.ROOTENTRIES]
 10905                                  					; number of directory entries
 10906 000006F9 8B0E[6101]              		mov	cx, [disksector+13h]
 10907                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.TOTALSECTORS]
 10908                                  					; size of drive
 10909 000006FD 8A26[6301]              		mov	ah, [disksector+15h]
 10910                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 10911                                  					; media	descriptor
 10912 00000701 A0[6401]                		mov	al, [disksector+16h];
 10913                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERFAT]
 10914                                  					; number of fat	sectors
 10915 00000704 8A1E[6601]              		mov	bl, [disksector+18h]
 10916                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERTRACK]
 10917                                  					; sectors per track
 10918 00000708 8A16[6801]              		mov	dl, [disksector+1Ah]
 10919                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.HEADS]
 10920                                  					; number of heads
 10921 0000070C 803E[0305]01            		cmp	byte [set_id_flag], 1 ; called by get_bpb?
 10922 00000711 75DC                    		jnz	short movbpb_ret
 10923 00000713 E81200                  		call	mov_media_ids
 10924 00000716 7205                    		jb	short movbpb_conv ; conventional boot record?
 10925 00000718 C606[0305]02            		mov	byte [set_id_flag], 2 ; signals that volume id is set
 10926                                  movbpb_conv:				
 10927 0000071D 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1
 10928 00000722 75CB                    		jnz	short movbpb_ret
 10929 00000724 E88811                  		call	resetchanged	; reset	flags in bds to	not fchanged.
 10930                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10931                                  		; cf = 0
 10932                                  ;movbpb_ret:				
 10933                                  		;clc
 10934 00000727 C3                      		retn
 10935                                  
 10936                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10937                                  
 10938                                  ;copy the boot_serial number, volume id, and filesystem id from the
 10939                                  ;***extended boot record*** in ds:disksector to the bds table pointed
 10940                                  ;by es:di.
 10941                                  
 10942                                  ;in.) es:di -> bds
 10943                                  ;     ds:disksector = valid extended boot record.
 10944                                  ;out.) vol_serial, bds_volid and bds_system_id in bds are set according to
 10945                                  ;      the boot record information.
 10946                                  ;     carry flag set if not an extended bpb.
 10947                                  ;     all registers saved except the flag.
 10948                                  
 10949                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10950                                  mov_media_ids:		
 10951 00000728 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 10952                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 10953                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 10954 0000072D 752C                    		jnz	short mmi_not_ext
 10955 0000072F 51                      		push	cx
 10956 00000730 8B0E[7501]              		mov	cx, [disksector+27h]
 10957                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 10958 00000734 26894D57                		mov	[es:di+57h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.vol_serial]
 10959 00000738 8B0E[7701]              		mov	cx, [disksector+29h]
 10960                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 10961 0000073C 26894D59                		mov	[es:di+59h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 10962 00000740 57                      		push	di
 10963 00000741 56                      		push	si
 10964 00000742 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 10965 00000745 BE[7901]                		mov	si, disksector+2Bh
 10966                                  		;mov	si, (offset disksector+2Bh) ;
 10967                                  					; disksector+EXT_BOOT.VOL_LABEL
 10968 00000748 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 10969 0000074B F3A4                    		rep movsb
 10970                                  		;mov	cx, 8		; size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 10971                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10972 0000074D B108                    		mov	cl, 8 ; cx = 8
 10973 0000074F BE[8401]                		mov	si, disksector+36h
 10974                                  		;mov	si, (offset disksector+36h) ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SYSTEM_ID
 10975 00000752 83C705                  		add	di, 5		; (BDS.filesys_id-BDS.volid)-size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 10976 00000755 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 10977 00000757 5E                      		pop	si
 10978 00000758 5F                      		pop	di
 10979 00000759 59                      		pop	cx
 10980                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10981                                  		; cf = 0
 10982                                  		;clc		; this clc is not required (16/06/2019 - Erdogan Tan)
 10983                                  				; (20/09/2022)
 10984 0000075A C3                      		retn
 10985                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10986                                  
 10987                                  mmi_not_ext:				
 10988 0000075B F9                      		stc
 10989 0000075C C3                      		retn
 10990                                  
 10991                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10992                                  
 10993                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10994                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 10995                                  ; read in the fat sector and get the media byte from it.
 10996                                  ; input : es:di -> bds
 10997                                  ; output:
 10998                                  ;	  carry set if an error occurs, ax contains error code.
 10999                                  ;	  otherwise, ah contains media byte on exit
 11000                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 11001                                  
 11002                                  readfat:	
 11003                                  		;mov	dh, 0
 11004                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11005 0000075D 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 11006 0000075F B90200                  		mov	cx, 2		; head 0
 11007                                  					; cylinder 0, sector 2
 11008 00000762 E80500                  		call	read_sector
 11009 00000765 7202                    		jb	short bad_fat_ret
 11010 00000767 8A27                    		mov	ah, [bx]	; media	byte
 11011                                  bad_fat_ret:				
 11012 00000769 C3                      		retn
 11013                                  
 11014                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11015                                  
 11016                                  ; 15/10/2022
 11017                                  
 11018                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11019                                  ; read a single sector into the temp buffer.
 11020                                  ; perform three retries in case of error.
 11021                                  ;   inputs:	es:[di].bds_drivenum has physical drive to use
 11022                                  ;		cx has sector and cylinder
 11023                                  ;		dh has head
 11024                                  ;		es:di has bds
 11025                                  ;		ds has Bios_Data
 11026                                  ;
 11027                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 11028                                  ;		    Bios_Data:bx point to sector
 11029                                  ;		       (note: some callers assume location of buffer)
 11030                                  ;
 11031                                  ;		carry set
 11032                                  ;		    ax has rom error code
 11033                                  ;
 11034                                  ; register bp is preserved.
 11035                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11036                                  
 11037                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 11038                                  
 11039                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11040                                  read_sector:	
 11041 0000076A 55                      		push	bp
 11042 0000076B BD0300                  		mov	bp, 3		; make 3 attempts
 11043 0000076E 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 11044 00000772 BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector	; get es:bx to point to	buffer
 11045                                  rd_ret:					
 11046 00000775 06                      		push	es
 11047 00000776 1E                      		push	ds
 11048 00000777 07                      		pop	es
 11049 00000778 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 11050 0000077B CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 11051                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 11052                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 11053                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 11054 0000077D 07                      		pop	es
 11055 0000077E 734A                    		jnb	short okret2
 11056                                  rd_rty:					
 11057 00000780 E86604                  		call	again		; reset	disk, decrement	bp, preserve ax
 11058 00000783 7442                    		jz	short err_rd_ret
 11059 00000785 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 11060                                  		;test	byte ptr [es:di+23h], 1	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11061                                  					; fnon_removable
 11062 0000078A 75E9                    		jnz	short rd_ret
 11063 0000078C 803E[2F06]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11064 00000791 7510                    		jnz	short rd_skip1_dpt
 11065 00000793 50                      		push	ax
 11066 00000794 1E                      		push	ds		; for retry, set the head settle time to 0Fh
 11067 00000795 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 11068                                  		;mov	al, [si+9]	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11069                                  		;mov	byte [si+9], 15 ; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11070                                  		;			; NORMSETTLE
 11071                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11072 00000799 B00F                    		mov	al, 15
 11073 0000079B 864409                  		xchg	al, [si+9]
 11074                                  		; 
 11075 0000079E 1F                      		pop	ds
 11076 0000079F A2[2A01]                		mov	[save_head_sttl], al
 11077 000007A2 58                      		pop	ax
 11078                                  rd_skip1_dpt:				
 11079 000007A3 06                      		push	es
 11080 000007A4 1E                      		push	ds
 11081 000007A5 07                      		pop	es
 11082 000007A6 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 11083 000007A9 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 11084                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 11085                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 11086                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 11087 000007AB 07                      		pop	es
 11088 000007AC 9C                      		pushf
 11089 000007AD 803E[2F06]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11090 000007B2 750E                    		jnz	short rd_skip2_dpt
 11091 000007B4 50                      		push	ax
 11092 000007B5 A0[2A01]                		mov	al, [save_head_sttl]
 11093 000007B8 1E                      		push	ds
 11094 000007B9 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 11095 000007BD 884409                  		mov	[si+9],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11096 000007C0 1F                      		pop	ds
 11097 000007C1 58                      		pop	ax
 11098                                  rd_skip2_dpt:				
 11099 000007C2 9D                      		popf
 11100 000007C3 7305                    		jnb	short okret2
 11101 000007C5 EBB9                    		jmp	short rd_rty
 11102                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11103                                  
 11104                                  err_rd_ret:				
 11105 000007C7 B2FF                    		mov	dl, 0FFh	; make sure we ask rom if media	has changed
 11106                                  					; return error
 11107 000007C9 F9                      		stc
 11108                                  
 11109                                  ; update information pertaining to last drive accessed, time of access, last
 11110                                  ; track accessed in that drive.
 11111                                  
 11112                                  okret2:					
 11113 000007CA 8816[7600]              		mov	[step_drv], dl	; set up for head settle logic in disk
 11114 000007CE 8816[1E01]              		mov	[tim_drv], dl	; save drive last accessed
 11115 000007D2 26886D46                		mov	[es:di+46h], ch	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 11116                                  					; save last track accessed on this drive
 11117                                  					; preserve flags in case error occurred
 11118 000007D6 9C                      		pushf
 11119 000007D7 E8EF03                  		call	set_tim
 11120 000007DA 9D                      		popf			; restore flags
 11121 000007DB 5D                      		pop	bp
 11122 000007DC C3                      		retn
 11123                                  
 11124                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 11128                                  dsk_open:				; 2C7h:80Ah = 70h:2D7Ah

 11153 00000801 C3                      		retn

 11159                                  		; al is	unit #
 11160                                  dsk_rem:				; 2C7h:831h = 70h:2DA1h

 11168                                  		;clc			; CF is already ZERO here
 11169                                  					; 15/10/2022
 11170 0000080C C3                      		retn
 11171                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11172

 11222                                  ; to prompt the user to place the correct disk in the drive.

 11228                                  checksingle:
 11229 0000082C 50                      		push	ax
 11230 0000082D 53                      		push	bx
 11231 0000082E 268B5D23                		mov	bx, [es:di+23h]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11232                                  
 11233                                  ; if hard drive, cannot change disk.
 11234                                  ; if current owner of physical drive, no need to change diskette.
 11235

 11239                                  					; is there a drive sharing this	physical drive?
 11240 0000083A 746E                    		jz	short singleret
 11241                                  
 11242                                  
 11243                                  ; look for the previous owner of this physical drive
 11244                                  ; and reset its ownership flag.
 11245                                  
 11246 0000083C 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 11247                                  					; get physical drive number

 11249 00000841 57                      		push	di
 11250 00000842 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; get first bds
 11251                                  scan_list:
 11252 00000846 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al
 11253 0000084A 7553                    		jnz	short scan_skip	; Not our drive. Try next bds.
 11254 0000084C B320                    		mov	bl, 20h	; ' '   ; fi_own_physical ; test ownership flag
 11255 0000084E 26845D23                		test	[es:di+23h], bl
 11256 00000852 744B                    		jz	short scan_skip	; he doesn't own it either. continue
 11257 00000854 26305D23                		xor	[es:di+23h], bl	; reset	ownership flag
 11258 00000858 5F                      		pop	di		; restore pointer to current bds
 11259 00000859 07                      		pop	es
 11260 0000085A 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; ; set	ownership flag
 11261                                  
 11262                                  ; we examine the fsetowner flag. if it is set, then we are using the code in
 11263                                  ; checksingle to just set the owner of a drive. we must not issue the prompt
 11264                                  ; in this case.

 11268 00000865 26807D0400              		cmp	byte [es:di+4], 0
 11269 0000086A 753E                    		jnz	short singleret
 11270 0000086C 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]
 11271                                  		;mov	al, es:[di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 11272                                  					; get the DOS drive letter

 11281                                  
 11282                                  ; to support "backward" compatibility with ibm's "single drive status byte"
 11283                                  ; we now check to see if we are in a single drive system and the application
 11284                                  ; has "cleverly" diddled the sdsb

 11286                                  not_fsetowner:

 11291 00000888 88C4                    		mov	ah, al

 11293 0000088B 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]

 11344                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11345                                  ;	disk i/o handler
 11346                                  ;
 11347                                  ;	al = drive number (0-6)
 11348                                  ;	ah = media descriptor
 11349                                  ;	cx = sector count
 11350                                  ;	dx = first sector (low)
 11351                                  ;	[start_sec_h] = first sector (high)  32 bit calculation.
 11352                                  ;	ds = cs
 11353                                  ;	es:di = transfer address
 11354                                  ;	[rflag]=operation (2=read, 3=write)
 11355                                  ;	[verify]=1 for verify after write
 11356                                  ;
 11357                                  ;	if successful carry flag = 0
 11358                                  ;	  else cf=1 and al contains error code

 11361                                  diskrd:

 11368                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11369                                  diskio:

 11376 000008C6 E3E8                    		jcxz	ioret

 11378                                  ; see if the media is formatted or not by checking the flags field in

 11389                                  ; ensure that we are trying to access valid sectors on the drive
 11390

 11405 000008EE 7714                    		ja	short baddrive
 11406 000008F0 EB16                    		jmp	short sanityok

 11408                                  
 11409                                  sanity32:

 11469                                  ; returns if everything is ok. otherwise, it pops off the stack and returns
 11470                                  ; the proper error code.

 11473 00000939 7403                    		jz	short diskio_nochangeline ; brif not

 11478

 11480

 11585                                  ; set the drive-last-accessed flag for diskette only.
 11586                                  ; we know that the hard disk will not be removed.

 12066                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12067                                  
 12068                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 12069                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 12070                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 12071                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 12072                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 12073                                  
 12074                                  again:
 12075 00000BE9 E86004                  		call	ResetDisk
 12076 00000BEC 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 12077 00000BEF 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 12078                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 12079 00000BF1 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 12080 00000BF2 C3                      		retn
 12081                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12082                                  
 12083                                  dont_dec_retry_count:
 12084 00000BF3 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 12085 00000BF5 C3                      		retn

 12098                                  ; NOTE: GetAccessFlag/SetAccessFlag is unpublished function.
 12099                                  ;
 12100                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 12101                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 12102                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 12103                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed
 12104                                  ;						1 disk i/o allowed
 12105                                  ;      SetAccessFlag will set/reset the unformatted_media bit in flags -
 12106                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 allow disk i/o
 12107                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o

 12191                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12192                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 12193                                  ;
 12194                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 12195                                  ;
 12196                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 12197                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 12198                                  ;	subfunctions.
 12199                                  ;
 12200                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12201                                  
 12202                                  ; 11/03/2019
 12203                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12204                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 12205 00000C26 E89DF8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 12206 00000C29 06                      		push	es
 12207 00000C2A C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 12208 00000C2E 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 12209                                  					; RAWIO
 12210 00000C33 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 12211 00000C37 07                      		pop	es
 12212 00000C38 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 12213                                  
 12214                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 12215                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 12216                                  
 12217                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12218 00000C3A BE[F70B]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 12219                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 12220                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 12221 00000C3D A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 12222 00000C3F 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 12223                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12224 00000C41 BE[0A0C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 12225                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 12226                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 12227                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 12228 00000C44 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 12229 00000C46 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 12230 00000C48 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 12231 00000C4B 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 12232 00000C4D 98                      		cbw
 12233 00000C4E D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12234 00000C50 46                      		inc	si
 12235 00000C51 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 12236 00000C53 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 12237                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 12238 00000C56 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 12239                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12240                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 12241 00000C5B B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 12242 00000C5D C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 12243                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12244                                  
 12245                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 12246                                  		; as a fall through from above
 12247                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h
 12248 00000C5E 5A                      		pop	dx

 12256                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12257                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:
 12258                                  ;
 12259                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 12260                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 12261                                  ;
 12262                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 12263                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header
 12264                                  ;	EXIT	??? BUGBUG
 12265                                  ;	USES	??? BUGBUG
 12266                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12267                                  
 12268                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12269                                  GetDeviceParameters:
 12270                                  		; Copy info from bds to the device parameters packet
 12271                                  
 12272 00000C62 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header

 12274                                  					; (DS:BX) = return buffer
 12275 00000C69 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+34]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12276 00000C6D 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 12277 00000C70 268B4523                		mov	ax, [es:di+35]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]

 12279                                  					; Mask off other bits
 12280 00000C77 894702                  		mov	[bx+2],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]

 12284 00000C83 884706                  		mov	[bx+6],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_MEDIATYPE]
 12285                                  					
 12286                                  		; copy recommended bpb
 12287 00000C86 8D7527                  		lea	si, [di+39]	; [di+BDS.rbytespersec]	= [di+BDS.R_BPB]
 12288 00000C89 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 12289                                  					; BUILD_DEVICE_BPB
 12290 00000C8C 7412                    		jz	short UseBpbPresent
 12291 00000C8E 1E                      		push	ds		; Save request packet segment
 12292 00000C8F 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 12293                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12294                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 12295                                  					; Point back to Bios_Data

 12297 00000C97 E859F9                  		call	GetBp		; Build	the bpb	from scratch

 12300 00000C9D 8D7506                  		lea	si, [di+6]	; [di+BDS.bytespersec] = [di+BSD.DP_BPB]
 12301                                  					; Use this subfield of bds instead
 12302                                  UseBpbPresent:				
 12303 00000CA0 8D7F07                  		lea	di, [bx+7]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB]
 12304                                  					; This is where	the result goes

 12306                                  					; For now use 'small' bpb
 12307 00000CA6 1E                      		push	ds		; reverse segments for copy
 12308 00000CA7 06                      		push	es
 12309 00000CA8 1F                      		pop	ds
 12310 00000CA9 07                      		pop	es
 12311 00000CAA F3A4                    		rep movsb

 12314                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction -above- resets cf) 	
 12315                                  		;clc

 12489                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12490                                  ; FormatTrack:
 12491                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 12492                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 12493                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 12494                                  ;
 12495                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 12496                                  ;
 12497                                  ; output:
 12498                                  ;	for status call:
 12499                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 12500                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 12501                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 12502                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 12503                                  ;		3 - no media present
 12504                                  ;	carry cleared.
 12505                                  ;
 12506                                  ;	for format track:
 12507                                  ;		carry set if error
 12508                                  ;
 12509                                  ; ==========================================================================

 12662                                  
 12663                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 12664                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 12665                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 12666                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 12667                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 12668                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 12669                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 12670                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 12671                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay
 12672                                  		; we initalise cx to the total sectors. use ax as a temporary
 12673                                  		; register.
 12674                                  
 12675                                  					; Special function requested?

 12682 00000E75 08E4                    		or	ah, ah

 12776                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12777                                  
 12778                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12779                                  
 12780                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12781                                  ;
 12782                                  ; TrackIo:
 12783                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 12784                                  ;
 12785                                  ;   input:
 12786                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 12787                                  ;		  3 = write
 12788                                  ;		  4 = verify
 12789                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 12790                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 12791                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 12792                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 12793                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 12794                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 12795                                  ;
 12796                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12797                                  
 12798                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12799                                  		
 12800                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12801                                  TrackIo:	
 12802                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 12803 00000ED8 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 12804 00000EDC E84DF9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 12805 00000EDF 803E[2F06]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12806                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 12807 00000EE4 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 12808 00000EE6 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 12809 00000EE7 51                      		push	cx
 12810 00000EE8 E8CDFA                  		call	iosetup
 12811 00000EEB 59                      		pop	cx
 12812 00000EEC 58                      		pop	ax
 12813                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 12814 00000EED BE[3205]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 12815 00000EF0 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12816 00000EF2 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12817 00000EF4 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 12818                                  
 12819                                  		; WE WANT:
 12820                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 12821                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 12822                                  		
 12823 00000EF6 BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 12824                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12825 00000EF9 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 12826                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12827                                  					; good_tracklayout
 12828 00000EFE 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 12829                                  		
 12830 00000F00 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 12831                                  ionextsector:				
 12832 00000F02 51                      		push	cx
 12833 00000F03 52                      		push	dx
 12834 00000F04 46                      		inc	si
 12835 00000F05 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 12836                                  					; the track table
 12837 00000F06 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 12838 00000F07 A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 12839                                  
 12840                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 12841                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 12842                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 12843                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 12844                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 12845                                  		
 12846                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12847 00000F0A 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 12848                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12849                                  					; fnon_removable ; Fixed disk?
 12850 00000F0F 7414                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No
 12851                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12852 00000F11 F606[2605]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 12853                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 12854                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 12855 00000F16 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 12856 00000F18 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 12857 00000F1C 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 12858 00000F1E E819FB                  		call	Disk
 12859 00000F21 5A                      		pop	dx
 12860 00000F22 59                      		pop	cx
 12861 00000F23 F8                      		clc
 12862 00000F24 C3                      		retn
 12863                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12864                                  
 12865                                  IoRemovable:				
 12866 00000F25 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 12867                                  					; table	and save it
 12868 00000F26 50                      		push	ax
 12869 00000F27 56                      		push	si
 12870 00000F28 1E                      		push	ds		; Save Bios_Data
 12871 00000F29 50                      		push	ax

 12873                                  					; Fetch	EOT while ds-> Bios_Data
 12874 00000F2E C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 12875 00000F32 884403                  		mov	[si+3],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_SECTOR_SIZ]
 12876 00000F35 886404                  		mov	[si+4],	ah	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 12877 00000F38 58                      		pop	ax
 12878 00000F39 1F                      		pop	ds

 12880 00000F3C A3[2201]                		mov	[seccnt], ax
 12881 00000F3F E8F8FA                  		call	Disk
 12882 00000F42 5E                      		pop	si		; Advance buffer pointer by adding
 12883                                  					; sector size

 12887                                  
 12888                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)

 12890                                  		;mov	cl, al	; 24/12/2023
 12891 00000F44 B88000                  		mov	ax, 128
 12892 00000F47 D3E0                    		shl	ax, cl
 12893                                  
 12894 00000F49 01C3                    		add	bx, ax
 12895 00000F4B 5A                      		pop	dx
 12896 00000F4C 59                      		pop	cx

 12898 00000F4F 803E[2F06]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1

 12900                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12901 00000F54 7404                    		je	short NoNeedDone2
 12902 00000F56 E828FA                  		call	done		; set time of last access, and reset
 12903                                  					; entries in Dpt.
 12904                                  NoNeedDone:
 12905 00000F59 F8                      		clc	; not necessary ('done' clears cf) ; 24/12/2023
 12906                                  NoNeedDone2:
 12907 00000F5A C3                      		retn
 12908                                  
 12909                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12910                                  
 12911                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12912                                  ;
 12913                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 12914                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 12915                                  ; are permissible.
 12916                                  ;
 12917                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 12918                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 12919                                  ; All other registers preserved
 12920                                  ;
 12921                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12922                                  
 12923                                  ; 02/09/2023
 12924                                  ;SectSizeToSectIndex:
 12925                                  ;		cmp	ah, 2		; (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024)
 12926                                  ;					; examine upper	byte only
 12927                                  ;		ja	short OneK
 12928                                  ;		mov	al, ah		; value	in AH is the index!
 12929                                  ;		retn
 12930                                  
 12931                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12932                                  ;
 12933                                  ;OneK:
 12934                                  ;		mov	al, 3
 12935                                  ;		retn
 12936                                  
 12937                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12938                                  
 12939                                  ; 02/09/2023
 12940                                  ;SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize:
 12941                                  ;		mov	cl, al
 12942                                  ;		mov	ax, 128
 12943                                  ;		shl	ax, cl
 12944                                  ;		retn
 12945                                  
 12946                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12947

 12950                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12951                                  ;
 12952                                  ; SetDASD
 12953                                  ;
 12954                                  ; Set up the rom for formatting.
 12955                                  ; we have to tell the rom bios what type of disk is in the drive.
 12956                                  ;
 12957                                  ; On Input   - ES:di - Points to bds
 12958                                  ;
 12959                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12960                                  
 12961                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12962                                  SetDasd:	
 12963 00000F5B 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;
 12964                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 12965 00000F60 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 12966                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12967 00000F62 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h
 12968                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12969                                  					; set_dasd_true
 12970 00000F67 7446                    		jz	short DasdHasBeenSet
 12971                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12972 00000F69 268065237F              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 7Fh
 12973                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FF7Fh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12974                                  					; ~set_dasd_true
 12975                                  DoSetDasd:
 12976 00000F6E C606[3006]00            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 0 ; Reset it
 12977 00000F73 C606[3B01]50            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 50h ; Format gap for 48tpi disks
 12978 00000F78 B004                    		mov	al, 4
 12979                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12980 00000F7A 268A6522                		mov	ah, [es:di+22h] ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12981 00000F7E 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
 12982                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12983                                  					; DEV_3INCH720KB
 12984 00000F81 7414                    		jz	short DoSet
 12985                                  		; 24/12/2023
 12986 00000F83 B001                    		mov	al, 1
 12987                                  		;cmp	ah, 1
 12988 00000F85 38C4                    		cmp	ah, al	; 1
 12989                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12990                                  					; DEV_5INCH96TPI
 12991                                  		;jz	short GotBig
 12992                                  		; 24/12/2023
 12993                                  		;mov	al, 1
 12994                                  		;jmp	short DoSet
 12995                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12996 00000F87 750E                    		jnz	short DoSet
 12997                                  GotBig:
 12998                                  		;mov	al, 2		; 160/320k in a	1.2 meg	drive
 12999                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13000 00000F89 40                      		inc	ax  ; mov al, 2
 13001 00000F8A 803E[2E06]00            		cmp	byte [mediatype], 0
 13002 00000F8F 7506                    		jnz	short DoSet
 13003                                  		;mov	al, 3		; 1.2meg in a 1.2meg drive
 13004                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13005                                  		;inc	al  ; al = 3
 13006                                  		; 18/12/2022
 13007 00000F91 40                      		inc	ax  ; al = 3
 13008 00000F92 C606[3B01]54            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 54h
 13009                                  DoSet:
 13010 00000F97 1E                      		push	ds
 13011 00000F98 56                      		push	si
 13012                                  
 13013                                  		;mov	ds, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vectors
 13014                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13015 00000F99 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 13016 00000F9B 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si	; 0
 13017                                  
 13018 00000F9D C5367800                		lds	si, [DSKADR]
 13019                                  		;lds	si, [78h]	; [DSKADR]  (Int 1Eh)
 13020                                  		;;lds	si, ds:78h
 13021                                  
 13022 00000FA1 C644090F                		mov	byte [si+9], 0Fh ;
 13023                                  					; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 13024 00000FA5 5E                      		pop	si
 13025 00000FA6 1F                      		pop	ds
 13026 00000FA7 B417                    		mov	ah, 17h
 13027 00000FA9 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]
 13028 00000FAD CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 13029                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 13030                                  DasdHasBeenSet:
 13031 00000FAF 268A6513                		mov	ah, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 13032 00000FB3 8826[3701]              		mov	[formt_eot], ah
 13033 00000FB7 C3                      		retn
 13034                                  
 13035                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13036                                  
 13037                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13038                                  
 13039                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13040                                  ;
 13041                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 13042                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 13043                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 13044                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 13045                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 13046                                  ;
 13047                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 13048                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 13049                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 13050                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 13051                                  ;
 13052                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 13053                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 13054                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 13055                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 13056                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 13057                                  ;
 13058                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13059                                  
 13060                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13061                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 13062 00000FB8 51                      		push	cx
 13063 00000FB9 52                      		push	dx
 13064                                  
 13065                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 13066                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 13067                                  
 13068 00000FBA 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 13069 00000FBF 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 13070 00000FC1 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 13071 00000FC3 803E[2F06]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13072 00000FC8 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 13073 00000FCA EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 13074                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13075                                  
 13076                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 13077 00000FCC 06                      		push	es
 13078 00000FCD 56                      		push	si
 13079                                  
 13080                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13081                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 13082 00000FCE 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 13083 00000FD0 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 13084                                  
 13085 00000FD2 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 13086                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 13087                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 13088 00000FD7 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 13089 00000FDB 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 13090                                  
 13091                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 13092                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 13093                                  
 13094 00000FDF 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 13095 00000FE4 5E                      		pop	si
 13096 00000FE5 07                      		pop	es
 13097                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:				
 13098 00000FE6 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 13099 00000FEA 49                      		dec	cx
 13100 00000FEB 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 13101 00000FEE D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 13102 00000FF0 D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 13103 00000FF2 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 13104 00000FF4 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 13105 00000FF8 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13106 00000FFC 06                      		push	es
 13107 00000FFD 1E                      		push	ds
 13108 00000FFE 56                      		push	si
 13109 00000FFF 57                      		push	di
 13110 00001000 B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 13111 00001002 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 13112                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 13113 00001004 7231                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 13114 00001006 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 13115 0000100B 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 13116 0000100D 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 13117                                  		
 13118                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13119                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 13120 0000100E 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 13121 00001010 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0
 13122 00001012 06                      		push	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 13123                                  
 13124 00001013 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 13125                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 13126                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 13127 00001018 8936[3106]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 13128 0000101C 8C06[3306]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 13129                                  
 13130                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13131                                  		;;mov	es, [zeroseg]
 13132                                  		;xor	si, si ; 0
 13133                                  		;mov	es, si
 13134 00001020 07                      		pop	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 13135                                  
 13136                                  		;mov	es:78h,	di
 13137 00001021 26893E7800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], di
 13138                                  		;pop	word ptr es:7Ah	; replace with one returned by rom
 13139 00001026 268F067A00              		pop	word [es:DSKADR+2]
 13140 0000102B C606[2F06]01            		mov	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13141                                  skip_disk_base_setting:			
 13142 00001030 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Legal	combination + rom support code
 13143                                  		;mov	ds:had_format_error, al	; Reset	the flag
 13144 00001032 A2[3006]                		mov	[had_format_error], al
 13145 00001035 EB0E                    		jmp	short PopStatRet
 13146                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13147                                  
 13148                                  FormaStatErr:
 13149                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13150 00001037 B003                    		mov	al, 3
 13151                                  				
 13152 00001039 80FC0C                  		cmp	ah, 0Ch		; DSK_ILLEGAL_COMBINATION
 13153                                  					; Illegal combination =	0Ch
 13154 0000103C 7406                    		jz	short FormatStatIllegalComb
 13155 0000103E 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; DSK_TIMEOUT_ERR
 13156 00001041 7402                    		jz	short FormatStatTimeOut
 13157                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13158                                  		;dec	al
 13159                                  		; 18/12/2022
 13160 00001043 48                      		dec	ax
 13161                                  		; al = 2
 13162                                  		;mov	al, 1		; Function not supported.
 13163                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet
 13164                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13165                                  
 13166                                  FormatStatIllegalComb:
 13167                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13168                                  		;dec	al	; 3 -> 2 or 2 -> 1
 13169                                  		; 18/12/2022
 13170 00001044 48                      		dec	ax
 13171                                  		; al = 2				
 13172                                  		;mov	al, 2		; Function supported, but
 13173                                  					; Illegal sect/trk,trk combination.
 13174                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13175                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet
 13176                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13177                                  
 13178                                  FormatStatTimeOut:			
 13179                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13180                                  		; al = 3
 13181                                  		;mov	al, 3		; Function supported, but
 13182                                  					; Media	not present.
 13183                                  PopStatRet:				
 13184 00001045 5F                      		pop	di
 13185 00001046 5E                      		pop	si
 13186 00001047 1F                      		pop	ds
 13187 00001048 07                      		pop	es
 13188                                  SetMediaRet:

 13190 0000104A 59                      		pop	cx
