 13193                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13194                                  
 13195                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13196                                  
 13197                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13198                                  ;
 13199                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 13200                                  ;
 13201                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 13202                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 13203                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 13204                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 13205                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 13206                                  ;
 13207                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13208                                  
 13209                                  ResetDisk:
 13210 0000104C 50                      		push	ax
 13211                                  
 13212                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13213 0000104D B80100                  		mov	ax, 1 ; PCDOS 7.1
 13214 00001050 3806[2F06]              		cmp	[media_set_for_format], al ; 1
 13215                                  		;cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13216                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 13217 00001054 7503                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 13218                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 13219                                  		;mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 13220 00001056 A2[3006]                		mov	[had_format_error], al ; 1
 13221                                  ResetDisk_cont:
 13222                                  		; 02/09/2023 (ah=0)
 13223                                  		;xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 13224 00001059 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 13225                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 13226 0000105B C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 13227                                  					; Zap up the speed
 13228 00001060 58                      		pop	ax
 13229 00001061 C3                      		retn
 13230                                  
 13231                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13232                                  
 13233                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13234                                  
 13235                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13236                                  ;
 13237                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 13238                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 13239                                  ;
 13240                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 13241                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 13242                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 13243                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 13244                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 13245                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 13246                                  ;
 13247                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 13248                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 13249                                  ;
 13250                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13251                                  
 13252                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13253                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13254                                  ToRom:	
 13255 00001062 53                      		push	bx
 13256 00001063 56                      		push	si
 13257                                  
 13258                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 13259                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 13260                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]
 13261                                  
 13262 00001064 F606[2F06]01            		test	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13263 00001069 7534                    		jnz	short GotValidDpt
 13264 0000106B 50                      		push	ax
 13265 0000106C 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 13266 0000106D 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 13267                                  					; ffSmall ; is it a 3.5" drive?
 13268                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13269                                  		;pushf	; not necessary	; (Save	the cmp	result)
 13270                                  		
 13271 00001072 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 13272                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; Get pointer to disk base table
 13273 00001076 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 13274                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt, si
 13275                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt+2, es ;	Save pointer to table
 13276 0000107B 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 13277 0000107F 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 13278                                  		
 13279 00001083 A0[3701]                		mov	al, [formt_eot]
 13280 00001086 26884404                		mov	[es:si+4], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 13281 0000108A A0[3B01]                		mov	al, [gap_patch]
 13282 0000108D 26884407                		mov	[es:si+7], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_FORMT_GAP]
 13283                                  					; Important for	format
 13284 00001091 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 13285                                  					; Assume we are	doing a	seek operation
 13286                                  					; Setup	motor start correctly for 3.5" drives
 13287                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13288                                  		;popf			; Get result of	earlier	cmp
 13289 00001096 7505                    		jnz	short MotorStrtOK
 13290 00001098 26C6440A04              		mov	byte [es:si+0Ah], 4 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 13291                                  MotorStrtOK:				
 13292 0000109D 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 13293 0000109E 58                      		pop	ax
 13294                                  GotValidDpt:				
 13295 0000109F 8B16[3901]              		mov	dx, [trknum]	; Set track number
 13296 000010A3 88D5                    		mov	ch, dl		; Set low 8 bits in ch
 13297 000010A5 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; Set drive number
 13298 000010A9 8A36[3801]              		mov	dh, [hdnum]	; Set head number
 13299 000010AD 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 13300 000010AE 8E06[2E05]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 13301 000010B2 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 13302 000010B4 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 13303 000010B5 5E                      		pop	si
 13304 000010B6 5B                      		pop	bx
 13305 000010B7 C3                      		retn
 13306                                  
 13307                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13308                                  
 13309                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13310                                  
 13311                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 13312                                  
 13313                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13314                                  ;
 13315                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 13316                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 13317                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 13318                                  ;
 13319                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13320                                  
 13321                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13322                                  ioctl_getown:
 13323 000010B8 E80BF4                  		call	SetDrive
 13324 000010BB 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13325                                  					; Get physical drive number
 13326 000010BF C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 13327                                  ownloop:				
 13328 000010C3 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13329 000010C7 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 13330                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13331 000010C9 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 13332                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13333                                  					; fi_own_physical
 13334 000010CE 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 13335                                  getnextBDS:				
 13336 000010D0 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 13337 000010D3 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 13338                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13339                                  
 13340                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13341                                  ;
 13342                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 13343                                  ; in al to al.
 13344                                  ;
 13345                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13346                                  
 13347                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13348                                  ioctl_setown:
 13349 000010D5 E8EEF3                  		call	SetDrive
 13350 000010D8 C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 13351                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 13352 000010DD E84CF7                  		call	checksingle
 13353                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13354 000010E0 FE0E[7A00]              		dec	byte [fsetowner] ; 0
 13355                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 13356                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 13357                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 13358                                  
 13359                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13360                                  ;
 13361                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 13362                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 13363                                  ;
 13364                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13365                                  
 13366                                  exitown:				
 13367 000010E4 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 13368                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13369 000010E6 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 13370                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13371                                  					; fi_am_mult
 13372 000010EB 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult

 13443                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13444                                  ;	get media id
 13445                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13446                                  ;
 13447                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 13448                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13449                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 13450                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 13451                                  ;
 13452                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13453                                  ;
 13454                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 13455                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13456                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13457                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 13458                                  ;
 13459                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13460                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13461                                  ;
 13462                                  ; LOGIC:
 13463                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 13464                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 13465                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 13466                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 13467                                  ;
 13468                                  ; {
 13469                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 13470                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 13471                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 13472                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13473                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13474                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13475                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 13476                                  ;		};
 13477                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13478                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13479                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13480                                  ;		};
 13481                                  ;	else
 13482                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 13483                                  ;
 13484                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13485                                  
 13486                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 13487                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 13488                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 13489                                  
 13490                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13491                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13492                                  GetMediaId:
 13493 00001123 E89900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13494 00001126 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 13495 0000112A C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 13496 0000112F E87500                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 13497 00001132 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 13498                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13499 00001134 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13500                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13501                                  		;jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 13502                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13503 00001139 721B                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	
 13504                                  
 13505                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13506 0000113B BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 13507 0000113E 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 13508                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13509                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13510 00001141 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 13511 00001143 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 13512 00001147 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13513                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13514 0000114B 46                      		inc	si
 13515                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 13516                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13517 0000114C 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13518                                  IOCtl_If4:		; 24/12/2023
 13519 0000114F B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13520                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13521                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13522 00001152 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 13523                                  	
 13524                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13525                                  		; cf = 0
 13526                                  		;clc
 13527                                  
 13528 00001154 C3                      		retn
 13529                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13530                                  
 13531                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13532                                  IOCtl_If2:
 13533 00001155 F9                      		stc	
 13534                                  IOCtl_If7:
 13535 00001156 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13536                                  		;stc
 13537                                  IOCtl_If6:
 13538                                  IOCtl_If1:
 13539 00001158 C3                      		retn

 13543                                  
 13544                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13545                                  ;  set media id
 13546                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13547                                  
 13548                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 13549                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13550                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 13551                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 13552                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 13553                                  ;	    the bds table.
 13554                                  ;
 13555                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13556                                  ;
 13557                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 13558                                  ;	    the request packet.
 13559                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 13560                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13561                                  ;
 13562                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13563                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13564                                  ;
 13565                                  ; logic:
 13566                                  ;
 13567                                  ; {
 13568                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 13569                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 13570                                  ;	BootIo;
 13571                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13572                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13573                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13574                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 13575                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 13576                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 13577                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 13578                                  ;		};
 13579                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13580                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13581                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13582                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 13583                                  ;		};
 13584                                  ;	else
 13585                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 13586                                  ;
 13587                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13588                                  
 13589                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13590                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13591                                  SetMediaId:
 13592 00001159 E86300                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13593 0000115C 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 13594                                  					; Logical drive	number
 13595 00001160 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 13596 00001162 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 13597 00001167 52                      		push	dx
 13598 00001168 E83C00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13599 0000116B 5A                      		pop	dx
 13600 0000116C 72EA                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 13601                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13602 0000116E 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13603                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13604 00001173 72E1                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 13605                                  		
 13606 00001175 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13607                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13608                                  		;jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 13609                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13610 0000117A 75D9                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2
 13611                                  
 13612 0000117C 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 13613 0000117D 57                      		push	di
 13614 0000117E 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 13615 0000117F 07                      		pop	es
 13616 00001180 BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13617 00001183 C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 13618 00001187 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13619 0000118A 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13620                                  
 13621                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13622                                  		;mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13623                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13624                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13625                                  		;rep movsb
 13626 0000118D E8BFFF                  		call	IOCtl_If4       ; copy volume serial, label and system id
 13627                                  
 13628 00001190 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 13629 00001191 1F                      		pop	ds
 13630 00001192 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 13631 00001193 07                      		pop	es
 13632 00001194 E891F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 13633 00001197 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 13634 00001199 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 13635 0000119E E80600                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 13636 000011A1 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 13637                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 13638                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 13639 000011A6 C3                      		retn
 13640                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13641                                  
 13642                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13643                                  ;IOCtl_If7:
 13644                                  ;		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13645                                  ;		stc
 13646                                  ;IOCtl_If6:
 13647                                  ;		retn
 13648                                  
 13649                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13650                                  
 13651                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13652                                  
 13653                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13654                                  ;	BootIo
 13655                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13656                                  ;
 13657                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 13658                                  ;
 13659                                  ; input :
 13660                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 13661                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 13662                                  ;
 13663                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 13664                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 13665                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 13666                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 13667                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13668                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13669                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 13670                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 13671                                  ;
 13672                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13673                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 13674                                  ;
 13675                                  ; logic:
 13676                                  ;
 13677                                  ; {
 13678                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 13679                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 13680                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 13681                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 13682                                  ; }
 13683                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13684                                  
 13685                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13686                                  BootIo:	
 13687 000011A7 06                      		push	es
 13688 000011A8 57                      		push	di
 13689 000011A9 53                      		push	bx
 13690 000011AA 1E                      		push	ds
 13691 000011AB 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 13692                                  
 13693                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 13694                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 13695                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13696                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 13697                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 13698                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 13699                                  
 13700 000011AC BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 13701 000011AF 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 13702 000011B1 8916[2405]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 13703 000011B5 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 13704 000011B8 E8FBF6                  		call	diskio
 13705 000011BB 5B                      		pop	bx
 13706 000011BC 5F                      		pop	di
 13707 000011BD 07                      		pop	es
 13708 000011BE C3                      		retn
 13709                                  
 13710                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13711                                  
 13712                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13713                                  
 13714                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13715                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 13716                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13717                                  ;
 13718                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 13719                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 13720                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 13721                                  ; history in the flags.
 13722                                  ;
 13723                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 13724                                  ;
 13725                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 13726                                  ;
 13727                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 13728                                  ;
 13729                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13730                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 13731                                  ;
 13732                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13733                                  
 13734                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 13735 000011BF 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13736 000011C3 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 13737 000011C5 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 13738                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13739 000011C7 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 13740                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13741                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 13742 000011CC 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13743 000011CE 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 13744 000011D3 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13745 000011D5 E8DD06                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 13746 000011D8 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 13747                                  
 13748                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 13749                                  
 13750 000011DA B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 13751 000011DC CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 13752                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 13753                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 13754 000011DE 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13755 000011E0 53                      		push	bx
 13756 000011E1 BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 13757                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 13758                                  					; physical drive
 13759 000011E4 E8A706                  		call	set_changed_dl
 13760 000011E7 5B                      		pop	bx
 13761                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 13762 000011E8 C3                      		retn
 13763                                  
 13764                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13765

 13767                                  
 13768                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13769                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 13770                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13771                                  ;
 13772                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13773                                  ;
 13774                                  ; INPUT :
 13775                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13776                                  ;
 13777                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 13778                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 13779                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13780                                  
 13781                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13782                                  GetAccessFlag:
 13783 000011E9 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 13784 000011ED C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13785                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 13786                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13787 000011F0 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 13788                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13789 000011F2 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13790                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13791                                  					; unformatted_media
 13792 000011F7 7501                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 13793                                  		;inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 13794                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13795 000011F9 40                      		inc	ax
 13796                                  GafDone:
 13797 000011FA 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13798 000011FD C3                      		retn
 13799                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13800                                  
 13801                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13802                                  
 13803                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13804                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 13805                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13806                                  ;
 13807                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13808                                  ;
 13809                                  ; input :
 13810                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13811                                  ;
 13812                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 13813                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13814                                  
 13815                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13816                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 13817 000011FE C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 13818 00001202 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13819                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13820 00001205 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 13821                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13822                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 13823 0000120A 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13824 0000120E 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 13825                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13826 00001210 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13827                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13828                                  					; unformatted_media
 13829                                  saf_Done:				
 13830 00001215 C3                      		retn

 13832                                  
 13833                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13834                                  
 13835                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13836                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 13837                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13838                                  ;
 13839                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 13840                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 13841                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 13842                                  ;
 13843                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13844                                  
 13845                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13846                                  ioctl_support_query:
 13847 00001216 06                      		push	es
 13848 00001217 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 13849 0000121B 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 13850                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 13851 0000121F 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 13852                                  					; See if major code is 8
 13853 00001221 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 13854 00001223 0E                      		push	cs
 13855 00001224 07                      		pop	es
 13856 00001225 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 13857                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13858 00001228 BF[1B0C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 13859                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 13860                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h

 13862 0000122D F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 13863 0000122F 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found

 13869                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit

 13883                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13884                                  
 13885                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13886                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 13887                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13888                                  ;
 13889                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 13890                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 13891                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 13892                                  ;	    drive)
 13893                                  ;
 13894                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 13895                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 13896                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 13897                                  ;
 13898                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 13899                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 13900                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 13901                                  ;
 13902                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 13903                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 13904                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 13905                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 13906                                  ;
 13907                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 13908                                  ;
 13909                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 13910                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 13911                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 13912                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 13913                                  ; 
 13914                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13915                                  
 13916                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13917                                  SenseMediaType:				
 13918 0000123A C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 13919 0000123E C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13920                                  		; 10/10/2022
 13921                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 13922 00001241 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 13923 00001243 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 13924                                  		;
 13925 00001245 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13926                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 13927                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13928                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 13929 00001249 B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 13930                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 13931 0000124B CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 13932 0000124D 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 13933 0000124F FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 13934                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 13935 00001251 FEC8                    		dec	al
 13936 00001253 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 13937 00001255 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13938 00001257 0404                    		add	al, 4
 13939 00001259 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 13940 0000125B 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13941 0000125D 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 13942 0000125F 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 13943                                  GotMediaType:				
 13944 00001261 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 13945                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13946                                  		; cf = 0
 13947                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 13948 00001264 C3                      		retn
 13949                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13950                                  
 13951                                  MediaSenseEr:				
 13952 00001265 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 13953 00001268 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 13954 0000126A B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 13955 0000126C 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 13956 0000126F 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 13957                                  UnknownMediaType:			
 13958 00001271 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 13959                                  SenseErrExit:				
 13960 00001273 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 13961 00001275 F9                      		stc
 13962 00001276 C3                      		retn
 13963                                  
 13964                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13965                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13966                                  		;db    0
 13967                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13968                                  
 13969                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13970                                  
 13971                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13972                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 13973                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13974                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 13975                                  
 13976                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 13977                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 13978                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 13979                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 13980                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 13981                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 13982                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 13983                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 13984                                  ;
 13985                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 13986                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 13987                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 13988                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 13989                                  ;
 13990                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 13991                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 13992                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 13993                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 13994                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 13995                                  ;
 13996                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 13997                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 13998                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 13999                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 14000                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 14001                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 14002                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 14003                                  
 14004                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 14005                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 14006                                  
 14007                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 14008                                  
 14009                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 14010 00001277 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 14011 0000127A 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 14012 0000127C 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 14013 0000127F 7431                    		jz	short mine
 14014                                  
 14015                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 14016                                  
 14017 00001281 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 14018 00001284 746C                    		jz	short win386call
 14019 00001286 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 14020 00001289 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 14021 0000128B E99700                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 14022                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14023                                  
 14024                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 14025 0000128E CF                      		iret
 14026                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14027                                  
 14028                                  int2f_replace_int13:			
 14029 0000128F 50                      		push	ax	; free up a register for caller's ds
 14030 00001290 8CD8                    		mov	ax, ds	; then we can use ds: -> Bios_Data
 14031                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h] ; 15/10/2022	
 14032                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 14033                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 14034 00001292 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 14035                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14036                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 14037                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 14038                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 14039                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2
 14040                                  		
 14041                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 14042                                  		;push	word [Orig13]
 14043 00001297 FF36[B600]              		push	word [Orig13+2]
 14044                                  		;push	word [Old13]
 14045 0000129B FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]
 14046                                  
 14047                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13, dx	; orig13 := addr. of new int_13
 14048                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax
 14049                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13, bx	; old13 := addr. of new boot_13
 14050                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es
 14051                                  		
 14052                                  		;mov	[Orig13], dx
 14053                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14054 0000129F 8716[B400]              		xchg	dx, [Orig13]
 14055 000012A3 A3[B600]                		mov	[Orig13+2], ax
 14056                                  		;mov	[Old13], bx
 14057                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14058 000012A6 871E[0601]              		xchg	bx, [Old13]
 14059 000012AA 8C06[0801]              		mov	[Old13+2], es
 14060                                  
 14061 000012AE 07                      		pop	es			; es:bx := old old13 vector
 14062                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14063                                  		;pop	bx
 14064 000012AF 1F                      		pop	ds			; ds:dx := old orig13 vector
 14065                                  		;pop	dx ; 02/09/2023
 14066 000012B0 58                      		pop	ax
 14067                                  i2f_iret:
 14068 000012B1 CF                      		iret
 14069                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14070                                  
 14071                                  mine:					
 14072 000012B2 3CF8                    		cmp	al, 0F8h 		; iret on reserved functions
 14073 000012B4 73FB                    		jnb	short i2f_iret
 14074 000012B6 08C0                    		or	al, al			; a get installed state request?
 14075 000012B8 7503                    		jnz	short disp_func

 14103 000012D4 EA[8D08]7000            		jmp	DOSBIOSSEG:i2f_dskentry ; 70h:i2f_dskentry
 14104                                  					; NOTE: jump to a FAR function, not an
 14105                                  					;  IRET type function. Callers of
 14106                                  					;  this int2f subfunction will have
 14107                                  					;  to be careful to do a popf

 14132 000012ED C53E[1901]              		lds	di, [start_bds]

 14134                                  ;ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022

 14137 000012F1 CF                      		iret
 14138                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14139                                  
 14140                                  ; 17/10/2022
 14141                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14142                                  
 14143                                  ; WIN386 startup stuff is done here. If starting up we set our WIN386 present
 14144                                  ; flag and return instance data. If exiting, we reset the WIN386 present flag
 14145                                  ; NOTE: We assume that the BIOS int 2fh is at the bottom of the chain.
 14146                                  
 14147                                  win386call:				
 14148 000012F2 1E                      		push	ds
 14149 000012F3 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 14150                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 14151                                  					; at 2C7h:30h =	70h:25A0h
 14152 000012F8 3C05                    		cmp	al, 5		; Win386_Init
 14153                                  					; is it	win386 initializing?
 14154 000012FA 7410                    		jz	short Win386Init
 14155 000012FC 3C06                    		cmp	al, 6		; Win386_Exit
 14156                                  					; is it	win386 exiting?
 14157 000012FE 7523                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not, continue int2f chain
 14158                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14159 00001300 F6C201                  		test	dl, 1
 14160                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it	win386 or win286 dos extender?
 14161 00001303 751E                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 14162                                  		;and	ds:IsWin386, 0	; indicate that	win386 is not present  
 14163 00001305 8026[C508]00            		and	byte [IsWin386], 0 
 14164 0000130A EB17                    		jmp	short win_iret
 14165                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14166                                  
 14167                                  Win386Init:	
 14168                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14169 0000130C F6C201                  		test	dl, 1			
 14170                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it win386 or win286 dos extender?
 14171 0000130F 7512                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 14172                                  		;or	ds:IsWin386, 1	; Indicate WIN386 present
 14173 00001311 800E[C508]01            		or	byte [IsWin386], 1
 14174                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:SI_Next, bx	; Hook our structure into chain
 14175                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:SI_Next+2, es
 14176 00001316 891E[9308]              		mov	[SI_Next], bx
 14177 0000131A 8C06[9508]              		mov	[SI_Next+2], es
 14178                                  		;mov	bx, offset Win386_SI ; point ES:BX to Win386_SI
 14179 0000131E BB[9108]                		mov	bx, Win386_SI	; 19/10/2022
 14180 00001321 1E                      		push	ds
 14181 00001322 07                      		pop	es
 14182                                  win_iret:
 14183 00001323 1F                      		pop	ds
 14184                                  ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022
 14185                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret	; return back up the chain
 14186                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14187 00001324 CF                      		iret

 14190                                  handle_multmult:			
 14191 00001325 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1
 14192 00001327 7514                    		jnz	short try_2
 14193 00001329 1E                      		push	ds
 14194 0000132A E84500                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 14195                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14196                                  		;xor	bx, bx
 14197                                  		;dec	bx
 14198 0000132D BBFFFF                  		mov	bx, 0FFFFh
 14199 00001330 8EC3                    		mov	es, bx		; seg of HMA
 14200 00001332 89FB                    		mov	bx, di
 14201 00001334 F7D3                    		not	bx
 14202 00001336 09DB                    		or	bx, bx
 14203 00001338 7401                    		jz	short try_1
 14204 0000133A 43                      		inc	bx
 14205                                  try_1:

 14207                                  		;jmp	short ii2f_iret
 14208                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14209 0000133C CF                      		iret

 14211                                  
 14212                                  try_2:					
 14213 0000133D 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; multMULTALLOCHMA
 14214 0000133F 7530                    		jnz	short try_3
 14215 00001341 1E                      		push	ds
 14216                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14217                                  		;xor	di, di
 14218                                  		;dec	di
 14219 00001342 BFFFFF                  		mov	di, 0FFFFh	; assume not enough space
 14220 00001345 8EC7                    		mov	es, di
 14221 00001347 E82800                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 14222 0000134A 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh

 14259                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14260                                  ;try_3:
