 15308                                  
 15309                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 15310                                  
 15311                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 15312                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 15313                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 15314                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 15315                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 15316                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 15317                                  
 15318                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 15319 0000171B 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 15320 0000171D 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 15320 00001726 736B6574746520666F-
 15320 0000172F 7220647269766520   
 15321                                  
 15322                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 15323 00001737 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 15323 00001740 65737320616E79206B-
 15323 00001749 6579207768656E2072-
 15323 00001752 656164790D0A       
 15324 00001758 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 15325                                  
 15326                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15327                                  
 15328                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15329                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15330                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 15331                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 15332                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15333                                  
 15334                                  chkopcnt:		
 15335 0000175A 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 15336 0000175F C3                      		retn
 15337                                  
 15338                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15339                                  
 15340                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15341                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 15342                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 15343                                  ;
 15344                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15345                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15346                                  
 15347                                  mediacheck:	
 15348 00001760 E8C9F0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 15349 00001763 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15350 00001765 E84D01                  		call	haschange
 15351 00001768 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 15352 0000176A E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 15353 0000176D 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 15354 0000176F 50                      		push	ax
 15355 00001770 52                      		push	dx
 15356 00001771 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15357                                  					; set logical drive number
 15358 00001775 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 15359 00001777 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 15360                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 15361                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 15362 00001779 5A                      		pop	dx
 15363 0000177A 58                      		pop	ax
 15364 0000177B 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 15365 0000177D BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 15366                                  
 15367                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 15368                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 15369                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 15370                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 15371                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 15372                                  ; status.
 15373                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15374 00001780 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 15375 00001784 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15376                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 15377                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 15378                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 15379                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 15380 00001788 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 15381                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 15382                                  
 15383                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 15384                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 15385                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 15386                                  
 15387 0000178A 50                      		push	ax
 15388 0000178B 51                      		push	cx
 15389 0000178C 52                      		push	dx
 15390 0000178D E8BEED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 15391 00001790 5A                      		pop	dx
 15392 00001791 59                      		pop	cx
 15393 00001792 58                      		pop	ax
 15394 00001793 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15395 00001795 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 15396                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 15397 00001797 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 15398                                  mediaret:				
 15399 00001799 C3                      		retn
 15400                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15401                                  
 15402                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 15403                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 15404                                  ; or write.
 15405                                  
 15406                                  mediadovolid:				
 15407 0000179A E856EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 15408 0000179D 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 15409 0000179F E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 15410 000017A2 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 15411 000017A4 E90AF4                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15412                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15413                                  
 15414                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 15415                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 15416                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 15417                                  ; dos.
 15418                                  ;
 15419                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 15420                                  
 15421                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15422                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 15423                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 15424                                  
 15425                                  checklatchio:	
 15426                                  
 15427                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 15428                                  			
 15429 000017A7 E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15430 000017AA 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 15431                                  
 15432                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 15433                                  
 15434 000017AC E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 15435 000017AF 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 15436                                  
 15437                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 15438                                  ; expensive verification.
 15439                                  
 15440 000017B1 E83FEE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 15441 000017B4 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 15442 000017B6 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 15443 000017B9 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 15444 000017BB 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15445 000017BD 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 15446 000017BF E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 15447                                  checklatchret:				
 15448 000017C2 E8ECF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15449                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 15450 000017C5 F9                      		stc
 15451 000017C6 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 15452                                  checkret:				
 15453 000017C7 C3                      		retn
 15454                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15455                                  
 15456                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 15457                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 15458                                  ;
 15459                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15460                                  
 15461                                  checkfatvid:				
 15462 000017C8 E8BC01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 15463 000017CB 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15464 000017CD 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 15465                                  
 15466                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 15467                                  
 15468                                  		; fall into check_vid
 15469                                  
 15470                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15471                                  
 15472                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 15473                                  ;
 15474                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 15475                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 15476                                  ;
 15477                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 15478                                  ;
 15479                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 15480                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 15481                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 15482                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 15483                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 15484                                  ;
 15485                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 15486                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 15487                                  ; routine.)
 15488                                  ;
 15489                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 15490                                  
 15491                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15492                                  check_vid:
 15493                                  
 15494                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 15495                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 15496                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 15497                                  
 15498 000017CF 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 15499                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 15500                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 15501 000017D4 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 15502 000017D6 E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 15503 000017D9 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 15504 000017DB 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15505 000017DD 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 15506                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 15507 000017E2 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 15508                                  					; if not fat system
 15509 000017E4 E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 15510 000017E7 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 15511 000017E9 E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 15512 000017EC BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15513                                  					; definitely changed
 15514 000017EF 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 15515                                  
 15516 000017F1 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 15517                                  vid_no_changed:				
 15518 000017F2 E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 15519                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15520                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 15521                                  		;clc
 15522                                  checkfatret:				
 15523 000017F5 C3                      		retn
 15524                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15525                                  
 15526                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15527                                  changed_drv:
 15528 000017F6 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 15529 000017F7 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 15530                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 15531 000017FC C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 15532                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15533                                  
 15534                                  ; extended id check
 15535                                  
 15536                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15537                                  
 15538                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 15539                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 15540                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 15541                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 15542                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 15543                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 15544                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 15545                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 15546                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 15547                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 15548                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 15549                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 15550                                  ;
 15551                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 15552                                  
 15553                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15554                                  do_ext_check_id:			
 15555 000017FD 50                      		push	ax
 15556                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 15557                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 15558 000017FE A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 15559                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15560 00001801 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15561 00001803 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 15562 00001807 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15563 00001809 A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 15564 0000180C 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 15565 00001810 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15566                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 15567                                  					; don't know
 15568 00001812 58                      		pop	ax
 15569 00001813 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 15570                                  					; reset the flag
 15571                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15572                                  
 15573                                  ext_changed:
 15574 00001815 58                      		pop	ax
 15575                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15576 00001816 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 15577                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15578                                  					; disk changed!
 15579                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15580                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 15581                                  		;clc
 15582 00001817 EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 15583                                  
 15584                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15585                                  
 15586                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 15587                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 15588                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 15589                                  ;
 15590                                  ; es:di -> bds
 15591                                  
 15592                                  checkio:				
 15593 00001819 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 15594 0000181C 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 15595 0000181E E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15596 00001821 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 15597 00001823 E8CDED                  		call	GetBp
 15598 00001826 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 15599 00001828 E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 15600 0000182B 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 15601 0000182D 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15602 0000182F 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 15603 00001831 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 15604 00001832 C3                      		retn
 15605                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15606                                  
 15607                                  checkioerr:				
 15608 00001833 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 15609                                  
 15610                                  checkioret:				
 15611 00001836 F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 15612 00001837 E928F3                  		jmp	harderr
 15613                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15614                                  
 15615                                  no_error_map:				
 15616 0000183A E928F3                  		jmp	harderr2
 15617                                  
 15618                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15619                                  
 15620                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 15621                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 15622                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 15623                                  
 15624                                  returnvid:		
 15625 0000183D BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 15626                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 15627 00001840 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 15628 00001843 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 15629 00001845 F9                      		stc
 15630 00001846 C3                      		retn
 15631                                  
 15632                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15633                                  
 15634                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 15635                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 15636                                  ;
 15637                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 15638                                  ; **trashes si**
 15639                                  
 15640                                  media_set_vid:				
 15641 00001847 BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 15642                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 15643                                  
 15644                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 15645                                  
 15646                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15647                                  
 15648                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 15649                                  
 15650                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15651                                  vid_into_packet:
 15652 0000184A 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 15653 0000184B C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 15654 0000184F 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15655 00001852 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 15656 00001854 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15657 00001857 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 15658 0000185A 1F                      		pop	ds
 15659                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 15660 0000185B C3                      		retn
 15661                                  
 15662                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15663                                  
 15664                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15665                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 15666                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 15667                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 15668                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 15669                                  ;
 15670                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 15671                                  ;		ah has media byte
 15672                                  ;
 15673                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 15674                                  ;		    no registers modified
 15675                                  ;		carry set
 15676                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 15677                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 15678                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 15679                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 15680                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 15681                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 15682                                  ;
 15683                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15684                                  
 15685                                  hidensity:
 15686                                  
 15687                                  ; check for correct drive
 15688                                  		
 15689                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15690 0000185C 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15691                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 15692                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 15693 00001861 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 15694                                  
 15695                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 15696                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 15697                                  
 15698 00001863 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 15699 00001868 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 15700                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 15701                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 15702 0000186A 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 15703 0000186D 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 15704                                  
 15705                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 15706                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 15707                                  
 15708                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15709 0000186F 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15710 00001873 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 15711                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15712                                  					; ffOther
 15713 00001875 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 15714 00001877 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 15715                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15716                                  					; ff288
 15717 00001879 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 15718 0000187B B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 15719 0000187D BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 15720                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 15721                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 15722 00001880 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 15723                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 15724                                  					; 2 sides
 15725                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15726 00001883 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 15727 00001884 BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 15728                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 15729                                  					; & head max
 15730                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15731 00001887 E9D2ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 15732                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15733                                  
 15734                                  Is720K:
 15735                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15736 0000188A 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 15737                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15738 0000188B E99BED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 15739                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15740                                  
 15741                                  		; 18/12/2022
 15742                                  ;dofloppy:
 15743                                  		;retn
 15744                                  
 15745                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15746                                  
 15747                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15748                                  
 15749                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15750                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 15751                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 15752                                  ;
 15753                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 15754                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 15755                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15756                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 15757                                  ;
 15758                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 15759                                  ;
 15760                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 15761                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15762                                  
 15763                                  set_changed_dl:	
 15764 0000188E 06                      		push	es
 15765 0000188F 57                      		push	di
 15766                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 15767                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15768 00001890 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 15769                                  
 15770                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 15771                                  
 15772                                  scan_bds:				
 15773 00001894 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15774 00001898 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 15775                                  
 15776                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 15777                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 15778                                  
 15779 0000189A 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15780                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 15781                                  get_next_bds:				
 15782 0000189E 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 15783                                  					; go to	next bds
 15784 000018A1 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 15785 000018A4 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 15786 000018A6 5F                      		pop	di
 15787 000018A7 07                      		pop	es
 15788 000018A8 C3                      		retn
 15789                                  
 15790                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15791                                  
 15792                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15793                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 15794                                  ;
 15795                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 15796                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 15797                                  ;		zero reset - change
 15798                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15799                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15800                                  
 15801                                  checkromchange:	
 15802                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 15803                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15804 000018A9 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 15805                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15806                                  					; fchanged
 15807 000018AE C3                      		retn
 15808                                  
 15809                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15810                                  
 15811                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15812                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 15813                                  ;
 15814                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15815                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15816                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15817                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15818                                  
 15819                                  resetchanged:	
 15820                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 15821                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15822 000018AF 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 15823                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15824                                  					; ~fchanged
 15825 000018B4 C3                      		retn
 15826                                  
 15827                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15828                                  
 15829                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15830                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 15831                                  ;
 15832                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15833                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 15834                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 15835                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15836                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15837                                  
 15838                                  haschange:
 15839                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 15840                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15841 000018B5 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15842                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15843                                  					; fchangeline
 15844 000018BA C3                      		retn
 15845                                  
 15846                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15847                                  
 15848                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15849                                  
 15850                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15851                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 15852                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15853                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 15854                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 15855                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15856                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15857                                  
 15858                                  ; set_volume_id
 15859                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 15860                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 15861                                  ;
 15862                                  ;   on entry:
 15863                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 15864                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 15865                                  ;
 15866                                  ;   on exit:
 15867                                  ;	carry clear:
 15868                                  ;	   successful call
 15869                                  ;	carry set
 15870                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 15871                                  
 15872                                  set_volume_id:				
 15873 000018BB 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 15874 000018BC 50                      		push	ax
 15875 000018BD E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 15876 000018C0 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 15877 000018C2 E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 15878 000018C5 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 15879 000018C7 E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 15880 000018CA E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 15881                                  setvret:				
 15882                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15883                                  		; cf = 0
 15884                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 15885 000018CD 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 15886 000018CE 5A                      		pop	dx
 15887 000018CF C3                      		retn
 15888                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15889                                  
 15890                                  seterr:					
 15891 000018D0 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 15892 000018D1 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 15893 000018D2 C3                      		retn
 15894                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15895 000018D3 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 15896                                  
 15897                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15898                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 15899                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15900                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 15901                                  
 15902                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15903                                  
 15904                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15905                                  
 15906                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15907                                  ;
 15908                                  ;   on entry:
 15909                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15910                                  ;
 15911                                  ;   on exit:
 15912                                  ;	carry clear
 15913                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 15914                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 15915                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 15916                                  ;
 15917                                  ;	carry set:
 15918                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 15919                                  
 15920                                  read_volume_id:
 15921 000018D5 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 15922 000018D6 51                      		push	cx
 15923 000018D7 53                      		push	bx
 15924 000018D8 50                      		push	ax
 15925 000018D9 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 15926 000018DA 57                      		push	di
 15927 000018DB 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 15928 000018DC 07                      		pop	es
 15929 000018DD BF[0009]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15930 000018E0 BE[F408]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15931 000018E3 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 15932 000018E6 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15933 000018E8 5F                      		pop	di
 15934 000018E9 07                      		pop	es
 15935 000018EA 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15936                                  					; # of fats
 15937 000018EE 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15938                                  					; sectors / fat
 15939 000018F2 F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15940 000018F4 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15941                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15942                                  					;
 15943                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15944                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15945 000018F8 2EA3[D318]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15946                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15947                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15948 000018FC 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15949                                  					; # root dir entries
 15950 00001900 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15951 00001902 D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15952                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15953                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 15954 00001904 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15955                                  next_sec:				
 15956 00001905 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15957 00001906 2EA1[D318]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15958                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15959                                  					; get sector #
 15960 0000190A 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15961                                  					; sectors / track
 15962 0000190E 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15963 00001910 F7F1                    		div	cx
 15964                                  
 15965                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15966                                  
 15967 00001912 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15968                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15969 00001913 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15970 00001915 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15971 00001917 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15972                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15973 0000191B 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15974 0000191D 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15975 0000191F E848EE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15976                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15977 00001922 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 15978 00001924 B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15979 00001927 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15980                                  fvid_loop:
 15981                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15982 00001929 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0
 15983                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15984 0000192B 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15985 0000192D 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15986 00001930 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15987 00001932 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15988 00001935 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15989                                  ent_loop:				
 15990 00001937 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15991 0000193A E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15992 0000193C 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15993 0000193D 2EFF06[D318]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15994                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15995                                  					; next sector
 15996 00001942 E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15997                                  notfound:
 15998                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15999                                  		;xor	si, si
 16000 00001944 EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 16001                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16002                                  
 16003                                  found_vid:
 16004                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16005                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  				
 16006 00001946 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 16007 00001947 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 16008 00001949 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 16009 0000194A 57                      		push	di
 16010 0000194B 1E                      		push	ds
 16011 0000194C 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 16012 0000194D BF[0009]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16013 00001950 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 16014                                  					; length of string minus nul
 16015 00001953 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 16016                                  		;xor	al, al
 16017                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16018 00001955 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 16019 00001956 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 16020                                  		;;xor	si, si
 16021                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16022                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 16023 00001957 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 16024 00001958 07                      		pop	es
 16025                                  fvid_ret:
 16026                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16027 00001959 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 16028                                  				
 16029 0000195B 58                      		pop	ax
 16030                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16031                                  		; cf = 0
 16032                                  		;clc
 16033                                  rvidret:
 16034 0000195C 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 16035 0000195D 59                      		pop	cx
 16036 0000195E 5A                      		pop	dx
 16037 0000195F C3                      		retn
 16038                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16039                                  
 16040                                  no_vid:
 16041 00001960 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 16042                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 16043                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16044 00001961 EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 16045                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16046                                  
 16047                                  readviderr:				
 16048 00001963 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 16049 00001964 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 16050 00001965 EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 16051                                  
 16052                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16053                                  
 16054                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 16055                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 16056                                  preset_volid_addr:
 16057 00001967 BE[0009]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 16058                                  		;
 16059                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 16060                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 16061                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 16062                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 16063 0000196A 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16064 0000196D B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 16065                                  		;
 16066 00001970 FC                      		cld
 16067 00001971 C3                      		retn
 16068                                  
 16069                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16070                                  
 16071                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 16072                                  ;
 16073                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 16074                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 16075                                  
 16076                                  transfer_volume_id:
 16077 00001972 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 16078                                  		;push	si
 16079 00001973 51                      		push	cx
 16080                                  		; 27/12/2023
 16081 00001974 56                      		push	si
 16082                                  
 16083                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16084                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 16085                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16086                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 16087                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 16088                                  		;cld
 16089                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16090 00001975 E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 16091                                  
 16092 00001978 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 16093                                  		
 16094                                  		; 27/12/2023
 16095 0000197A 5E                      		pop	si
 16096                                  chk_volid_ok:
 16097 0000197B 59                      		pop	cx
 16098                                  		;pop	si
 16099 0000197C 5F                      		pop	di
 16100 0000197D C3                      		retn
 16101                                  
 16102                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16103                                  
 16104                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 16105                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 16106                                  ;
 16107                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 16108                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 16109                                  
 16110                                  check_volume_id:
 16111 0000197E 57                      		push	di
 16112 0000197F 51                      		push	cx
 16113                                  		
 16114                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16115                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 16116                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16117                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 16118                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 16119                                  		;cld
 16120                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16121 00001980 E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 16122                                  
 16123 00001983 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 16124                                  		
 16125                                  		; 27/12/2023
 16126                                  		;pop	cx
 16127                                  		;pop	di
 16128                                  		;retn
 16129 00001985 EBF4                    		jmp	short chk_volid_ok
 16130                                  
 16131                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16132                                  
 16133                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 16134                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 16135                                  ;
 16136                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 16137                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 16138                                  ;
 16139                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 16140                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 16141                                  ;
 16142                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 16143                                  
 16144                                  fat_check:
 16145 00001987 50                      		push	ax
 16146 00001988 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 16147 0000198A A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 16148 0000198D 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 16149                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 16150 00001991 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 16151 00001993 4E                      		dec	si
 16152                                  okret1:
 16153 00001994 58                      		pop	ax
 16154 00001995 C3                      		retn
 16155                                  
 16156                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16157                                  
 16158                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 16159                                  		;times 7 db 0
 16160                                  
 16161                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 16162                                  
 16163                                  		; 09/12/2022
 16164                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 16165                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 16166                                  
 16167                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16168                                  
 16169                                  		; 09/12/2022
 16170                                  		;db 0
 16171                                  
 16172                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 16173                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 16174                                  
 16175                                  %if (number2mod>0) & (number2mod<16) ; 17/09/2023
 16176 00001996 00<rep Ah>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 16177                                  %endif
 16178                                  
 16179                                  ;align 16
 16180                                  
 16181                                  ; 09/12/2022
 16182                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 16183                                  ; 29/09/2023
 16184                                  BCODEEND:
 16185                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 16186                                  ; 13/12/2022
 16187                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 16188                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 16189                                  
 16190                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------

 16201                                  ;=============================================================================
 16202                                  ; (IO.SYS) SYSINIT SEGMENT 
 16203                                  ;=============================================================================
 16204                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 16205                                  
 16206                                  section .SYSINIT vstart=0
 16207                                  
 16208                                  ; ****************************************************************************
 16209                                  ; SYSINIT.BIN (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) - RETRO DOS v4.0 by ERDOGAN TAN - 21/10/2022
 16210                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16211                                  ; Last Update: 04/01/2023 (Modified IO.SYS)  ((Previous: 31/12/2022))
 16212                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16213                                  ; Beginning: 03/06/2018 (Retro DOS 3.0), 21/03/2019 (Retro DOS 4.0)
 16214                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16215                                  ; Assembler: NASM version 2.15
 16216                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16217                                  ;	   ((nasm sysinit5.s -l sysinit5.lst -o SYSINIT5.BIN -Z error.txt)) 	
 16218                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16219                                  ; Modified from 'sysinit2.s' (SYSINIT2.BIN) file of Retro DOS v3.0 (6/7/2018)
 16220                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16221                                  ; Derived from 'SYSINIT1.ASM' and 'SYSINIT2.ASM' files of MSDOS 6.0
 16222                                  ; source code by Microsoft, 1991 
 16223                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16224                                  ; Derived from 'SYSINIT.ASM' file of MSDOS 2.0 (IBM PCDOS v2.0) source code
 16225                                  ; by Microsoft, 12/10/1983
 16226                                  ; ****************************************************************************
 16227                                  ; main file: 'retrodos4.s'
 16228                                  ; incbin 'SYSINIT3.BIN' ; (SYINITSEG)
 16229                                  
 16230                                  ; 21/10/2022
 16231                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16232                                  ; This source code (version) is based on SYSINIT source code of disassembled
 16233                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS file (SYSINIT.BIN) 
 16234                                  ; Dissassembler: Hex-Rays Interactive Disassembler (IDA)
 16235                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16236                                  ; Binary file splitter & joiner: FFSJ v3.3
 16237                                  
 16238                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 16239                                  ; SYSINIT.TXT (27/01/1983)
 16240                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 16241                                  ;    SYSINIT is  a module linked behind the OEM bios.  It takes
 16242                                  ;over  the  system  initialization  after  the  OEM  bios   has
 16243                                  ;performed any  initialization  it  needs  to  do.   Control is
 16244                                  ;transfered with a long jump to the external  variable  SYSINIT
 16245                                  ;
 16246                                  ;
 16247                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared external:
 16248                                  ;
 16249                                  ;   CURRENT_DOS_LOCATION    WORD
 16250                                  ;
 16251                                  ;This word  contains  the  segment  number of the DOS before it
 16252                                  ;is relocated.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 16253                                  ;
 16254                                  ;   FINAL_DOS_LOCATION      WORD
 16255                                  ;
 16256                                  ;This word contains the segment number of the DOS after SYSINIT
 16257                                  ;moves it.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 16258                                  ;
 16259                                  ;   DEVICE_LIST             DWORD
 16260                                  ;
 16261                                  ;This  double  word  pointer  points  to  the  linked  list  of
 16262                                  ;character and block device drivers.  The  OEM  must  set  this
 16263                                  ;value.
 16264                                  ;
 16265                                  ;   MEMORY_SIZE             WORD
 16266                                  ;
 16267                                  ;This word  contains  the  number  of  RAM  paragraphs.  If the
 16268                                  ;bios doesn't set  this  variable  SYSINIT  will  automatically
 16269                                  ;calculate it.   NOTE:  systems with PARITY checked memory must
 16270                                  ;size memory in the BIOS.  SYSINITs method is to  write  memory
 16271                                  ;and read it back until it gets a mismatch.
 16272                                  ;
 16273                                  ;   DEFAULT_DRIVE           BYTE
 16274                                  ;
 16275                                  ;This is  the initial default drive when the system first comes
 16276                                  ;up.  drive a=0, drive b=1,  etc.   If  the  bios  doesn't  set
 16277                                  ;it then drive a is assumed.
 16278                                  ;
 16279                                  ;   BUFFERS                 BYTE
 16280                                  ;
 16281                                  ;This is  the  default  number of buffers for the system.  This
 16282                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 16283                                  ;It is DBed to 2 in SYSINIT it should be greater than 1.
 16284                                  ;
 16285                                  ;   FILES                   BYTE
 16286                                  ;
 16287                                  ;This is  the  default  number  of  files for the system.  This
 16288                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 16289                                  ;It is  DBed  to  8 in SYSINIT, values less than 5 are ignored.
 16290                                  ;
 16291                                  ;   SYSINIT                 FAR
 16292                                  ;
 16293                                  ;The entry  point  of  the  SYSINIT  module.  OEM BIOS jumps to
 16294                                  ;this label at the end of its INIT code.
 16295                                  ;
 16296                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared public:
 16297                                  ;
 16298                                  ;   RE_INIT                 FAR
 16299                                  ;
 16300                                  ;This is an entry point which allows the BIOS to do some INIT
 16301                                  ;work  after  the  DOS is initialized.  ALL REGISTERS MUST BE
 16302                                  ;PRESERVED.  On entry DS points to the first available memory
 16303                                  ;(after  the DOS).  DS:0 points to a 100H byte program header
 16304                                  ;prefix which represents  the  "program"  currently  running.
 16305                                  ;This  program  should  be  thought  of  as  the OEM BIOS and
 16306                                  ;SYSINIT taken together.  This is not  a  normal  program  in
 16307                                  ;that  no  memory  is  allocated to it, it is running in free
 16308                                  ;memory.
 16309                                  ;NOTES:
 16310                                  ;     At the time this routine is called SYSINIT occupies the
 16311                                  ;highest 10K of memory ("highest" is determined by the  value
 16312                                  ;of the MEMORY_SIZE variable), DO NOT DO WRITES THERE.
 16313                                  ;     Since this is called AFTER DOS is initialized, you can
 16314                                  ;make system calls.  This also implies that the code for this
 16315                                  ;routine    CANNOT   be   thrown   away   by   use   of   the
 16316                                  ;FINAL_DOS_LOCATION since the DOS has already been moved.
 16317                                  ;     If you don't want  anything done just set this to point
 16318                                  ;at a FAR RET instruction.
 16319                                  
 16320                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16321                                  ; TITLE   BIOS SYSTEM INITIALIZATION
 16322                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16323                                  
 16324                                  ;include version.inc
 16325                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16326                                  
 16327                                  ;FALSE   EQU     0
 16328                                  ;TRUE    EQU     0FFFFh
 16329                                  
 16330                                  ;IBMVER	    EQU     TRUE
 16331                                  ;IBMCOPYRIGHT EQU   FALSE
 16332                                  ;STACKSW    EQU	    TRUE		;Include Switchable Hardware Stacks
 16333                                  ;IBMJAPVER  EQU     FALSE		; If TRUE set KANJI true also
 16334                                  ;MSVER      EQU     FALSE
 16335                                  ;ALTVECT    EQU     FALSE		; Switch to build ALTVECT version
 16336                                  ;KANJI      EQU     FALSE
 16337                                  
 16338                                  ;(MSDOS 6.0, versiona.inc, 1991)
 16339                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16340                                  ;MAJOR_VERSION  EQU	6
 16341                                  ;;MINOR_VERSION	EQU	0	;6.00
 16342                                  ;MINOR_VERSION  EQU	21	;6.21  ; 21/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 16343                                  
 16344                                  ; 22/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0)
 16345                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16346                                  MAJOR_VERSION   EQU	5
 16347                                  MINOR_VERSION   EQU	0
 16348                                  
 16349                                  expected_version equ	(MINOR_VERSION<<8)+MAJOR_VERSION
 16350                                  
 16351                                  ;DOSREVNM equ	00000000b       ; m037 - bits 0-2 = revision number of DOS
 16352                                  				; currently 0.
 16353                                  DOSREVNM equ	00000111b	; [[[ 7 for Retro DOS v4.0 ]]] (21/03/2019)	
 16354                                  DOSINROM equ	00001000B       ; bit 3 of ver flags returned in BH
 16355                                  DOSINHMA equ	00010000B       ; bit 4 of ver flags 
 16356                                  
 16357                                  ;      if1
 16358                                  ;      %OUT  ... for DOS Version 5.00 ...
 16359                                  ;      endif
 16360                                  
 16361                                         ;******************************
 16362                                         ;Each assembler program should:
 16363                                         ;  mov ah,030h                   ;DOS Get Version function
 16364                                         ;  int 021h                      ;Version ret. in AX,minor version first
 16365                                         ;  cmp ax,expected_version       ;ALL utilities should check for an
 16366                                         ;  jne error_handler             ; EXACT version match.
 16367                                         ;******************************
 16368                                  
 16369                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16370                                  ; device definitions
 16371                                  
 16372                                  ;Attribute bit masks
 16373                                  DEVTYP  EQU     8000h           ;Bit 15 - 1  if Char, 0 if block
 16374                                  DEVIOCTL EQU    4000h           ;Bit 14 - CONTROL mode bit
 16375                                  ISFATBYDEV EQU  2000h           ;Bit 13 - Device uses FAT ID bytes, comp media.
 16376                                  ISCIN   EQU     0001h           ;Bit 0 - This device is the console input.
 16377                                  ISCOUT  EQU     0002h           ;Bit 1 - This device is the console output.
 16378                                  ISNULL  EQU     0004h           ;Bit 2 - This device is the null device.
 16379                                  ISCLOCK EQU     0008h           ;Bit 3 - This device is the clock device.
 16380                                  ISIBM   EQU     0010h           ;Bit 4 - This device is special
 16381

 16383                                  struc	SYSDEV
 16384 00000000 ????????                .NEXT:		resd 1		;Pointer to next device header
 16385 00000004 ????                    .ATT:		resw 1		;Attributes of the device
 16386 00000006 ????                    .STRAT:		resw 1		;Strategy entry point
 16387 00000008 ????                    .INT:		resw 1		;Interrupt entry point
 16388 0000000A ????????????????        .NAME:		resb 8		;Name of device (only first byte used for block)
 16389                                  .size:
 16390                                  endstruc
