 31720                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 31721                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 31722                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 31723                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 31724                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31725                                  
 31726                                  findUMB:
 31727                                  	push	ax
 31728                                  	push	cx
 31729                                  	push	dx
 31730                                  
 31731                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 31732                                  
 31733                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 31734                                  
 31735                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 31736                                  	mov	es,ax
 31737                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 31738                                  
 31739                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 31740                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 31741                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 31742                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 31743                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 31744                                  
 31745                                  fu10:	
 31746                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 31747                                  	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 31748                                  
 31749                                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 31750                                  	jnz	short fu20
 31751                                  
 31752                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 31753                                  fu20:	
 31754                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31755                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31756                                  	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31757                                  
 31758                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 31759                                  	mov     ax,es
 31760                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31761                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31762                                  	inc     ax
 31763                                  	mov     es,ax
 31764                                  
 31765                                  	jmp	short fu10
 31766                                  fuE:	
 31767                                  	stc
 31768                                  fuX:
 31769                                  	pop	dx
 31770                                  	pop	cx
 31771                                  	pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 31772                                  	retn
 31773                                  
 31774                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31775                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 31776                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31777                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 31778                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 31779                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 31780                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 31781                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31782                                  
 31783                                  BigFree:
 31784                                  	push	bx
 31785                                  	push	cx
 31786                                  
 31787                                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 31788                                  	jc	short bfX		; (would be "jc bfE"; it just does stc)
 31789                                  
 31790                                  	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 31791                                  	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 31792                                  
 31793                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 31794                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 31795                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 31796                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 31797                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 31798                                  
 31799                                  bf10:	
 31800                                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 31801                                  	jz	short bf30
 31802                                  
 31803                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 31804                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 31805                                  	jnz	short bf20
 31806                                  
 31807                                  	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31808                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 31809                                  	cmp	cx,ax
 31810                                  	jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 31811                                  
 31812                                  	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 31813                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 31814                                  	mov	cx,ax
 31815                                  
 31816                                  bf20:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31817                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 31818                                  	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 31819                                  
 31820                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 31821                                  	mov     ax,es
 31822                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31823                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31824                                  	inc     ax
 31825                                  	mov     es,ax
 31826                                  
 31827                                  	jmp	short bf10
 31828                                  
 31829                                  bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 31830                                  	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 31831                                  	or	bx,bx
 31832                                  	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 31833                                  bfE:	
 31834                                  	stc
 31835                                  bfX:
 31836                                  	pop	cx
 31837                                  	pop	bx
 31838                                  	retn
 31839                                  
 31840                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31841                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 31842                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31843                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 31844                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 31845                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31846                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31847                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31848                                  
 31849                                  isSpecified:
 31850                                  	push	ax
 31851                                  
 31852                                  	xor	bh,bh
 31853                                  	mov	bl,al
 31854                                  
 31855                                  	;getdata al, DS:UmbUsed[bx]
 31856                                  	;
 31857                                  	;push	ds
 31858                                  	;push	cs
 31859                                  	;pop	ds
 31860                                  	;mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 31861                                  	;pop	ds
 31862                                  	
 31863                                  	mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 31864                                  	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 31865                                  
 31866                                  	pop	ax
 31867                                  	retn
 31868                                  
 31869                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31870                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 31871                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31872                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 31873                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 31874                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 31875                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31876                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31877                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 31878                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 31879                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 31880                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 31881                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 31882                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31883                                  
 31884                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 31885                                  
 31886                                  shrinkMCB:
 31887                                  	;pushreg <bx, cx, es>
 31888                                  	push	bx
 31889                                  	push	cx
 31890                                  	push	es
 31891                                  
 31892                                  	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 31893                                  	mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 31894                                  
 31895                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31896                                  	sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 31897                                  	;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 31898                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 31899                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31900                                  	cmp	cx,bx
 31901                                  	jb	short smE ; (*)
 31902                                  
 31903                                  	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31904                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31905                                  
 31906                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 31907                                  	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 31908                                  
 31909                                  	add	ax,bx
 31910                                  	inc	ax
 31911                                  	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 31912                                  
 31913                                  	mov	ax,cx
 31914                                  	sub	ax,bx
 31915                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31916                                  	; ax > 0
 31917                                  	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 31918                                  
 31919                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31920                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 31921                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 31922                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 31923                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31924                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 31925                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 31926                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 31927                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 31928                                  
 31929                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31930                                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 31931                                  
 31932                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31933                                  	; cf=0
 31934                                  	;clc
 31935                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31936                                  	;jmp	short smX
 31937                                  smE:	
 31938                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31939                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 31940                                  	;stc
 31941                                  smX:	
 31942                                  	;popreg	<es, cx, bx>
 31943                                  	pop	es
 31944                                  	pop	cx
 31945                                  	pop	bx
 31946                                  	retn
 31947                                  
 31948                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31949                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 31950                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31951                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 31952                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 31953                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31954                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 31955                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31956                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 31957                                  ;
 31958                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 31959                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 31960                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 31961                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 31962                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 31963                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 31964                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 31965                                  ;       Endif
 31966                                  ;    Endif
 31967                                  ; Endif
 31968                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 31969                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 31970                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 31971                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 31972                                  ;    ENDIF
 31973                                  ; ENDIF
 31974                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31975                                  
 31976                                  _hideUMB_:
 31977                                  	push	bx
 31978                                  	push	dx
 31979                                  	push	es
 31980                                  
 31981                                  	mov	al,cl
 31982                                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 31983                                  	jz	short hu_20
 31984                                  
 31985                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 31986                                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 31987                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 31988                                  
 31989                                  	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 31990                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 31991                                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 31992                                  	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 31993                                  
 31994                                  	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 31995                                  	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 31996                                  
 31997                                  	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 31998                                  	jbe	short hu_10
 31999                                  
 32000                                  	mov	al,cl		;   Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 32001                                  	call	unMarkUMB
 32002                                  	jmp	short hu_20
 32003                                  hu_10:	
 32004                                  	call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 32005                                  	jz	short hu_20
 32006                                  
 32007                                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 32008                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 32009                                  
 32010                                  	mov	dx,es
 32011                                  	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 32012                                  
 32013                                  hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 32014                                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 32015                                  	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 32016                                  
 32017                                  	xor	dx,dx
 32018                                  hu_30:	
 32019                                  	mov	al,cl
 32020                                  
 32021                                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 32022                                  
 32023                                  	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 32024                                  	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 32025                                  
 32026                                  	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 32027                                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 32028                                  hu_X:	
 32029                                  	pop	es
 32030                                  	pop	dx
 32031                                  	pop	bx
 32032                                  	retn
 32033                                  
 32034                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32035                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 32036                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32037                                  ; Entry:  None
 32038                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 32039                                  ; Error:  None
 32040                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 32041                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32042                                  
 32043                                  UnFreeze:
 32044                                  	push	ax
 32045                                  	push	es
 32046                                  
 32047                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 32048                                  	jc	short ufX
 32049                                  
 32050                                  	mov	es,ax
 32051                                  
 32052                                  ; ------------------------------
 32053                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 32054                                  ; ------------------------------
 32055                                  
 32056                                  uf10:	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 32057                                  	jnz	short uf20
 32058                                  	call	unHideMCB
 32059                                  uf20:	
 32060                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32061                                  
 32062                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32063                                  	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 32064                                  
 32065                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 32066                                  	mov     ax,es
 32067                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32068                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32069                                  	inc     ax
 32070                                  	mov     es,ax
 32071                                  
 32072                                  	jmp	short uf10
 32073                                  ufX:	
 32074                                  	pop	es
 32075                                  	pop	ax
 32076                                  	retn
 32077                                  
 32078                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32079                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN
 32080                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32081                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 32082                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 32083                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32084                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32085                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32086                                  
 32087                                  isFrozMCB:
 32088                                  	;push	ax
 32089                                  
 32090                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 32091                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 32092                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner
 32093                                  	jne	short ifmX
 32094                                  
 32095                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+0]
 32096                                  	;cmp	ax,'FR' ; 5246h
 32097                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 32098                                  	jne	short ifmX
 32099                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 32100                                  	;cmp	ax,'OZ' ; 5A4Fh
 32101                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 32102                                  	jne	short ifmX
 32103                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 32104                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 32105                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 32106                                  	jne	short ifmX
 32107                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 32108                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 32109                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 32110                                  ifmX:	
 32111                                  	;pop	ax
 32112                                  	retn
 32113                                  
 32114                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32115                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0
 32116                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32117                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 32118                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB frozen
 32119                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32120                                  ; USES:     None
 32121                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32122                                  
 32123                                  frezMCB:
 32124                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 32125                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 32126                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 32127                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 32128                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 32129                                  	retn
 32130                                  
 32131                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32132                                  ;*** FreezeUM - Marks FROZEN all UM elements now FREE, save those in load UMB
 32133                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32134                                  ; Entry:  None
 32135                                  ; Exit:   None; all free elements not in load UMB marked as 8+FROZEN
 32136                                  ; Error:  None
 32137                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 32138                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32139                                  
 32140                                  FreezeUM:
 32141                                  	push	ax
 32142                                  	push	cx
 32143                                  	push	dx
 32144                                  	push	es
 32145                                  
 32146                                  	;call	GetLoadUMB
 32147                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32148                                  
 32149                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 32150                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the load UMB in DX, so we can skip it
 32151                                  
 32152                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 32153                                  	mov	es,ax
 32154                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 32155                                  
 32156                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 32157                                  ; FUM10--ES - Current MCB address
 32158                                  ;        CX - Current UMB number
 32159                                  ;        DX - UMB number to skip (load UMB)
 32160                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 32161                                  
 32162                                  fum10:	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 32163                                  	jnz	short fum20
 32164                                  
 32165                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 32166                                  fum20:	
 32167                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If this is the load UMB, we don't want to
 32168                                  	je	short fum30	; freeze anything... so skip that section.
 32169                                  
 32170                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Oh. If it's not free, we can't freeze it
 32171                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 32172                                  	jnz	short fum30	; either.
 32173                                  
 32174                                  	call	frezMCB
 32175                                  fum30:	
 32176                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32177                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32178                                  	je	short fumX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 32179                                  
 32180                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 32181                                  	mov     ax,es
 32182                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32183                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32184                                  	inc     ax
 32185                                  	mov     es,ax
 32186                                  	
 32187                                  	jmp	short fum10
 32188                                  
 32189                                  fumX:	pop	es
 32190                                  	pop	dx
 32191                                  	pop	cx
 32192                                  	pop	ax
 32193                                  	retn
 32194                                  
 32195                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32196                                  ;*** UmbTest - returns with carry set if UMBs are not available, else CF==false
 32197                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32198                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 32199                                  ; EXIT:     Carry is clear if UMBs are available, or set if they are not
 32200                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32201                                  ; USES:     CF (AX,BX,DS,ES pushed 'cause they're used by others)
 32202                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32203                                  
 32204                                  UmbTest:
 32205                                  	push	ax
 32206                                  	push	bx
 32207                                  	push	ds
 32208                                  	push	es
 32209                                  
 32210                                  	call	fm_link			; Link in UMBs (if not already linked)
 32211                                  	call	WalkMem			; Check to see if they're really linked
 32212                                  	pushf				; And remember what we found out
 32213                                  	call	fm_unlink		; Unlink UMBs (if WE have linked 'em)
 32214                                  	popf				; And restore what we found out.
 32215                                  
 32216                                  	pop	es
 32217                                  	pop	ds
 32218                                  	pop	bx
 32219                                  	pop	ax
 32220                                  	retn
 32221                                  
 32222                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32223                                  ;*** WalkMem - travels memory chain and returns carry clear iff UMBs are linked
 32224                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32225                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 32226                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.
 32227                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32228                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32229                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32230                                  
 32231                                  WalkMem:
 32232                                  	push	ax ; ?
 32233                                  	push	bx ; ?
 32234                                  	push	es ; ? no need to save contents of these registers ?
 32235                                  		   	
 32236                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 32237                                  	int	21h
 32238                                  
 32239                                  	mov	ax,[es:bx-2]
 32240                                  	mov	es,ax
 32241                                  
 32242                                  ; ------------------------------
 32243                                  ; UM10: ES = Current MCB pointer
 32244                                  ; ------------------------------
 32245                                  
 32246                                  um10:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32247                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ;  'Z'
 32248                                  	je	short um20		; If signature == 'Z', hay no more.
 32249                                  
 32250                                  	;NextMCB es, bx			; Move to the next MCB
 32251                                  
 32252                                  	mov     bx,es
 32253                                  	;add	bx,[es:3]
 32254                                  	add     bx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32255                                  	inc     bx
 32256                                  	mov     es,bx
 32257                                  		
 32258                                  	jmp	short um10		; And restart the loop.
 32259                                  um20:	
 32260                                  	mov	ax,es
 32261                                  
 32262                                  	cmp	ax,9FFFh		; This sets CF iff ax < 9FFF.
 32263                                  
 32264                                  	pop	es ; ?
 32265                                  	pop	bx ; ?
 32266                                  	pop	ax ; ?
 32267                                  	retn
 32268                                  
 32269                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32270                                  ;*** hl_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0; restores strategy too
 32271                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32272                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 32273                                  ; EXIT:     None
 32274                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32275                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 32276                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32277                                  
 32278                                  hl_unlink:
 32279                                  	xor	bh,bh
 32280                                  
 32281                                  	;getdata bl,fm_umb		; Restore original link-state
 32282                                  	;
 32283                                  	;push	ds
 32284                                  	;push	cs
 32285                                  	;pop	ds
 32286                                  	;mov	bl,[fm_umb]
 32287                                  	;pop	ds
 32288                                  
 32289                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]
 32290                                  
 32291                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 32292                                  	int	21h
 32293                                  	retn
 32294                                  
 32295                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32296                                  ; HIGHEXIT.INC (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 32297                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32298                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32299                                  
 32300                                  ;   Module:   HIGHEXIT.INC - Code executed after LoadHigh or DeviceHigh
 32301                                  ;   Date:     May 14, 1992
 32302                                  
 32303                                  ;   Modification log:
 32304                                  ;
 32305                                  ;     DATE    WHO      DESCRIPTION
 32306                                  ;   --------  -------  --------------------------------------------------------
 32307                                  ;   05/14/92  t-richj  Original
 32308                                  ;   06/21/92  t-richj  Final revisions before check-in
 32309                                  
 32310                                  UMB_HeadIdx	equ	8Ch	; Offset from ES (after func52h) to get UMBHead
 32311                                  
 32312                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32313                                  ;*** UnHideUMBs - Marks HIDDEN elements as FREE
 32314                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32315                                  ; ENTRY:  None; perhaps, earlier, HideUMBs was called... if not, we have
 32316                                  ;               very little to do, as no elelments will be marked as HIDDEN.
 32317                                  ; EXIT:   Sets InHigh to zero; carry clear if HideUMBs was called earlier.
 32318                                  ; ERROR:  None
 32319                                  ; USES:   fInHigh (from highvar.inc), carry flag
 32320                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32321                                  
 32322                                  UnHideUMBs:
 32323                                  	push	ax		; Save ax for what we're about to do
 32324                                  
 32325                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32326                                  ; BUGBUG t-richj 11-8-92: The following six lines were commented out for a good
 32327                                  ;    length of time. Those six constitute a check of whether or not we should
 32328                                  ;    indeed clean up the upper-memory chain; without such a check, COMMAND.COM
 32329                                  ;    will destroy the current link-state and memory-allocation strategy after
 32330                                  ;    every command execution.
 32331                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32332                                  
 32333                                  	;getdata al,fInHigh	; Get InHigh from data segment
 32334                                  	;
 32335                                  	;push	ds
 32336                                  	;push	cs
 32337                                  	;pop	ds
 32338                                  	;mov	al,[fInHigh]
 32339                                  	;pop	ds	
 32340                                  
 32341                                  	mov	al,[cs:fInHigh]
 32342                                  
 32343                                  	or	al,al
 32344                                  	jnz	short uhu10	; If didn't call loadhigh/devicehigh earlier,
 32345                                  
 32346                                  	pop	ax		; then there's nothing to do here... so
 32347                                  	stc			; restore everything and return. Just like
 32348                                  	retn			; that.
 32349                                  uhu10:	
 32350                                  	call	linkumb		; Make sure UMBs are linked in.
 32351                                  	call	FreeUMBs
 32352                                  
 32353                                  	;putdata fInHigh,0	; We're leaving, so update fInHigh.
 32354                                  	;
 32355                                  	;push	es
 32356                                  	;push	cs
 32357                                  	;pop	es
 32358                                  	;mov	byte [es:fInHigh],0
 32359                                  	;pop	ds	
 32360                                  
 32361                                  	mov	byte [cs:fInHigh],0	
 32362                                  
 32363                                  	call	he_unlink	; Unlink UMBs
 32364                                  
 32365                                  	pop	ax
 32366                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32367                                  	;clc	; 12/12/2022 (this clc may not be necessary!?)
 32368                                  	retn
 32369                                  
 32370                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32371                                  ;*** he_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0
 32372                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32373                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 32374                                  ; EXIT:     None
 32375                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32376                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 32377                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32378                                  
 32379                                  he_unlink:
 32380                                  	xor	bh, bh
 32381                                  
 32382                                  	;getdata bl, fm_umb	; Restore original link-state
 32383                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]	
 32384                                  
 32385                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 32386                                  	int	21h
 32387                                  	retn
 32388                                  
 32389                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32390                                  ;*** freeUMBs - frees all HIDDEN memory elements in upper-memory.
 32391                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32392                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 32393                                  ; EXIT:     None; HIDDEN memory elements returned to FREE
 32394                                  ; ERROR:    None (ignore CF)
 32395                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32396                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32397                                  
 32398                                  FreeUMBs:
 32399                                  	push	ax
 32400                                  	push	es
 32401                                  
 32402                                  	call	HeadUmb		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 32403                                  	jc	short fusX
 32404                                  
 32405                                  	mov	es,ax		; Prepare for the loop; ES = current MCB addr.
 32406                                  fus10:	
 32407                                  	call	isHideMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 32408                                  	jnz	short fus20
 32409                                  	call	freeMCB
 32410                                  fus20:	   
 32411                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32412                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32413                                  	jz	short fusX	; That means this was the last MCB--that's it.
 32414                                  
 32415                                  	mov	ax,es
 32416                                  	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32417                                  	inc	ax
 32418                                  	mov	es,ax		; Go on forward.
 32419                                  
 32420                                  	jmp	short fus10
 32421                                  fusX:	
 32422                                  	pop	es
 32423                                  	pop	ax
 32424                                  	retn
 32425                                  
 32426                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32427                                  ;*** isHideMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is HIDDEN
 32428                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32429                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 32430                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF
 32431                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32432                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32433                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32434                                  
 32435                                  isHideMCB:
 32436                                  	;push	ax
 32437                                  
 32438                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; If the owner's SYSTEM
 32439                                  	jne	short ihm_x				; then check for HIDDEN
 32440                                  
 32441                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]
 32442                                  	;cmp	ax,'HI' ; 4948h
 32443                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'HI'
 32444                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 32445                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 32446                                  	;cmp	ax,'DD' ; 4444h
 32447                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 32448                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 32449                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 32450                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 32451                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 32452                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 32453                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 32454                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 32455                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 32456                                  ihm_x:	
 32457                                  	;pop	ax
 32458                                  	retn
 32459                                  
 32460                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32461                                  ;*** freeMCB - marks as free the MCB at ES:0
 32462                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32463                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 32464                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB free'd
 32465                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32466                                  ; USES:     AX
 32467                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32468                                  
 32469                                  freeMCB:
 32470                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 32471                                  	mov	ax,'  '
 32472                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 32473                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 32474                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 32475                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 32476                                  	retn
 32477                                  
 32478                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32479                                  ;*** HeadUmb - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 32480                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32481                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 32482                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 32483                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 32484                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 32485                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32486                                  
 32487                                  HeadUmb:
 32488                                  	; 13/05/2019
 32489                                  
 32490                                  	;push	si ; ?
 32491                                  	;push	ds ; ?
 32492                                  	;push	es
 32493                                  	;push	bx ; *
 32494                                  
 32495                                  	; 09/04/2019
 32496                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 32497                                  
 32498                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 32499                                  	int	21h
 32500                                  			; DOS - 2+ internal - GET LIST OF LISTS
 32501                                  			; Return: ES:BX -> DOS list of lists
 32502                                  	;mov	ax,[es:8Ch]
 32503                                  	mov	ax,[es:UMB_HeadIdx]	; And read what's in ES:008C
 32504                                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 32505                                  	;je	short xhu_e		; If it's 0xFFFF, it's an error...
 32506                                  
 32507                                  	;clc				; Else, it isn't.
 32508                                  	;jmp	short xhu_x
 32509                                  xhu_e:	
 32510                                  	;stc
 32511                                  	cmc	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 ; *
 32512                                  xhu_x:	
 32513                                  	;pop	bx ; *
 32514                                  	;pop	es	
 32515                                  	;pop	ds ; ?
 32516                                  	;pop	si ; ?
 32517                                  	retn
 32518                                  
 32519                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32520                                  ;*** linkumb - links UMBs not already linked in; updates fm_umb as needed
 32521                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32522                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 32523                                  ; EXIT:     fm_umb == 0 if not linked in previously, 1 if already linked in
 32524                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32525                                  ; USES:     AX, BX, fm_umb
 32526                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32527                                  
 32528                                  linkumb:
 32529                                  	mov	ax,DOS_GET_UMBLINK ; 5802h
 32530                                  	int	21h			; Current link-state is now in al
 32531                                  
 32532                                  	or	al,al			; BUGBUG: proper check?
 32533                                  	jnz	short lumbX		; Jumps if UMBs already linked in
 32534                                  
 32535                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 32536                                  	mov	bx,1
 32537                                  	int	21h
 32538                                  lumbX:
 32539                                  	retn
 32540                                  
 32541                                  %endif
 32542                                  
 32543                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32544                                  ; (SYSINIT:2B5Fh)
 32545                                  
 32546                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32547                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 32548                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32549                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32550                                  
 32551                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32552                                  ;
 32553                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 32554                                  ;
 32555                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 32556                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 32557                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 32558                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 32559                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 32560                                  ;
 32561                                  ;	Output : none
 32562                                  ;
 32563                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 32564                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 32565                                  ;
 32566                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32567                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 32568                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 32569                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 32570                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 32571                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32572                                  
 32573                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32574                                  InitDevLoad:
 32575                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32576                                  	; ds = cs
 32577 00002753 803E[671E]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 32578                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 32579                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 32580 00002758 741F                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 32581                                  
 32582                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32583                                  ;	cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 32584                                  ;	je	short InitForConv
 32585                                  ;
 32586                                  ;; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 32587                                  ;; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 32588                                  ;; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 32589                                  ;; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 32590                                  ;; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 32591                                  ;; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 32592                                  ;
 32593                                  ;	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 32594                                  ;
 32595                                  ;	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 32596                                  ;	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 32597                                  ;	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 32598                                  ;	pushf
 32599                                  ;	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 32600                                  ;	popf
 32601                                  ;
 32602                                  ;	jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 32603                                  ;
 32604                                  ;	jmp	short InitForHi
 32605                                  
 32606                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32607                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 32608                                  InitForConv:
 32609                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32610                                  	; ds = cs
 32611 0000275A E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 32612                                  					;  current UMB ?
 32613 0000275D 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 32614 0000275F E83C04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 32615 00002762 E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 32616 00002765 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 32617                                  					;  in low memory
 32618                                  InitForHi:
 32619                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32620                                  	; ds = cs
 32621                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 32622                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 32623                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 32624 00002767 A1[5D1E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 32625 0000276A 8B16[591E]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 32626 0000276E 0316[5B1E]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 32627 00002772 EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 32628                                  
 32629                                  InitForLo:
 32630                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32631                                  	; ds = cs
 32632                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 32633 00002774 C606[671E]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 32634                                  initforlo_x:
 32635                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32636                                  	; ds = cs
 32637                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 32638                                  					;  we are loading low
 32639                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 32640                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 32641 00002779 A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 32642 0000277C 8B16[A302]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 32643                                  idl1:
 32644 00002780 E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 32645                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32646                                  	; ds = cs
 32647                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 32648                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 32649                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD

 32697                                  ;

 32699                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 32700                                  ;

 32705                                  ;PrepareMark:

 32708                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 32709                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h

 32713                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 32714                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax

 32717                                  
 32718                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32719                                  ;
 32720                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 32721                                  ;
 32722                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 32723                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 32724                                  ;		 the device.
 32725                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 32726                                  ;
 32727                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 32728                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 32729                                  ;	UMB.
 32730                                  ;
 32731                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 32732                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 32733                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 32734                                  ;
 32735                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32736                                  
 32737                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32738                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 32739                                  
 32740                                  GetUMBForDev:
 32741                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32742                                  	; ds = cs
 32743 000027AA BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 32744 000027AD B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 32745 000027B0 CD21                    	int	21h
 32746                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 32747                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 32748                                  
 32749 000027B2 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 32750                                  	;jz	short gufd_err
 32751                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32752 000027B4 742E                    	jz	short gufd_error ; bx = 0
 32753                                  
 32754 000027B6 4B                      	dec	bx
 32755                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32756                                  	; ds = cs
 32757 000027B7 391E[4A1E]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 32758                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 32759 000027BB 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 32760                                  
 32761 000027BD 43                      	inc	bx
 32762                                  
 32763 000027BE B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 32764 000027C1 CD21                    	int	21h
 32765 000027C3 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 32766                                  
 32767                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32768                                  	;dec	ax
 32769                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 32770                                  	;
 32771                                  PrepareMark:
 32772 000027C5 1E                      	push	ds
 32773 000027C6 48                      	dec	ax
 32774 000027C7 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32775 000027C9 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 32776 000027CF C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 32777 000027D5 40                      	inc	ax
 32778 000027D6 1F                      	pop	ds
 32779                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32780                                  	; ds = cs
 32781                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 32782                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 32783                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 32784                                  gufd_x:		; 09/09/2023
 32785 000027D7 891E[5B1E]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 32786 000027DB A3[591E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 32787 000027DE A3[5D1E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 32788                                  	;
 32789                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32790                                  	; cf=0
 32791                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 32792 000027E1 C3                      	retn
 32793                                  
 32794                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32795                                  %if 1
 32796                                  gufd_err:
 32797 000027E2 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 32798                                  gufd_error:
 32799 000027E4 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 32800 000027E6 F9                      	stc	; cf=1
 32801 000027E7 EBEE                    	jmp	short gufd_x	
 32802                                  %endif
 32803                                  
 32804                                  ; 09/09/2023
 32805                                  %if 0
 32806                                  gufd_err:
 32807                                  	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 32808                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32809                                  	; ds = cs
 32810                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 32811                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 32812                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 32813                                  	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 32814                                  	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 32815                                  	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 32816                                  	stc
 32817                                  	retn
 32818                                  %endif
