 32820                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32821                                  ;
 32822                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 32823                                  ;
 32824                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 32825                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 32826                                  ;
 32827                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 32828                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 32829                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 32830                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 32831                                  ;
 32832                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 32833                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 32834                                  ;
 32835                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32836                                  
 32837                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32838                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 32839                                  
 32840                                  DevSetMark:
 32841 000027E9 06                      	push	es
 32842 000027EA 57                      	push	di
 32843 000027EB 1E                      	push	ds
 32844 000027EC 56                      	push	si
 32845 000027ED 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32846 000027EF 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 32847 000027F5 40                      	inc	ax
 32848 000027F6 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 32849                                  
 32850                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 32851                                  
 32852 000027FA 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 32853                                  	
 32854                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32855                                  	; ds = cs
 32856                                  	;lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 32857 000027FB C536[F803]              	lds	si,[bpb_addr]
 32858                                  
 32859 000027FF 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32860 00002801 FC                      	cld
 32861                                  dsm_again:
 32862 00002802 AC                      	lodsb
 32863 00002803 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 32864 00002805 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 32865 00002807 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32866 00002809 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 32867                                  isit_slash:
 32868 0000280B 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 32869 0000280D 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 32870 0000280F 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32871 00002811 EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 32872                                  isit_null:
 32873 00002813 08C0                    	or	al,al
 32874 00002815 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 32875 00002817 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 32876                                  
 32877 00002819 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 32878 0000281C B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 32879                                  dsm_next_char:
 32880 0000281F AC                      	lodsb
 32881 00002820 08C0                    	or	al, al
 32882 00002822 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 32883 00002824 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 32884 00002826 7403                    	je	short blankout
 32885 00002828 AA                      	stosb
 32886 00002829 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 32887                                  blankout:
 32888 0000282B E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 32889 0000282D B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 32890 0000282F F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 32891                                  dsm_exit:
 32892 00002831 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 32893 00002832 5E                      	pop	si
 32894 00002833 1F                      	pop	ds
 32895 00002834 5F                      	pop	di
 32896 00002835 07                      	pop	es
 32897 00002836 C3                      	retn
 32898                                  
 32899                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32900                                  ;
 32901                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 32902                                  ;
 32903                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 32904                                  ;
 32905                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 32906                                  ;
 32907                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 32908                                  ;	in DevSize
 32909                                  ;
 32910                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32911                                  
 32912                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32913                                  SizeDevice:
 32914                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32915                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 32916 00002837 1E                      	push	ds ; *
 32917 00002838 06                      	push	es
 32918 00002839 1F                      	pop	ds
 32919 0000283A 89F2                    	mov	dx,si			; ds:dx -> file name
 32920 0000283C B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 32921 0000283F CD21                    	int	21h
 32922 00002841 7243                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 32923                                  
 32924 00002843 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 32925 00002845 B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 32926 00002848 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 32927 0000284A 89CA                    	mov	dx,cx			; to end of file
 32928 0000284C CD21                    	int	21h
 32929 0000284E 722F                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 32930 00002850 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 32931 00002853 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 32932 00002856 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffff paras ?
 32933 0000285A 7409                    	jz	short szdev1		; no
 32934 0000285C 2EC706[4A1E]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 32935                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 32936 00002863 EB1A                    	jmp	short sd_close
 32937                                  szdev1:
 32938 00002865 B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 32939 00002867 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 32940 00002869 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 32941 0000286B D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 32942 0000286D 09D0                    	or	ax,dx
 32943                                  	;
 32944                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32945 0000286F 2E3B06[681E]            	cmp     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 32946                                  	;ja	short szdev2
 32947                                  	; 14/08/2023
 32948 00002874 7305                    	jnb	short szdev2
 32949                                  
 32950 00002876 2EA1[681E]              	mov     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 32951                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32952 0000287A F8                      	clc
 32953                                  szdev2:
 32954 0000287B 2EA3[4A1E]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size
 32955                                  
 32956                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32957                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32958                                  	; cf=0
 32959                                  	;clc
 32960                                  sd_close:
 32961 0000287F 9C                      	pushf				; let close not spoil our
 32962                                  					;  carry flag
 32963 00002880 B8003E                  	mov	ax,3E00h		; close
 32964 00002883 CD21                    	int	21h			; we are not checking for err
 32965 00002885 9D                      	popf
 32966                                  sd_err:
 32967                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32968                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 32969 00002886 1F                      	pop     ds ; *
 32970 00002887 C3                      	retn
 32971

 33332                                  ;
 33333                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 33334                                  ;
 33335                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 33336                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 33337                                  ;
 33338                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 33339                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 33340                                  ;
 33341                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 33342                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 33343                                  ;
 33344                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33345                                  
 33346                                  ; 13/05/2019
 33347                                  
 33348                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33349                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 33350                                  GetHexNum:
 33351 0000296A 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 33352 0000296C 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 33353                                  ghn_next:
 33354 0000296E 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 33355 00002971 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 33356 00002974 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 33357 00002976 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 33358 00002979 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 33359 0000297B 50                      	push	ax
 33360 0000297C 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 33361 0000297E E82006                  	call	delim
 33362 00002981 58                      	pop	ax
 33363                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33364 00002982 B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 33365 00002985 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 33366 00002987 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 33367                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 33368                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33369 0000298A 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 33370                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33371                                  	;mov	cx,4
 33372                                  ghn_shift1:
 33373 0000298C D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 33374 0000298E D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 33375 00002990 E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 33376 00002992 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 33377 00002994 46                      	inc	si
 33378 00002995 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 33379                                  ghn_into_paras:
 33380 00002997 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 33381 0000299A 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 33382 0000299D F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 33383 000029A1 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 33384                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33385                                  	;mov	cx,4
 33386                                  ghn_shift2:
 33387 000029A3 F8                      	clc
 33388 000029A4 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1

 33390 000029A8 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 33391 000029AA F8                      	clc
 33392 000029AB C3                      	retn
 33393                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33394                                  ghn_err:
 33395                                  gnib_err:
 33396 000029AC F9                      	stc
 33397                                  ghn_ret:
 33398                                  gnib_ret:
 33399 000029AD C3                      	retn

 33404                                  ;
 33405                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 33406                                  ;
 33407                                  ;	Retruns binary value in BL
 33408                                  ;
 33409                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 33410                                  ;
 33411                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33412                                  
 33413                                  GetNibble:

 33420 000029B8 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc

 33427 000029C1 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 33428 000029C4 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 33429 000029C6 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 33430 000029C9 C3                      	retn

 33443                                  DOS_ARENA	equ 24h		; offset of arena_head var in DOS data segm.

 33451                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33452                                  ;
 33453                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 33454                                  ;
 33455                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 33456                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 33457                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 33458                                  ;			; DS = data
 33459                                  ;
 33460                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 33461                                  ;
 33462                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 33463                                  ;
 33464                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33465                                  
 33466                                  umb_insert:
 33467 000029CA 1E                      	push	ds
 33468                                  
 33469                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33470                                  	; ds = cs
 33471                                  
 33472                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 33473 000029CB 8E1E[761E]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 33474                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 33475 000029CF 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 33476 000029D3 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 33477 000029D5 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33478                                  ui_next:
 33479 000029D7 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 33480                                  					;    new block
 33481 000029D9 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 33482                                  					; Q: is current block the
 33483                                  					;    last
 33484 000029DB 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33485 000029E1 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 33486                                  					; N: get next block
 33487 000029E3 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 33488                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 33489 000029E5 E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33490 000029E8 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 33491                                  
 33492                                  ui_insert:
 33493 000029EA 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 33494 000029EC 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 33495                                  
 33496 000029ED 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 33497 000029EF F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 33498                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 33499 000029F1 C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 33500                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 33501 000029F6 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33502                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 33503 000029FC 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 33504                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 33505 00002A00 C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 33506                                  
 33507                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 33508                                  
 33509 00002A06 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 33510 00002A08 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 33511 00002A0E 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 33512                                  					; mark as free
 33513 00002A15 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 33514                                  					; start & end of new block
 33515 00002A18 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 33516                                  
 33517                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 33518                                  	
 33519 00002A1D 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 33520 00002A1F 43                      	inc	bx
 33521 00002A20 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 33522 00002A22 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 33523                                  
 33524                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 33525                                  					; this block
 33526 00002A23 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 33527                                  	
 33528 00002A25 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 33529 00002A2B 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33530 00002A32 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 33531 00002A36 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 33532                                  
 33533 00002A3D EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 33534                                  
 33535                                  ui_append:
 33536                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 33537 00002A3F 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 33538 00002A44 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 33539                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 33540                                  					; block for the next arena.
 33541                                  	; 13/05/2019
 33542 00002A4A 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 33543                                  
 33544 00002A50 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 33545 00002A52 40                      	inc	ax
 33546 00002A53 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 33547                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 33548 00002A55 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 33549                                  
 33550 00002A57 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 33551                                  
 33552 00002A59 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 33553 00002A5F 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33554 00002A66 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 33555 00002A6A 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 33556                                  
 33557                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 33558 00002A71 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 33559 00002A73 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 33560 00002A79 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 33561                                  					; mark as free
 33562 00002A80 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 33563 00002A81 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 33564                                  ui_done:
 33565                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 33566 00002A86 1F                      	pop	ds
 33567                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 33568                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 33569                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 33570 00002A87 C3                      	retn

 33585                                  au_next:

 33589 00002A95 EBF6                    	jmp	short au_next
 33590                                  au_coalesce:

 33592                                  ;	call	umb_coalesce		; coalesce all UMBs

 33596                                  ;	retn
 33597                                  
 33598                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33599                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce
 33600                                  
 33601                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33602                                  
 33603                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33604                                  ;
 33605                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 33606                                  ;
 33607                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 33608                                  ;	iff it's free. Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 33609                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 33610                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 33611                                  ;
 33612                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 33613                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 33614                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 33615                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 33616                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 33617                                  ;
 33618                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33619                                  
 33620                                  umb_coalesce:
 33621                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33622                                  	; ds = cs
 33623 00002A97 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 33624                                  
 33625 00002A98 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 33626                                  
 33627                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 33628                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33629 00002A9A 8E06[761E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 33630 00002A9E 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 33631                                  uc_nextfree:
 33632 00002AA3 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 33633 00002AA5 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 33634                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 33635 00002AA7 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 33636 00002AAC 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 33637                                  					; N: get next arena
 33638 00002AAE E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 33639 00002AB1 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 33640 00002AB3 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 33641                                  uc_again:
 33642 00002AB5 E86400                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 33643 00002AB8 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 33644                                  uc_check:
 33645 00002ABA 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 33646 00002ABF 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 33647                                  					; Y: coalesce
 33648 00002AC1 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 33649 00002AC6 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 33650                                  	;add	[3],cx
 33651 00002AC7 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 33652 00002ACB 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 33653 00002ACE 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 33654 00002AD0 EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 33655                                  
 33656                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33657                                  ;uc_done:
 33658                                  	;retn

 33662                                  ; procedure : InitAllocUMB
 33663                                  ;
 33664                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33665                                  
 33666                                  InitAllocUMB:
 33667                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33668                                  	; ds = cs
 33669 00002AD2 E831DF                  	call	IsXMSLoaded
 33670 00002AD5 7527                    	jnz	short iau_err		; quit on no XMS driver
 33671 00002AD7 B452                    	mov	ah,52h
 33672 00002AD9 CD21                    	int	21h			; get DOS DATA seg
 33673                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33674                                  	; ds = cs
 33675                                  	;mov	[cs:DevDOSData],es	; & save it for later
 33676 00002ADB 8C06[761E]              	mov	[DevDOSData],es		; & save it for later
 33677 00002ADF B81043                  	mov	ax,4310h
 33678 00002AE2 CD2F                    	int	2Fh

 33680                                  	;mov	[cs:DevXMSAddr+2],es

 33682 00002AE8 8C06[611E]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr+2],es	
 33683                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33684 00002AEC 803E[751E]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0 
 33685                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0 ; have we already linked a UMB?
 33686                                  	;jne	short ia_1		; quit if we already did it

 33707                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33708                                  ;
 33709                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 33710                                  ;
 33711                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 33712                                  ;
 33713                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 33714                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 33715                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 33716                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 33717                                  ;				NC
 33718                                  ;			  else 
 33719                                  ;				CY
 33720                                  ;
 33721                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 33722                                  ;
 33723                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33724                                  
 33725                                  umb_allocate:
 33726                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33727                                  	; ds = cs
 33728 00002B00 50                      	push	ax
 33729 00002B01 B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 33730 00002B03 BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 33731                                  					;   possible
 33732                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33733 00002B06 FF1E[5F1E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 33734                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 33735                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 33736                                  					; the largest UMB
 33737 00002B0A 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 33738 00002B0C 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 33739                                  	
 33740 00002B0E B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 33741                                  
 33742                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33743 00002B10 FF1E[5F1E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 33744                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 33745                                  
 33746 00002B14 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 33747                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 33748                                  	; 14/08/2023
 33749 00002B17 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 33750                                  ua_err:
 33751 00002B19 F9                      	stc	
 33752                                  
 33753                                  	;clc
 33754                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33755                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33756                                  	; cf=0
 33757                                  	;clc 
 33758                                  ua_done:
 33759 00002B1A 58                      	pop	ax
 33760 00002B1B C3                      	retn
 33761                                  	; 14/08/2023
 33762                                  ;ua_err:
 33763                                  	;stc
 33764                                  	;jmp	short ua_done

 33766                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 33768                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33769                                  ;
 33770                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 33771                                  ;
 33772                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 33773                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 33774                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 33775                                  ;
 33776                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33777                                  
 33778                                  	; 01/11/2022
 33779                                  get_next:
 33780 00002B1C 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33781 00002B21 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 33782                                  _get_next_:
 33783 00002B23 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 33784 00002B25 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 33785 00002B29 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 33786 00002B2A 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33787                                  	;clc
 33788                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33789                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33790                                  	; cf=0
 33791                                  	;clc
 33792 00002B2C C3                      	retn
 33793                                  gn_err:
 33794 00002B2D F9                      	stc
 33795                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 33796                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 33797 00002B2E C3                      	retn

 33799                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33800                                  ;
 33801                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 33802                                  ;
 33803                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33804                                  
 33805                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33806                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 33807                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 33808                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33809                                  	; ds = cs
 33810 00002B2F E8CEFF                  	call	umb_allocate
 33811 00002B32 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 33812                                  
 33813                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 33814                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 33815                                  
 33816                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33817                                  	; ds = cs
 33818                                  
 33819 00002B34 CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 33820 00002B36 B106                    	mov	cl,6
 33821 00002B38 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 33822                                  
 33823 00002B3A 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 33824 00002B3C 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 33825                                  
 33826 00002B3E F7D8                    	neg	ax
 33827                                  
 33828                                  	;sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 33829                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33830 00002B40 49                      	dec	cx
 33831 00002B41 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 33832                                  	
 33833 00002B43 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 33834 00002B49 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33835                                  					
 33836 00002B50 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 33837 00002B54 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 33838                                  
 33839                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 33840                                  
 33841 00002B5B 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 33842 00002B5D 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33843 00002B63 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 33844                                  					; mark as free 
 33845 00002B6A 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 33846 00002B6B 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 33847                                  
 33848                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 33849                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33850 00002B70 8E06[761E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 33851                                  	; 18/09/2023
 33852 00002B74 26890E8C00              	mov	[es:UMB_ARENA],cx
 33853                                  	;mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 33854                                  	;mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 33855                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 33856                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 33857                                  
 33858                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 33859                                  
 33860                                  	;mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 33861                                  	;mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 33862                                  	; 18/09/2023
 33863 00002B79 268E062400              	mov	es,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 33864 00002B7E 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 33865                                  ;scan_next
 33866                                  ; 09/12/2022
 33867                                  scannext:
 33868 00002B80 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 33869 00002B84 740C                    	je	short got_last
 33870                                  	
 33871 00002B86 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 33872 00002B88 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 33873 00002B8D 40                      	inc	ax
 33874 00002B8E 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33875                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 33876                                  	; 09/12/2022
 33877 00002B90 EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 33878                                  got_last:
 33879                                  	;sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 33880                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33881 00002B92 26FF0E0300              	dec	word [es:ARENA.SIZE]
 33882                                  
 33883 00002B97 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 33884                                  	;clc
 33885                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33886                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33887                                  	; cf=0
 33888                                  	;clc
 33889 00002B9D C3                      	retn
 33890                                  
 33891                                  ; 11/12/2022
 33892                                  ;;lfu_err:
 33893                                  ;	;stc
 33894                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33895                                  ;	; 11/12/2022
 33896                                  ;	; cf=1
 33897                                  ;	;stc
 33898                                  ;	retn

 33900                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33901                                  ;
 33902                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 33903                                  ;
 33904                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 33905                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 33906                                  ;
 33907                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33908                                  
 33909                                  ShrinkUMB:
 33910                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33911                                  	; ds = cs
 33912 00002B9E 833E[591E]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 33913                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 33914 00002BA3 7421                    	je	short su_exit
 33915 00002BA5 06                      	push	es
 33916 00002BA6 53                      	push	bx
 33917                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33918                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 33919                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 33920                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 33921 00002BA7 8B1E[5D1E]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 33922 00002BAB 2B1E[591E]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 33923 00002BAF 8E06[591E]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 33924                                  	
 33925 00002BB3 B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 33926 00002BB6 CD21                    	int	21h
 33927                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 33928                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 33929                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 33930 00002BB8 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 33931 00002BBA 48                      	dec	ax
 33932 00002BBB 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33933 00002BBD 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 33934 00002BC4 5B                      	pop	bx
 33935 00002BC5 07                      	pop	es
 33936                                  su_exit:
 33937 00002BC6 C3                      	retn

 33943                                  ;	Unlinks the UMBs from the DOS arena chain
 33944                                  ;
 33945                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33946                                  
 33947                                  UnlinkUMB:
 33948                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33949                                  	; ds = cs
 33950 00002BC7 1E                      	push	ds
 33951 00002BC8 06                      	push	es
 33952                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33953 00002BC9 803E[751E]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0
 33954                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 33955 00002BCE 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 33956                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33957 00002BD0 8E06[761E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 33958                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 33959 00002BD4 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 33960 00002BD9 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 33961                                  ulu_next:
 33962 00002BDE E83BFF                  	call	get_next
 33963 00002BE1 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 33964 00002BE3 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 33965 00002BE5 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 33966 00002BE7 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 33967 00002BE9 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 33968                                  ulu_found:
 33969                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 33970 00002BEB C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33971                                  ulu_x:
 33972 00002BF0 07                      	pop	es
 33973 00002BF1 1F                      	pop	ds
 33974 00002BF2 C3                      	retn

 33976                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33977                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 33978                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33979                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33980                                  
 33981                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 33982                                  ;
 33983                                  ; Summary:
 33984                                  ;
 33985                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 33986                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 33987                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 33988                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 33989                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 33990                                  ;
 33991                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 33992                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 33993                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 33994                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 33995                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 33996                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 33997                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 33998                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 33999                                  ;
 34000                                  ; Example:
 34001                                  ;
 34002                                  ;   [menu]
 34003                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 34004                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 34005                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 34006                                  ;
 34007                                  ;   [network]
 34008                                  ;   include misc
 34009                                  ;   device=foo
 34010                                  ;
 34011                                  ;   [misc]
 34012                                  ;   device=bar
 34013                                  ;   include alternate
 34014                                  ;
 34015                                  ;   [alternate]
 34016                                  ;   device=tar
 34017                                  ;
 34018                                  ;
 34019                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 34020                                  ;
 34021                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 34022                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 34023                                  ;
 34024                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 34025                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 34026                                  ;   following order:
 34027                                  ;
 34028                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 34029                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 34030                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 34031                                  ;
 34032                                  
 34033                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 34034                                  
 34035                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 34036                                  
 34037                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 34038                                  
 34039                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 34040                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 34041                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 34042                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 34043                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 34044                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 34045                                  
 34046                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34047                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34048                                  
 34049                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 34050                                  
 34051                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34052                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 34053                                  
 34054 00002BF3 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0
 34055

 34057                                  ;
 34058                                  ; procedure : setparms
 34059                                  ;
 34060                                  ; the following set of routines is used to parse the drivparm = command in
 34061                                  ; the config.sys file to change the default drive parameters.
 34062                                  ;
 34063                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34064                                  
 34065                                  setparms:
 34066 00002BF4 1E                      	push	ds
 34067 00002BF5 50                      	push	ax
 34068 00002BF6 53                      	push	bx
 34069 00002BF7 51                      	push	cx
 34070 00002BF8 52                      	push	dx
 34071                                  
 34072 00002BF9 0E                      	push	cs
 34073 00002BFA 1F                      	pop	ds
 34074                                  
 34075 00002BFB 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 34076 00002BFD 8A1E[7D35]              	mov	bl,[drive]
 34077                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34078 00002C01 43                      	inc	bx
 34079                                  	;inc	bl			; get it correct for ioctl call
 34080                                  					; (1=a,2=b...)
 34081 00002C02 BA[5534]                	mov	dx,deviceparameters
 34082                                  	;mov	ah,IOCTL ; 44h
 34083                                  	;mov	al,GENERIC_IOCTL ; 0Dh
 34084                                  	; 14/08/2023
 34085 00002C05 B80D44                  	mov	ax,(IOCTL<<8)|GENERIC_IOCTL
 34086                                  	;mov	ch,RAWIO ; 8
 34087                                  	;mov	cl,SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS ; 40h
 34088                                  	; 14/08/2023
 34089 00002C08 B94008                  	mov	cx,(RAWIO<<8)|SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS 
 34090 00002C0B CD21                    	int	21h
 34091                                  
 34092                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34093                                  ;
 34094                                  ;	;;mov	ax,Bios_Data		; get Bios_Data segment
 34095                                  ;	;mov	ax,KERNEL_SEGMENT ; 70h
 34096                                  ;	; 21/10/2022
 34097                                  ;	mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 34098                                  ;	mov	ds,ax			; set Bios_Data segment
 34099                                  ;
 34100                                  ;	test	word [cs:switches],flagec35 ; 4
 34101                                  ;	jz	short not_ec35
 34102                                  
 34103                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34104                                  	;test	word [switches],flagec35 ; 4
 34105                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34106 00002C0D F606[7E35]04            	test	byte [switches],flagec35 ; 4
 34107 00002C12 7411                    	jz	short eot_ok
 34108                                  
 34109                                  	;mov	cl,[cs:drive]		; which drive was this for?
 34110                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34111 00002C14 8A0E[7D35]              	mov	cl,[drive]
 34112 00002C18 B87000                  	mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 34113 00002C1B 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax	
 34114                                  
 34115 00002C1D B001                    	mov	al,1			; assume drive 0
 34116 00002C1F D2E0                    	shl	al,cl			; set proper bit depending on drive
 34117                                  	;or	[531h],al ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS Offset SYINIT:3EACh)
 34118 00002C21 0806[2805]              	or	[ec35_flag],al		; set the bit in the permanent flags
 34119                                  
 34120                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34121                                  ;
 34122                                  ;not_ec35:
 34123                                  ;;	Now adjust the BIOS's EOT variable if our new drive has more
 34124                                  ;;	sectors per track than any old ones.
 34125                                  ;
 34126                                  ;	;mov	al,[cs:deviceparameters+20]
 34127                                  ;	mov	al,[cs:deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 34128                                  ;	;cmp	al,[12Ch] ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS Offset SYINIT:3EB4h)
 34129                                  ;	cmp	al,[EOT]
 34130                                  ;	jbe	short eot_ok
 34131                                  ;	mov	[EOT],al
 34132                                  
 34133                                  eot_ok:
 34134 00002C25 5A                      	pop	dx			; fix up all the registers
 34135 00002C26 59                      	pop	cx
 34136 00002C27 5B                      	pop	bx
 34137 00002C28 58                      	pop	ax
 34138 00002C29 1F                      	pop	ds ; 13/05/2019
 34139 00002C2A C3                      	retn

 34169                                  ;
 34170                                  ; procedure : parseline
 34171                                  ;
 34172                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 34173                                  ;
 34174                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34175                                  
 34176                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34177                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 34178                                  
 34179                                  parseline:
 34180                                  	push	ds
 34181                                  
 34182                                  	push	cs
 34183                                  	pop	ds
 34184                                  
 34185                                  nextswtch:
 34186                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 34187                                  	je	short done_line
 34188                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 34189                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 34190                                  
 34191                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 34192                                  
 34193                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 34194                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 34195                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 34196                                  	je	short getparm
 34197                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 34198                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 34199                                  
 34200                                  getparm:
 34201                                  	call	check_switch
 34202                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 34203                                  	jc	short swterr
 34204                                  getnext:
 34205                                  	call	getchr
 34206                                  	jc	short done_line
 34207                                  	jmp	short nextswtch
 34208                                  swterr:
 34209                                  	jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 34210                                  
 34211                                  done_line:
 34212                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34213                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 34214                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 34215                                  	jnz	short okay
 34216                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 34217                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 34218                                  
 34219                                  okay:
 34220                                  	mov	ax,[switches]
 34221                                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 34222                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 34223                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 34224                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 34225                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34226                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34227                                  	; cf=0
 34228                                  	;clc
 34229                                  	call	setdeviceparameters
 34230                                  exitpl:
 34231                                  	pop	ds
 34232                                  	retn
 34233                                  put_back:
 34234                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 34235                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 34236                                  	jmp	short done_line
 34237                                  
 34238                                  %endif

 34240                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34241                                  ;
 34242                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 34243                                  ;
 34244                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 34245                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 34246                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 34247                                  ; error.
 34248                                  ;
 34249                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34250                                  
 34251                                  ; 09/09/2023
 34252                                  
 34253                                  err_swtch:
 34254 00002C47 31CB                    	xor	bx,cx			; remove this switch from the records
 34255                                  err_check:
 34256 00002C49 F9                      	stc
 34257                                  err_chk:
 34258                                  done_swtch:	; 09/09/2023 (cf=0)
 34259 00002C4A C3                      	retn

 34261                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)

 34321

 34512                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34513                                  ;
 34514                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 34515                                  ;
 34516                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 34517                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 34518                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 34519                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 34520                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 34521                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 34522                                  ;
 34523                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 34524                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 34525                                  ;
 34526                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 34527                                  ;
 34528                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34529                                  
 34530                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34531                                  
 34532                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34533                                  setdeviceparameters:
 34534                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34535                                  	; ds = cs
 34536                                  	
 34537 00002D0A 06                      	push	es
 34538                                  
 34539 00002D0B 0E                      	push	cs
 34540 00002D0C 07                      	pop	es
 34541                                  
 34542 00002D0D 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 34543 00002D0F 8A1E[5634]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 34544 00002D13 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 34545 00002D16 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 34546                                  
 34547 00002D18 C706[5934]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 34548                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 34549                                  got_80:
 34550 00002D1E D1E3                    	shl	bx,1			; get index into bpb table
 34551 00002D20 8BB7[FE35]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 34552                                  
 34553                                  	;mov	di,deviceparameters+7	
 34554                                  	; 02/11/2022
 34555 00002D24 BF[5C34]                	mov	di,deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB ; es:di -> bpb
 34556 00002D27 B91F00                  	mov	cx,A_BPB.size ; 31

 34584

 34586                                  ;   sectors/cluster is always 2 except for any one sided disk or 1.44M
 34587                                  
 34588                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+9],2
 34589                                  	; 02/11/2022
 34590                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],2
 34591                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34592 00002D48 B80200                  	mov	ax,2	
 34593 00002D4B A2[5E34]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2
 34594                                  
 34595 00002D4E B3F0                    	mov	bl,0F0h			; get default mediabyte
 34596                                  
 34597                                  ;	preload the mediadescriptor from the bpb into bh for convenient access
 34598                                  
 34599                                  	;mov	bh,[deviceparameters+17]
 34600                                  	; 02/11/2022
 34601 00002D50 8A3E[6634]              	mov	bh,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 34602                                  
 34603                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34604                                  	; ax = 2
 34605 00002D54 3906[6B34]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 34606                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?
 34607 00002D58 773C                    	ja	short got_correct_mediad ; just use default if heads>2
 34608                                  
 34609 00002D5A 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 34610                                  
 34611                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 34612                                  
 34613 00002D5C 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 34614                                  
 34615                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 34616                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 34617                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 34618                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 34619                                  
 34620                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 34621                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 34622                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 34623                                  
 34624 00002D5E 833E[6934]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 34625 00002D63 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 34626 00002D65 833E[5934]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 34627 00002D6A 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 34628                                  
 34629                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 34630                                  
 34631 00002D6C EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 34632                                  
 34633                                  ;	check for 320K
 34634                                  
 34635                                  not_144m:
 34636 00002D6E 833E[5934]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 34637 00002D73 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 34638 00002D75 833E[6934]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 34639 00002D7A 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 34640                                  
 34641 00002D7C B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh
 34642 00002D7E EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediad
 34643                                  
 34644                                  only_one_head:
 34645                                  
 34646                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 34647                                  
 34648 00002D80 803E[5634]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 34649 00002D85 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 34650                                  
 34651                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 34652                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 34653                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 34654                                  
 34655 00002D87 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh			; single sided 9 sector media id
 34656 00002D89 833E[6934]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 34657                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34658 00002D8E 7502                    	jne	short got_one_secperclus_drive ; okay if anything besides 8
 34659                                  
 34660 00002D90 B3FE                    	mov	bl,0FEh			; 160K mediaid
 34661                                  
 34662                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 34663                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 34664                                  
 34665                                  got_one_secperclus_drive:
 34666                                  	; 04/01/2023

 35117                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0
 35118 00002F46 7407                    	je	short up_level
 35119                                  	;mov	byte [cs:com_level],0	; reset it.
 35120 00002F48 C606[CC03]00            	mov	byte [com_level],0
 35121 00002F4D EBAB                    	jmp	short org5
 35122                                  
 35123                                  up_level:
 35124                                  	;inc	byte [cs:com_level]	; set it.
 35125 00002F4F FE06[CC03]              	inc	byte [com_level]
 35126 00002F53 EBA5                    	jmp	short org5
 35127                                  
 35128                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35129                                  ;
 35130                                  ; procedure : get2
 35131                                  ;
 35132                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35133                                  
 35134                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35135                                  	; (SYSINIT:33FAh)
 35136                                  	; 04/01/2023
 35137                                  get2:
 35138 00002F55 E304                    	jcxz	noget
 35139                                  	;
 35140                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35141                                  	;;lods	byte ptr es:[si]
 35142                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35143 00002F57 26                      	es	
 35144 00002F58 AC                      	lodsb
 35145                                  	;mov	al, [es:si]
 35146                                  	;inc	si
 35147                                  	;
 35148 00002F59 49                      	dec	cx
 35149 00002F5A C3                      	retn
 35150                                  noget:
 35151 00002F5B 59                      	pop	cx
 35152                                  	; 04/01/2023
 35153                                  	; ds = cs
 35154                                  	;mov	[cs:count],di ; 13/05/2019
 35155                                  	;mov	[cs:org_count],di
 35156 00002F5C 893E[D203]              	mov	[count],di
 35157 00002F60 893E[D403]              	mov	[org_count],di
 35158 00002F64 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 35159                                  	;mov	[cs:chrptr],si
 35160 00002F66 8936[D603]              	mov	[chrptr],si
 35161                                  
 35162                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35163                                  ;;ifndef MULTI_CONFIG
 35164                                  ;;	retn
 35165                                  ;;else
 35166                                  ;
 35167                                  ;;   This was the rather kludgy way out of procedure "organize", but instead
 35168                                  ;;   of returning to doconf, we now want to check config.sys BEGIN/END blocks
 35169                                  ;;   and the new boot menu stuff...
 35170                                  ;
 35171                                  ;	mov     cx,di
 35172                                  ;	jmp     menu_check
 35173                                  ;;endif
 35174                                  
 35175                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35176 00002F6A C3                      	retn
 35177                                  
 35178                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35179                                  ;
 35180                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 35181                                  ;
 35182                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 35183                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 35184                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 35185                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 35186                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 35187                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 35188                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 35189                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 35190                                  ;
 35191                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35192                                  
 35193                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35194                                  
 35195                                  skip_comment:
 35196 00002F6B E3EE                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 35197                                  
 35198                                  	; 04/01/2023
 35199                                  	; ds = cs	
 35200                                  
 35201 00002F6D 803E[CC03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 35202                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 35203 00002F72 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 35204                                  
 35205 00002F74 803E[CD03]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 35206                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 35207 00002F79 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 35208                                  
 35209 00002F7B 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 35210                                  	
 35211 00002F7E 3806[CE03]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 35212                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 35213 00002F82 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 35214                                  
 35215 00002F84 803E[CD03]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 35216                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 35217 00002F89 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 35218                                  
 35219 00002F8B 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 35220                                  	
 35221 00002F8F 3806[CF03]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 35222                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 35223 00002F93 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 35224                                  skip_cmmt:
 35225 00002F95 E3C4                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 35226 00002F97 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 35227 00002F9A 46                      	inc	si
 35228 00002F9B 49                      	dec	cx
 35229 00002F9C 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 35230 00002F9E 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 35231                                  no_commt:
 35232 00002FA0 C3                      	retn
 35233                                  
 35234                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35235                                  %if 0
 35236                                  
 35237                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35238                                  
 35239                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35240                                  ;
 35241                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 35242                                  ;
 35243                                  ;   INPUT
 35244                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 35245                                  ;
 35246                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35247                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 35248                                  ;
 35249                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35250                                  ;       All
 35251                                  ;
 35252                                  ;   HISTORY
 35253                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 35254                                  ;
 35255                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35256                                  
 35257                                  kbd_read:
 35258                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 35259                                          jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 35260                                  
 35261                                          push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 35262                                          sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
