 35263                                          mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 35264                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 35265                                  kbd_loop:
 35266                                          mov     ah,1            ;
 35267                                          int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 35268                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 35269                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 35270                                          int     16h             ;
 35271                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 35272                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 35273                                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 35274                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 35275                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35276                                  	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 35277                                  
 35278                                  	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?
 35279                                          jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 35280                                  kbd_loopdone:
 35281                                          pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 35282                                  kbd_nodelay:
 35283                                          sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 35284                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 35285                                          int     16h             ;
 35286                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 35287                                          jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 35288                                          inc     bx              ; yes
 35289                                          inc     bx
 35290                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 35291                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 35292                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 35293                                          mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 35294                                          int     16h             ;
 35295                                          jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 35296                                          or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 35297                                          jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 35298                                  
 35299                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 35300                                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 35301                                          je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 35302                                  	
 35303                                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 35304                                          jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 35305                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 35306                                          mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 35307                                          call    print
 35308                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 35309                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4           ;
 35310                                          jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 35311                                  kbd_notf5:
 35312                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 35313                                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 35314                                          je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 35315                                  
 35316                                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 35317                                          jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 35318                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 35319                                          mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 35320                                          call    print           ;
 35321                                          mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 35322                                          mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 35323                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 35324                                          mov     ah,0            ;
 35325                                          int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 35326                                          mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 35327                                          or      bx,bx           ;
 35328                                          jz	short kbd_clean	;
 35329                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 35330                                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 35331                                          jb	short kbd_exit	;
 35332                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 35333                                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 35334                                          stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 35335                                          retn			;
 35336                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 35337                                          clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 35338                                          retn			;
 35339                                  
 35340                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35341                                  ;
 35342                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 35343                                  ;
 35344                                  ;   INPUT
 35345                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 35346                                  ;
 35347                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35348                                  ;       None
 35349                                  ;
 35350                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35351                                  ;       None
 35352                                  ;
 35353                                  ;   HISTORY
 35354                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 35355                                  ;
 35356                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35357                                  
 35358                                  set_numlock:
 35359                                          push    ax
 35360                                          push    ds
 35361                                          sub     ax,ax
 35362                                          mov     ds,ax
 35363                                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 35364                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 35365                                          jne	short not_off	; no
 35366                                          and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 35367                                          jmp     short set_done
 35368                                  not_off:
 35369                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 35370                                          stc
 35371                                          jne	short set_done	; no
 35372                                          or      byte [0417h],20h
 35373                                  set_done:
 35374                                          pop     ds
 35375                                          pop     ax
 35376                                          retn
 35377                                  
 35378                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35379                                  
 35380                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35381                                  ;
 35382                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 35383                                  ;
 35384                                  ;   INPUT
 35385                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 35386                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 35387                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 35388                                  ;
 35389                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35390                                  ;       Same as above;  the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 35391                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 35392                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 35393                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 35394                                  ;
 35395                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35396                                  ;       All
 35397                                  ;
 35398                                  ;   NOTES
 35399                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 35400                                  ;
 35401                                  ;   HISTORY
 35402                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35403                                  ;
 35404                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35405                                  
 35406                                  menu_check:
 35407                                  
 35408                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present;  if so, then
 35409                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 35410                                  
 35411                                          push    cx              ;
 35412                                          push    si              ;
 35413                                          sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 35414                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 35415                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 35416                                          jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 35417                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 35418                                          jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 35419                                          inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 35420                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 35421                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 35422                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 35423                                          jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 35424                                          or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 35425                                          jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 35426                                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 35427                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 35428                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 35429                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 35430                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 35431                                          jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 35432                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 35433                                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 35434                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 35435                                          cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 35436                                          je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 35437                                          cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 35438                                          jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 35439                                          call    get_char        ;
 35440                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 35441                                          cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 35442                                          jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 35443                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 35444                                          jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 35445                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 35446                                          cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 35447                                          jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 35448                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 35449                                          jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 35450                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 35451                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 35452                                          jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 35453                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 35454                                          pop     si              ;
 35455                                          pop     cx              ;
 35456                                  
 35457                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 35458                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 35459                                  
 35460                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35461                                          jnz	short menu_search
 35462                                  ;
 35463                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 35464                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 35465                                  ;
 35466                                          call    kbd_read
 35467                                          jnc	short menu_search
 35468                                          jmp	menu_abort
 35469                                  
 35470                                  ;   Search for MENU block;  it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 35471                                  
 35472                                  menu_search:
 35473                                          sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 35474                                          mov     di,szMenu	;
 35475                                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 35476                                          jnc	short menu_found ;
 35477                                          mov     byte [szBoot],0
 35478                                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 35479                                  
 35480                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 35481                                  
 35482                                  menu_color:
 35483                                          push    cx              ;
 35484                                          push    dx              ;
 35485                                          mov     dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 35486                                          call    get_number	; get first number
 35487                                          and     bl,0Fh		; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 35488                                          mov     ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 35489                                          and     dl,0F0h         ;
 35490                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 35491                                          call    delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 35492                                          jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 35493                                          call    get_number	; get next number
 35494                                          and     bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 35495                                          mov     dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 35496                                          and     dl,0Fh		;
 35497                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 35498                                          shl     bl,cl           ;
 35499                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 35500                                  check_color:                    ;
 35501                                          cmp     ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 35502                                          jne	short set_color	; no
 35503                                          xor     dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 35504                                  set_color:
 35505                                          mov     [bMenuColor],dl ;
 35506                                          pop     dx              ;
 35507                                          pop     cx              ;
 35508                                          jmp	menu_nextitem
 35509                                  
 35510                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 35511                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 35512                                  
 35513                                  menu_found:
 35514                                          mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 35515                                          mov     word [offDefBlock],0
 35516                                          mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 35517                                          and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 35518                                  
 35519                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 35520                                          sub     dx,dx           ; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 35521                                  
 35522                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 35523                                  
 35524                                  menu_process:
 35525                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 35526                                          jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 35527                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35528                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 35529                                          je	short to_menu_getdefault
 35530                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 35531                                          je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 35532                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 35533                                          je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 35534                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 35535                                          je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 35536                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 35537                                          je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 35538                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 35539                                          je	short menu_numlock ;
 35540                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 35541                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 35542                                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 35543                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 35544                                          stc                     ;
 35545                                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 35546                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 35547                                  menu_numlock:
 35548                                          call    set_numlock
 35549                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 35550                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 35551                                          jmp     short menu_getdefault
 35552                                  
 35553                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 35554                                  
 35555                                  menu_default:
 35556                                          mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 35557                                          cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 35558                                          jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 35559                                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 35560                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 35561                                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 35562                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 35563                                          mov     si,bx           ;
 35564                                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 35565                                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 35566                                          jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 35567                                          mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 35568                                  timeout_ok:                     ;
 35569                                          mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 35570                                  timeout_skip:
 35571                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 35572                                  
 35573                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 35574                                  
 35575                                  menu_item:
 35576                                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 35577                                          jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 35578                                          mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 35579                                          call    srch_block      ;
 35580                                          je	short menu_itemfound ;
 35581                                          stc                     ;
 35582                                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 35583                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 35584                                  
 35585                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 35586                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 35587                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 35588                                  
 35589                                  menu_itemfound:
 35590                                          inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 35591                                          mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 35592                                          mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 35593                                          add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 35594                                  
 35595                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 35596                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 35597                                  ;   description...
 35598                                  
 35599                                          mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 35600                                          mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 35601                                          mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 35602                                          call    skip_token      ;
 35603                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 35604                                          call    skip_delim      ;
 35605                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 35606                                          xchg    bx,di           ;
 35607                                          mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 35608                                  
 35609                                  menu_nextitem:
 35610                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 35611                                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 35612                                  
 35613                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 35614                                  
 35615                                  menu_getdefault:
 35616                                          or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 35617                                          jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 35618                                          sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 35619                                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 35620                                  menu_valid:
 35621                                          sub     bx,bx           ;
 35622                                          mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 35623                                          mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 35624                                          or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 35625                                          jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 35626                                          inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 35627                                  menu_chkdefault:
 35628                                          push    bx              ;
 35629                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 35630                                          mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 35631                                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 35632                                          push    ds              ;
 35633                                          push    es              ;
 35634                                          pop     ds              ;
 35635                                          call    comp_names      ; is this block the same as the default?
 35636                                          pop     ds              ;
 35637                                          pop     bx              ;
 35638                                          je	short menu_setdefault ; yes
 35639                                          inc     bx              ;
 35640                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done searching?
 35641                                          jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 35642                                  menu_nodefault:
 35643                                          mov     bl,1            ; if no default, force default to #1
 35644                                  menu_setdefault:
 35645                                          mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 35646                                  
 35647                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 35648                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 35649                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 35650                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 35651                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 35652                                  ;   with no timeout)
 35653                                  
 35654                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 35655                                          jne	short menu_display ; no
 35656                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; yes, but was INTERACTIVE requested?
 35657                                          jnz	short menu_display ; yes, so *don't* assume default after all
 35658                                          jmp     not_topmenu	;
 35659                                  
 35660                                  ;   Reset the mode, so that we know screen is clean and cursor is home
 35661                                  
 35662                                  menu_display:
 35663                                          mov     ah,0Fh          ; get current video mode
 35664                                          int     10h             ;
 35665                                          mov     ah,00h          ; just re-select that mode
 35666                                          int     10h             ;
 35667                                          push    es              ;
 35668                                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 35669                                          mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 35670                                          mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 35671                                          mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled
 35672                                          mov     al,[es:0062h]   ;
 35673                                          mov     [bCRTPage],al   ;
 35674                                          mov     ax,[bMenuPage]	; select new page for menu
 35675                                          int     10h             ;
 35676                                          mov     ax,0600h        ; clear entire screen
 35677                                          mov     bh,[bMenuColor] ; using this color
 35678                                          sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 35679                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 35680                                          mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 35681                                  	dec     dl              ;
 35682                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 35683                                          mov	dh,[es:84h]
 35684                                  	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 35685                                          jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 35686                                          mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 35687                                  menu_clear:
 35688                                          int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 35689                                          pop     es              ;
 35690                                          mov     [bLastRow],dh   ; save DH
 35691                                          mov     dx,_$MenuHeader
 35692                                          call    print           ; cursor now on row 3 (numbered from 0)
 35693                                  
 35694                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35695                                          jnz     short menu_nostatus
 35696                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 35697                                          mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; restore DH
 35698                                          mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 35699                                          mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 35700                                          int     10h             ;
 35701                                          mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 35702                                          call    print           ;
 35703                                          mov     ah,3            ; get cursor position
 35704                                          int     10h             ;
 35705                                          sub     dl,2            ;
 35706                                          mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 35707                                  
 35708                                  menu_nostatus:
 35709                                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 35710                                  menu_disploop:
 35711                                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 35712                                          inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"?  because it's a 1-byte opcode
 35713                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 35714                                          jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 35715                                  
 35716                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 35717                                  
 35718                                          mov     dl,0            ; select column
 35719                                          mov     dh,bl           ;
 35720                                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 35721                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 35722                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 35723                                          int     10h             ;
 35724                                  
 35725                                          mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 35726                                          call    print           ;
 35727                                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 35728                                          mov     dx,crlfm	
 35729                                          call    print           ;
 35730                                          push    word [bDisableUI]
 35731                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 35732                                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 35733                                          pop     word [bDisableUI]
 35734                                  
 35735                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 35736                                  
 35737                                  menu_autoselect:
 35738                                          cmp     bx,-1           ; clean boot requested?
 35739                                          jne	short normal_boot ; no
 35740                                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 35741                                  menu_abort:
 35742                                          sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 35743                                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 35744                                  
 35745                                  normal_boot:
 35746                                          cmp     bx,-2           ; back to top-level menu?
 35747                                          jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 35748                                          mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 35749                                          sub     si,si           ;
 35750                                          jmp     menu_search
 35751                                  
 35752                                  not_topmenu:
 35753                                          cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 35754                                          jne	short not_submenu
 35755                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 35756                                          mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 35757                                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 35758                                          mov     si,di           ;
 35759                                          mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 35760                                          jmp     menu_found
 35761                                  
 35762                                  not_submenu:
 35763                                          add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 35764                                          mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 35765                                  
 35766                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 35767                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 35768                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 35769                                  
 35770                                  no_selection:
 35771                                          mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 35772                                          mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 35773                                          sub     si,si           ;
 35774                                          push    ds              ;
 35775                                          mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 35776                                          sub     di,di           ;
 35777                                  
 35778                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 35779                                  ;
 35780                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 35781                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 35782                                  ;   within the requested block.  Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 35783                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion;  the amount of recursion is
 35784                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 35785                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 35786                                  ;
 35787                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 35788                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 35789                                  
 35790                                  copyblock_loop:
 35791                                          push    bx              ; save selected block name
 35792                                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 35793                                          pop     bx              ;
 35794                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 35795                                  
 35796                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons:  it hit eof or a new block
 35797                                  
 35798                                  copyblock_begin:
 35799                                          push    ax              ;
 35800                                          push    cx              ;
 35801                                          push    si              ;
 35802                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 35803                                          mov     di,szCommon
 35804                                          push    ds              ;
 35805                                          push    cs              ;
 35806                                          pop     ds              ;
 35807                                          call    comp_names      ;
 35808                                          pop     ds              ;
 35809                                          pop     di              ;
 35810                                          pop     si              ;
 35811                                          pop     cx              ;
 35812                                          pop     ax              ;
 35813                                          je	short copyblock_check
 35814                                          or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 35815                                          jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 35816                                          push    di              ;
 35817                                          mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 35818                                          push    ds              ;
 35819                                          push    es              ;
 35820                                          pop     ds              ;
 35821                                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 35822                                          pop     ds              ;
 35823                                          pop     di              ;
 35824                                  copyblock_check:
 35825                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 35826                                          jne	short copyblock_skip  ;
 35827                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 35828                                          jmp	short copyblock_loop 
 35829                                  
 35830                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 35831                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 35832                                          call    get_char        ;
 35833                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 35834                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35835                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 35836                                          je	short copyblock_begin
 35837                                          jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 35838                                  ;
 35839                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 35840                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 35841                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 35842                                  ;
 35843                                  move_config:
 35844                                          mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 35845                                          push    cx              ;
 35846                                  ;
 35847                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 35848                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 35849                                  ;
 35850                                   	;mov	cx,7
 35851                                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 35852                                          mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 35853                                          inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 35854                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 35855                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 35856                                  copy_boot: 
 35857                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 35858                                          cs
 35859                                  	lodsb
 35860                                  	mov     [di],al         ;
 35861                                          inc     di              ;
 35862                                          loop    copy_boot       ;
 35863                                  
 35864                                          push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 35865                                          mov     cx,128-7        ; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 35866                                          mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 35867                                          or      si,si           ; valid?
 35868                                          jnz	short l1	; yes
 35869                                          push    cs              ;
 35870                                          pop     es              ;
 35871                                          mov     si,szCommon
 35872                                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 35873                                          call    any_delim       ;
 35874                                          je	short l2	;
 35875                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 35876                                          inc     si              ;
 35877                                          inc     di              ;
 35878                                          loop    l1              ;
 35879                                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 35880                                          pop     es              ;
 35881                                  
 35882                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 35883                                  
 35884                                          sub     di,di           ;
 35885                                          mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 35886                                          sub     si,si           ;
 35887                                          pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 35888                                  
 35889                                          push    cx              ;
 35890                                          rep     movsb           ; moved!
 35891                                          pop     cx              ;
 35892                                          mov     ax,ds           ;
 35893                                          pop     ds              ;
 35894                                  
 35895                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 35896                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 35897                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 35898                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 35899                                  ;   is empty.
 35900                                  
 35901                                          push    es              ;
 35902                                          mov     es,ax           ;
 35903                                          inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 35904                                          mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 35905                                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 35906                                          pop     es
 35907                                  
 35908                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 35909                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 35910                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 35911                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 35912                                  
 35913                                  menu_done:
 35914                                          cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 35915                                          je	short menu_exit	;
 35916                                          push    es              ;
 35917                                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 35918                                          mov     es,ax           ;
 35919                                          mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 35920                                          mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 35921                                          mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 35922                                          mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 35923                                          pop     es              ;
 35924                                  menu_exit:
 35925                                          mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 35926                                          mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 35927                                          sub     si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 35928                                          retn
 35929                                  
 35930                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35931                                  ;
 35932                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 35933                                  ;
 35934                                  ;   INPUT
 35935                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 35936                                  ;
 35937                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35938                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 35939                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 35940                                  ;
 35941                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35942                                  ;       None
 35943                                  ;
 35944                                  ;   NOTES
 35945                                  ;       None
 35946                                  ;
 35947                                  ;   HISTORY
 35948                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35949                                  ;
 35950                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35951                                  
 35952                                  copy_envvar:
 35953                                          push    cx              ;
 35954                                          push    si              ;
 35955                                          push    ds              ;
 35956                                          push    es              ;
 35957                                          push    es              ;
 35958                                          mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 35959                                          pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 35960                                  
 35961                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 35962                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 35963                                  ;   config.sys line)
 35964                                  ;
 35965                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 35966                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 35967                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 35968                                  
 35969                                          sub     cx,cx           ;
 35970                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 35971                                          lodsb                   ;
 35972                                          or      al,al           ; NULL?
 35973                                          stc                     ;
 35974                                          jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 35975                                          cmp     al,cr          ;
 35976                                          stc                     ;
 35977                                          je	short copy_envexit
 35978                                          cmp     al,lf          ;
 35979                                          stc                     ;
 35980                                          je	short copy_envexit
 35981                                          inc     cx              ;
 35982                                          cmp     al,'='          ;
 35983                                          jne	short copy_varlen
 35984                                          mov     al,0            ;
 35985                                          mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 35986                                          sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 35987                                          dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 35988                                          sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 35989                                  copy_varsrch:
 35990                                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 35991                                          je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 35992                                          mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 35993                                          push    cx              ;
 35994                                          push    si              ;
 35995                                          repe    cmpsb           ;
 35996                                          pop     si              ;
 35997                                          pop     cx              ;
 35998                                          jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 35999                                          cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 36000                                          jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 36001                                  
 36002                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 36003                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 36004                                  
 36005                                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 36006                                          repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 36007                                          push    si              ;
 36008                                          mov     si,di           ;
 36009                                          mov     di,bx           ;
 36010                                          mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 36011                                          sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 36012                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 36013                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 36014                                  
 36015                                  	rep	; 0F3h
 36016                                  	es	; 26h
 36017                                  	movsb	; 0A4h
 36018                                  
 36019                                  	pop     si
 36020                                  copy_envprep:
 36021                                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 36022                                          je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 36023                                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 36024                                          je	short copy_envdel
 36025                                          jmp     short copy_envloop
 36026                                  
 36027                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 36028                                          push    cx              ;
 36029                                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 36030                                          repne   scasb           ;
 36031                                          pop     cx              ;
 36032                                          jmp	short copy_varsrch
 36033                                  
 36034                                  copy_envloop:                   ;
 36035                                          lodsb                   ;
 36036                                          cmp     al,cr           ;
 36037                                          je	short copy_envdone
 36038                                          cmp     al,lf           ;
 36039                                          je	short copy_envdone
 36040                                          stosb                   ;
 36041                                          jmp     short copy_envloop
 36042                                  
 36043                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 36044                                          sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 36045                                          stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 36046                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 36047                                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 36048                                          mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 36049                                  
 36050                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 36051                                          pop     es              ;
 36052                                          pop     ds              ;
 36053                                          pop     si              ;
 36054                                          pop     cx              ;
 36055                                  
 36056                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 36057                                          retn
 36058                                  
 36059                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36060                                  ;
 36061                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 36062                                  ;
 36063                                  ;   INPUT
 36064                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 36065                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 36066                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 36067                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 36068                                  ;
 36069                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36070                                  ;       Same as above
 36071                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 36072                                  ;
 36073                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36074                                  ;       All
 36075                                  ;
 36076                                  ;   NOTES
 36077                                  ;       None
 36078                                  ;
 36079                                  ;   HISTORY
 36080                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36081                                  ;
 36082                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36083                                  
 36084                                  copy_block:
 36085                                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 36086                                          jc	short copy_done	;
 36087                                  	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36088                                  	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 36089                                          je	short copy_done ;
 36090                                  
 36091                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 36092                                          mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 36093                                          jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 36094                                  
 36095                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 36096                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 36097                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 36098                                  
 36099                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 36100                                          push    di              ;
 36101                                  
 36102                                          mov     di,szMenu
 36103                                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 36104                                          je	short copy_skip	;
 36105                                  
 36106                                          mov     di,szCommon
 36107                                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 36108                                          je	short copy_skip	;
 36109                                  
 36110                                          mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 36111                                          call    srch_block      ;
 36112                                          mov     dx,di           ;
 36113                                          pop     di              ;
 36114                                          jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 36115                                          push    cx              ;
 36116                                          mov     cx,bx           ;
 36117                                          push    si              ;
 36118                                          dec     dx              ;
 36119                                          mov     si,dx           ;
 36120                                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 36121                                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 36122                                          pop     si              ;
 36123                                          pop     cx              ;
 36124                                          sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 36125                                          jmp     short copy_nextline
 36126                                  
 36127                                  copy_skip:
 36128                                          pop     di
 36129                                  copy_error:
 36130                                          clc                     ;
 36131                                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 36132                                          jmp     short copy_nextline
 36133                                  
 36134                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 36135                                  
 36136                                  copy_line:
 36137                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 36138                                          inc     di              ;
 36139                                          cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 36140                                          jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 36141                                          cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 36142                                          je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 36143                                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 36144                                          mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 36145                                          inc     di              ;
 36146                                          inc     di              ;
 36147                                          jmp     short copy_next ;
 36148                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 36149                                          call    get_char        ;
 36150                                          jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 36151                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 36152                                          inc     di              ;
 36153                                  copy_next:
 36154                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 36155                                          jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 36156                                  
 36157                                  copy_nextline:
 36158                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36159                                          jmp     short copy_block
 36160                                  
 36161                                  	; 18/12/2022
 36162                                  ;copy_done:
 36163                                          ;retn
 36164                                  
 36165                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36166                                  ;
 36167                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 36168                                  ;
 36169                                  ;   INPUT
 36170                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 36171                                  ;
 36172                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36173                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 36174                                  ;
 36175                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36176                                  ;       DX
 36177                                  ;
 36178                                  ;   NOTES
 36179                                  ;       None
 36180                                  ;
 36181                                  ;   HISTORY
 36182                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36183                                  ;
 36184                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36185                                  
 36186                                  get_linenum:
 36187                                          push    ax              ;
 36188                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 36189                                          push    cx              ;
 36190                                          mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 36191                                          push    si              ;
 36192                                          mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 36193                                          sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 36194                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 36195                                          call    skip_line       ;
 36196                                          jc	short get_linenum_done
 36197                                          inc     bx              ;
 36198                                          cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 36199                                          jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 36200                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 36201                                          pop     si              ;
 36202                                          pop     cx              ;
 36203                                          pop     ax              ;
 36204                                          retn
 36205                                  
 36206                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36207                                  ;
 36208                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 36209                                  ;
 36210                                  ;   INPUT
 36211                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 36212                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 36213                                  ;
 36214                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36215                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 36216                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 36217                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 36218                                  ;
 36219                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36220                                  ;       None
 36221                                  ;
 36222                                  ;   NOTES
 36223                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 36224                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 36225                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 36226                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 36227                                  ;
 36228                                  ;   HISTORY
 36229                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36230                                  ;
 36231                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36232                                  
 36233                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 36234                                          push    ax              ;
 36235                                          push    cx              ;
 36236                                          mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 36237                                          push    si              ;
 36238                                          sub     si,si           ;
 36239                                          push    ds              ;
 36240                                          push    es              ;
 36241                                          pop     ds              ;
 36242                                          call    find_block      ;
 36243                                          mov     di,si           ;
 36244                                          mov     bx,cx           ;
 36245                                          pop     ds              ;
 36246                                          pop     si              ;
 36247                                          pop     cx              ;
 36248                                          pop     ax              ;
 36249                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 36250                                          retn			;
 36251                                  
 36252                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36253                                  ;
 36254                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 36255                                  ;
 36256                                  ;   INPUT
 36257                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 36258                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 36259                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 36260                                  ;
 36261                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36262                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 36263                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 36264                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36265                                  ;
 36266                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36267                                  ;       AX
 36268                                  ;
 36269                                  ;   NOTES
 36270                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 36271                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 36272                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 36273                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 36274                                  ;
 36275                                  ;   HISTORY
 36276                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36277                                  ;
 36278                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36279                                  
 36280                                  find_block:
 36281                                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 36282                                          jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 36283                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 36284                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 36285                                          je	short check_line ; no
 36286                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 36287                                          jne	short next_line	;
 36288                                          or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 36289                                          jmp     short next_line ;
 36290                                  check_line:
 36291                                          or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 36292                                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 36293                                          jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 36294                                  next_line:
 36295                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 36296                                          jmp	short find_block  ;
