 36297                                  ;find_exit:
 36298                                  ;	retn
 36299                                  
 36300                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36301                                  ;
 36302                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 36303                                  ;
 36304                                  ;   INPUT
 36305                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 36306                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36307                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36308                                  ;
 36309                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36310                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 36311                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 36312                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36313                                  ;
 36314                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36315                                  ;       AX
 36316                                  ;
 36317                                  ;   NOTES
 36318                                  ;       None
 36319                                  ;
 36320                                  ;   HISTORY
 36321                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36322                                  ;
 36323                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36324                                  
 36325                                  comp_names:
 36326                                          push    di              ;
 36327                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 36328                                          call    get_char        ;
 36329                                          jc	short comp_exit	;
 36330                                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 36331                                          mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 36332                                          je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 36333                                          inc     di              ;
 36334                                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 36335                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 36336                                          cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 36337                                          je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 36338                                          clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 36339                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 36340                                          pop     di              ;
 36341                                          retn			;
 36342                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 36343                                          xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 36344                                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 36345                                          xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 36346                                          jmp     comp_exit       ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 36347                                  
 36348                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36349                                  
 36350                                  comp_names_safe:
 36351                                          push    ax
 36352                                          push    cx
 36353                                          push	si
 36354                                          push    ds
 36355                                          push    cs
 36356                                          pop     ds
 36357                                          call    comp_names
 36358                                          pop     ds
 36359                                  	pop	si
 36360                                          pop     cx
 36361                                          pop     ax
 36362                                          retn
 36363                                  
 36364                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36365                                  ;
 36366                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 36367                                  ;
 36368                                  ;   INPUT
 36369                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 36370                                  ;
 36371                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36372                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 36373                                  ;
 36374                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36375                                  ;       None
 36376                                  ;
 36377                                  ;   NOTES
 36378                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 36379                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 36380                                  ;
 36381                                  ;   HISTORY
 36382                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36383                                  ;
 36384                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36385                                  
 36386                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 36387                                          push    ax              ;
 36388                                          push    bx              ;
 36389                                          push    cx              ;
 36390                                          push    dx              ;
 36391                                          push    si              ;
 36392                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 36393                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 36394                                          int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 36395                                          push    dx              ; save it
 36396                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 36397                                          mov     dh,bl           ;
 36398                                          add     dh,3            ;
 36399                                          mov     dl,5            ;
 36400                                          int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 36401                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 36402                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 36403                                          mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 36404                                          cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 36405                                          jne	short print_other ; no
 36406                                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 36407                                          mov     ch,ah           ;
 36408                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 36409                                          rol     ch,cl           ;
 36410                                          cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 36411                                          jne	short print_other ; no
 36412                                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 36413                                  print_other:                    ;
 36414                                          mov     bh,0            ;
 36415                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 36416                                          mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 36417                                          mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 36418                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 36419                                          mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 36420                                          mov     cx,1            ;
 36421                                          int     10h             ;
 36422                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 36423                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 36424                                          int     10h             ;
 36425                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 36426                                          mov	ax,092Eh
 36427                                  	int     10h             ; display '.'
 36428                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 36429                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 36430                                          int     10h             ;
 36431                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 36432                                          mov	ax,0920h
 36433                                  	int     10h             ; display ' '
 36434                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 36435                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 36436                                          int     10h             ;
 36437                                          push    es              ;
 36438                                  print_loop:                     ;
 36439                                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 36440                                          inc     di              ;
 36441                                          cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 36442                                          jne	short print_nontab ;
 36443                                          mov     al,' '          ;
 36444                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 36445                                          cmp     al,' '          ;
 36446                                          jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 36447                                          cmp     al,'$'          ;
 36448                                          je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 36449                                          mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 36450                                          int     10h             ;
 36451                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 36452                                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 36453                                          jae	short print_done ; yes
 36454                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 36455                                          int     10h             ;
 36456                                          jmp     print_loop      ;
 36457                                  print_done:                     ;
 36458                                          pop     es              ;
 36459                                          pop     dx              ;
 36460                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 36461                                          int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 36462                                          pop     si              ;
 36463                                          pop     dx              ;
 36464                                          pop     cx              ;
 36465                                          pop     bx              ;
 36466                                          pop     ax              ;
 36467                                          retn			;
 36468                                  
 36469                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36470                                  ;
 36471                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 36472                                  ;
 36473                                  ;   INPUT
 36474                                  ;       None
 36475                                  ;
 36476                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36477                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 36478                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 36479                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 36480                                  ;
 36481                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36482                                  ;       None
 36483                                  ;
 36484                                  ;   NOTES
 36485                                  ;       None
 36486                                  ;
 36487                                  ;   HISTORY
 36488                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36489                                  ;
 36490                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36491                                  
 36492                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 36493                                          mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 36494                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 36495                                          call    disp_num        ;
 36496                                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 36497                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 36498                                          je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 36499                                          mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 36500                                          int     21h             ;
 36501                                          mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 36502                                  check_time:
 36503                                          mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 36504                                          sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 36505                                          jae	short show_time	;
 36506                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 36507                                          mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 36508                                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 36509                                  show_time:
 36510                                          push    bx              ;
 36511                                          mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 36512                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 36513                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 36514                                          int     10h             ;
 36515                                          push    dx              ;
 36516                                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 36517                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 36518                                          int     10h             ;
 36519                                          mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 36520                                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 36521                                          mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 36522                                          cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 36523                                          mov     cl,10           ;
 36524                                          div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 36525                                          mov     cl,ah           ;
 36526                                          add     al,'0'          ;
 36527                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 36528                                          int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 36529                                          mov     al,cl           ;
 36530                                          add     al,'0'          ;
 36531                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 36532                                          int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 36533                                          pop     dx
 36534                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 36535                                          int     10h             ;
 36536                                          pop     bx              ;
 36537                                  input_key:
 36538                                          mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 36539                                          mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 36540                                          int     21h             ;
 36541                                          jnz	short got_key	;
 36542                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 36543                                          je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 36544                                          mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 36545                                          int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 36546                                          mov     ah,dh           ;
 36547                                          sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 36548                                          mov     bh,ah           ;
 36549                                          jnc	short got_time	;
 36550                                          mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 36551                                  got_time:
 36552                                          or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 36553                                          jz	short input_key	; no
 36554                                          add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 36555                                          jmp	short check_time ;
 36556                                  got_key:
 36557                                          push    ax              ;
 36558                                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 36559                                          xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 36560                                          cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 36561                                          je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 36562                                          push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 36563                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 36564                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 36565                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 36566                                          int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 36567                                          pop     bx   		;
 36568                                  
 36569                                  timeout_disabled:
 36570                                          pop     ax              ;
 36571                                          or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 36572                                          jnz	short normal_key ; no
 36573                                          int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 36574                                          jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 36575                                  
 36576                                          cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 36577                                          jne	short not_up	; no
 36578                                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 36579                                          jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 36580                                          dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 36581                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 36582                                          dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 36583                                          jmp     short print1
 36584                                  not_up:
 36585                                          cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 36586                                          jne	short not_down	; no
 36587                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 36588                                          jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 36589                                          inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 36590                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 36591                                          inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 36592                                  print1: 
 36593                                  	mov     al,bl           ;
 36594                                  print2: 
 36595                                  	call    print_item      ;
 36596                                          call    disp_num        ;
 36597                                  to_input_key:
 36598                                          jmp     input_key       ;
 36599                                  not_down:
 36600                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36601                                          jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 36602                                          cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 36603                                          jne	short not_f8	; no
 36604                                          xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 36605                                          call    show_status     ;
 36606                                          jmp     input_key	;
 36607                                  not_f8:
 36608                                          cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 36609                                          jne	short to_input_key ; no
 36610                                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 36611                                          mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 36612                                          jmp     short disp_input; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 36613                                  
 36614                                  normal_key:
 36615                                          cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 36616                                          je	short select_done ; yes
 36617                                          cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 36618                                          jne	short not_backspace ; no
 36619                                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 36620                                          retn			;
 36621                                  not_backspace:
 36622                                          sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 36623                                          jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 36624                                          cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 36625                                          ja	short to_input_key ; no
 36626                                          mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 36627                                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 36628                                          mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 36629                                          jmp	short print2
 36630                                  
 36631                                  select_done:
 36632                                          mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 36633                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 36634                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 36635                                  
 36636                                  	; fall into disp_input
 36637                                  
 36638                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36639                                  
 36640                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36641                                  ;
 36642                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 36643                                  ;
 36644                                  ;   INPUT
 36645                                  ;       AL == character to display
 36646                                  ;
 36647                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36648                                  ;       None
 36649                                  ;
 36650                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36651                                  ;       None
 36652                                  ;
 36653                                  ;   NOTES
 36654                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 36655                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 36656                                  ;
 36657                                  ;   HISTORY
 36658                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36659                                  ;
 36660                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36661                                  
 36662                                  disp_input:
 36663                                          push    ax
 36664                                          cmp     al,' '
 36665                                          jae	short disp_ok
 36666                                          mov     al,' '
 36667                                  disp_ok:
 36668                                          mov     dl,al
 36669                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 36670                                          int     21h
 36671                                          mov     dx,crlfm
 36672                                          call    print
 36673                                          pop     ax
 36674                                          retn
 36675                                  
 36676                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36677                                  
 36678                                  disp_num:
 36679                                          push    bx
 36680                                          add     al,'0'
 36681                                          mov     ah,0Ah
 36682                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 36683                                          mov     cx,1
 36684                                          int     10h
 36685                                          pop     bx
 36686                                          retn
 36687                                  
 36688                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36689                                  ;
 36690                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 36691                                  ;
 36692                                  ;   INPUT
 36693                                  ;       None
 36694                                  ;
 36695                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36696                                  ;       None
 36697                                  ;
 36698                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36699                                  ;       None
 36700                                  ;
 36701                                  ;   NOTES
 36702                                  ;       None
 36703                                  ;
 36704                                  ;   HISTORY
 36705                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36706                                  ;
 36707                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36708                                  
 36709                                  show_status:
 36710                                          push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 36711                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 36712                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 36713                                          int     10h             ;
 36714                                          push    dx              ; save it
 36715                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 36716                                          mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 36717                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36718                                          jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 36719                                          mov     dl,0            ;
 36720                                          int     10h             ;
 36721                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 36722                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 36723                                          int     10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 36724                                          jmp     short show_done ;
 36725                                  show_onoff: 
 36726                                          int     10h
 36727                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 36728                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 36729                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 36730                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 36731                                  
 36732                                          mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 36733                                          cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 36734                                          jne	short show_noton ; no
 36735                                          mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 36736                                  show_noton:                     ;
 36737                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 36738                                          int     10h             ;
 36739                                  show_done:                      ;
 36740                                          pop     dx              ;
 36741                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 36742                                          int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 36743                                          pop     bx              ;
 36744                                          retn			;
 36745                                  
 36746                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36747                                  
 36748                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36749                                  ;
 36750                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 36751                                  ;
 36752                                  ;   INPUT
 36753                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36754                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36755                                  ;
 36756                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36757                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 36758                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 36759                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 36760                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36761                                  ;
 36762                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36763                                  ;       AX
 36764                                  ;
 36765                                  ;   NOTES
 36766                                  ;       None
 36767                                  ;
 36768                                  ;   HISTORY
 36769                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36770                                  ;
 36771                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36772                                  
 36773                                  skip_token:
 36774                                          call    get_char
 36775                                          jc	short skip_token_done
 36776                                          call    any_delim
 36777                                          jne	short skip_token
 36778                                  skip_check_eol:
 36779                                          cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 36780                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 36781                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36782                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 36783                                          clc
 36784                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 36785                                  	retn
 36786                                  skip_token_eol:
 36787                                          stc
 36788                                  skip_token_done:
 36789                                          retn
 36790                                  
 36791                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36792                                  ;
 36793                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 36794                                  ;
 36795                                  ;   INPUT
 36796                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36797                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36798                                  ;
 36799                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36800                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 36801                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 36802                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 36803                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36804                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 36805                                  ;
 36806                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36807                                  ;       AX
 36808                                  ;
 36809                                  ;   NOTES
 36810                                  ;       None
 36811                                  ;
 36812                                  ;   HISTORY
 36813                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36814                                  ;
 36815                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36816                                  
 36817                                  skip_delim:       ; returns carry set if eol/eof
 36818                                          call    get_char        ;
 36819                                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 36820                                          jc	short skip_token_done ;
 36821                                          call    delim           ;
 36822                                          je	short skip_delim ;
 36823                                          jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 36824                                  
 36825                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36826                                  ;
 36827                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 36828                                  ;
 36829                                  ;   INPUT
 36830                                  ;       AL == last character read
 36831                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36832                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36833                                  ;
 36834                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36835                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 36836                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 36837                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 36838                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36839                                  ;
 36840                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36841                                  ;       AX
 36842                                  ;
 36843                                  ;   NOTES
 36844                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 36845                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 36846                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 36847                                  ;
 36848                                  ;   HISTORY
 36849                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36850                                  ;
 36851                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36852                                  
 36853                                  skip_opt_line:
 36854                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36855                                          je	short skip_line_done
 36856                                       
 36857                                  	; fall into skip_line
 36858                                  
 36859                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36860                                  ;
 36861                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 36862                                  ;
 36863                                  ;   INPUT
 36864                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36865                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36866                                  ;
 36867                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36868                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 36869                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 36870                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36871                                  ;
 36872                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36873                                  ;       AX
 36874                                  ;
 36875                                  ;   NOTES
 36876                                  ;       None
 36877                                  ;
 36878                                  ;   HISTORY
 36879                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36880                                  ;
 36881                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36882                                  
 36883                                  skip_line:
 36884                                          call    get_char
 36885                                          jc	short skip_line_done
 36886                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36887                                          jne	short skip_line
 36888                                  skip_line_done:
 36889                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 36890                                          retn
 36891                                  
 36892                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36893                                  ;
 36894                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 36895                                  ;
 36896                                  ;   INPUT
 36897                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36898                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36899                                  ;
 36900                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36901                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 36902                                  ;       BX == binary #
 36903                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 36904                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36905                                  ;
 36906                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36907                                  ;       AX
 36908                                  ;
 36909                                  ;   NOTES
 36910                                  ;       None
 36911                                  ;
 36912                                  ;   HISTORY
 36913                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36914                                  ;
 36915                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36916                                  
 36917                                  ; 13/05/2019
 36918                                  
 36919                                  get_number:
 36920                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 36921                                  num_loop:
 36922                                          call    get_char        ;
 36923                                          jc	short num_done	;
 36924                                          cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 36925                                          jb	short num_done	; no more number
 36926                                          cmp     al,'9'          ;
 36927                                          ja	short num_done	;
 36928                                          push    ax              ;
 36929                                          mov     ax,10           ;
 36930                                          push    dx              ;
 36931                                          mul     bx              ;
 36932                                          pop     dx              ;
 36933                                          mov     bx,ax           ;
 36934                                          pop     ax              ;
 36935                                          sub     al,'0'          ;
 36936                                          cbw                     ;
 36937                                          add     bx,ax           ;
 36938                                          jmp	short num_loop	;
 36939                                  
 36940                                  	; 18/12/2022
 36941                                  ;num_done:
 36942                                          ;retn
 36943                                  
 36944                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36945                                  ;
 36946                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 36947                                  ;
 36948                                  ;   INPUT
 36949                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36950                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36951                                  ;
 36952                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36953                                  ;       AL == next character
 36954                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 36955                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36956                                  ;
 36957                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36958                                  ;       AX
 36959                                  ;
 36960                                  ;   NOTES
 36961                                  ;       None
 36962                                  ;
 36963                                  ;   HISTORY
 36964                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36965                                  ;
 36966                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36967                                  
 36968                                  get_char:
 36969                                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 36970                                          jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 36971                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 36972                                  	es	
 36973                                  	lodsb
 36974                                          mov     ah,al           ;
 36975                                          retn			;
 36976                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 36977                                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 36978                                  nearby_ret:
 36979                                          retn
 36980                                  
 36981                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36982                                  ;
 36983                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 36984                                  ;
 36985                                  ;   INPUT
 36986                                  ;       AL == current command code
 36987                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 36988                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 36989                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 36990                                  ;
 36991                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36992                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 36993                                  ;
 36994                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36995                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 36996                                  ;
 36997                                  ;   NOTES
 36998                                  ;       None
 36999                                  ;
 37000                                  ;   HISTORY
 37001                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37002                                  ;
 37003                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37004                                  
 37005                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37006                                  query_user:
 37007                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 37008                                          ;jz	short qu_1		;
 37009                                          ; 12/12/2022
 37010                                  	;jmp	short skip_all		;
 37011                                  	jnz	short skip_all
 37012                                  qu_1:
 37013                                  	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 37014                                          jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 37015                                          push    ax                      ;
 37016                                          mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 37017                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 37018                                          jnz	short query_all		; yes
 37019                                          test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 37020                                          ;jnz	short query_all		;
 37021                                          ; 12/12/2022
 37022                                  	;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 37023                                  	jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 37024                                  query_all:
 37025                                  
 37026                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 37027                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 37028                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 37029                                  
 37030                                          push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 37031                                          mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 37032                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37033                                          jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 37034                                  
 37035                                          mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 37036                                          sub     bx,bx                   ;
 37037                                          mov     di,comtab		;
 37038                                  find_match:                             ;
 37039                                          mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 37040                                          or      bl,bl                   ;
 37041                                          jz	short line_print	; end of table
 37042                                          inc     di                      ;
 37043                                          cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 37044                                          je	short cmd_match		; yes
 37045                                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 37046                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 37047                                          jmp	short find_match	; loop
 37048                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 37049                                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 37050                                          mov     ch,0                    ;
 37051                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 37052                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 37053                                          mov     al,[di]                 ;
 37054                                          inc     di                      ;
 37055                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 37056                                          int     21h                     ;
 37057                                          loop    cmd_print               ;
 37058                                          mov     dl,'='                  ;
 37059                                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 37060                                          jne	short cmd_notset	;
 37061                                          mov     dl,' '                  ;
 37062                                  cmd_notset:
 37063                                          int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 37064                                  line_print:                             ;
 37065                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 37066                                          es
 37067                                  	lodsb
 37068                                  	or      al,al                   ;
 37069                                          jnz	short non_null		;
 37070                                          mov     al,' '                  ;
 37071                                  non_null:                               ;
 37072                                          cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 37073                                          jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 37074                                          jne	short non_space		;
 37075                                          cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 37076                                          jb	short prompt_user	;
 37077                                  non_space:                              ;
 37078                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 37079                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 37080                                          int     21h                     ;
 37081                                          jmp	short line_print	;
 37082                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 37083                                          mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 37084                                  
 37085                                  generic_prompt:
 37086                                          call    print                   ;
 37087                                  input_loop:                             ;
 37088                                          mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 37089                                          int     16h                     ;
 37090                                          or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 37091                                          jnz	short not_func		; no
 37092                                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 37093                                          jne	short input_loop	; no
 37094                                          mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 37095                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 37096                                          jmp     short legal_char        ;
 37097                                  not_func:
 37098                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 37099                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 37100                                          je	short legal_char	;
 37101                                          cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 37102                                          je	short legal_char	;
 37103                                          cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 37104                                          je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 37105                                          cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 37106                                          jne	short input_loop	;
 37107                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 37108                                          mov     al,[_$YES]
 37109                                  legal_char:                             ;
 37110                                          call    disp_input              ;
 37111                                          pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 37112                                  
 37113                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 37114                                          je	short skip_cmd		; no
 37115                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37116                                  	clc
 37117                                  do_cmd:
 37118                                  	pop     ax			;
 37119                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37120                                  	; cf=0
 37121                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 37122                                  	retn
 37123                                  
 37124                                  skip_cmd:
 37125                                  	pop     ax			;
 37126                                  skip_all:
 37127                                  	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 37128                                  	stc
 37129                                  	retn
 37130                                  
 37131                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37132                                  ;
 37133                                  ;   print_error: displays multi-config error conditions
 37134                                  ;
 37135                                  ;   INPUT
 37136                                  ;    Carry set to pause, clear to not
 37137                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 37138                                  ;
 37139                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37140                                  ;       None
 37141                                  ;
 37142                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37143                                  ;       None
 37144                                  ;
 37145                                  ;   NOTES
 37146                                  ;       None
 37147                                  ;
 37148                                  ;   HISTORY
 37149                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37150                                  ;
 37151                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37152                                  
 37153                                  print_error:
 37154                                          push    ax
 37155                                          push    bx
 37156                                          push    cx
 37157                                          push    dx
 37158                                          push    ds
 37159                                          push    cs
 37160                                          pop     ds
 37161                                          pushf
 37162                                          call    get_linenum
 37163                                          mov     [linecount],bx
 37164                                          call    error_line
 37165                                          popf
 37166                                          jnc	short pe_ret
 37167                                          mov     dx,_$PauseMsg
 37168                                          call    print
 37169                                          mov     ax,0C07h		; flush input buffer, then wait for key
 37170                                          int     21h			; wait for a key
 37171                                          or      al,al			; extended key?
 37172                                          jnz	short pe_1		; no
 37173                                          mov     ah,07h			; yes
 37174                                          int     21h			; eat it too
 37175                                  pe_1:     
 37176                                  	mov     dx,crlfm
 37177                                          call    print
 37178                                  pe_ret: 
 37179                                  	pop     ds
 37180                                          pop     dx
 37181                                          pop     cx
 37182                                          pop     bx
 37183                                          pop     ax
 37184                                  	retn
 37185                                  
 37186                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37187                                  
 37188                                  ;   This function is very simple:  it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 37189                                  ;   command-line for the shell;  this (undocumented) switch disables
 37190                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 37191                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 37192                                  
 37193                                  disable_autoexec:
 37194                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 37195                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 37196                                  
 37197                                  	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 37198                                  	jz	short disable_exit
 37199                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 37200                                  	jnz	short disable_exit
 37201                                  	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 37202                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 37203                                  	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 37204                                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 37205                                  dae_1:
 37206                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 37207                                  	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 37208                                          or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 37209                                          jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 37210                                          mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 37211                                          mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 37212                                          mov     cx,bx                   ;
 37213                                          add     bl,3                    ;
 37214                                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 37215                                          ja	short disable_exit	;
 37216                                          mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 37217                                          add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 37218                                          inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 37219                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 37220                                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 37221                                          mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 37222                                          dec     bx                      ;
 37223                                          loop    disable_loop            ;
 37224                                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 37225                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 37226                                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 37227                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 37228                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 37229                                          retn
 37230                                  
 37231                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 37232                                  	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 37233                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 37234                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 37235                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 37236                                  	or      byte [dae_flag],2
 37237                                  	mov     dx,'Y ' ; 2059h ; 11/09/2023
 37238                                  	jmp     short dae_1
 37239                                  
 37240                                  ;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 37241                                  
 37242                                  %endif	; 02/11/2022
 37243                                  
 37244                                  
 37245                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 37246                                  
 37247                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37248                                  ;
 37249                                  ; procedure : delim
 37250                                  ;
 37251                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37252                                  
 37253                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37254                                  ;
 37255                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 37256                                  ;
 37257                                  ;any_delim:
 37258                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 37259                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 37260                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 37261                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 37262                                  ;       cmp     al,'['
 37263                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 37264                                  ;       cmp     al,']'
 37265                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 37266                                  ;
 37267                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 37268                                  
 37269                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 37270                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 37271                                  delim:
 37272 00002FA1 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 37273 00002FA3 7417                    	je	short delim_ret
 37274                                  
 37275 00002FA5 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 37276 00002FA7 7413                    	je	short delim_ret
 37277                                  
 37278                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 37279 00002FA9 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 37280 00002FAB 740F                    	je	short delim_ret
 37281 00002FAD 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 37282 00002FAF 740B                    	je	short delim_ret
 37283 00002FB1 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 37284 00002FB3 7407                    	je	short delim_ret
 37285 00002FB5 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 37286 00002FB7 7403                    	je	short delim_ret
 37287 00002FB9 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 37288                                  
 37289                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37290                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 37291                                  ;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 37292 00002FBB F8                      	clc	; 09/09/2023 ('SkipDelim' must not be return with cf=1)
 37293                                  ;endif
 37294                                  	; 02/11/2022
 37295                                  delim_ret:
 37296                                  nl_ret:	; 10/09/2023
 37297 00002FBC C3                      	retn
 37298                                  
 37299                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 37302                                  ;
 37303                                  ;  newline returns with first character of next line
 37304                                  ;

 37307                                  newline:
 37308 00002FBD E80600                  	call	getchr			;skip non-control characters
 37309 00002FC0 72FA                    	jc	short nl_ret
 37310 00002FC2 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			;look for line feed
 37311 00002FC4 75F7                    	jne	short newline
 37312                                  
 37313                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37314                                  	;call	getchr
 37315                                  ;nl_ret:
 37316                                  	;retn
 37317                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37318                                  	;jmp	short getchr
 37319                                  
 37320                                  ; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37321                                  %if 1

 37325                                  ; procedure : getchr
 37326                                  ;

 37330                                  getchr:
 37331                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37332                                  	;push	cx
 37333                                  	;mov	cx,[count]
 37334                                  	;jcxz	nochar
 37335                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37336 00002FC6 833E[D203]01            	cmp	word [count],1 
 37337 00002FCB 720F                    	jb	short nochar ; cf=1 ([count] = 0)
 37338                                  	
 37339 00002FCD 8B36[D603]              	mov	si,[chrptr]
 37340 00002FD1 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 37341 00002FD4 FF0E[D203]              	dec	word [count]
 37342 00002FD8 FF06[D603]              	inc	word [chrptr]
 37343                                  	; 12/12/202
 37344                                  	; cf=0
 37345                                  	;clc
 37346                                  ;get_ret:
 37347                                  	;pop	cx
 37348                                  	;retn

 37350                                  	; 12/12/2022

 37352                                  	;stc

 37354                                  	
 37355 00002FDC C3                      	retn

 37358                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37359                                  ; 
 37360                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 37361                                  ;
 37362                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37363                                  
 37364                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 37365                                  mapcase:
 37366 00002FDD 51                      	push	cx
 37367 00002FDE 56                      	push	si
 37368 00002FDF 1E                      	push	ds
 37369                                  
 37370 00002FE0 06                      	push	es
 37371 00002FE1 1F                      	pop	ds
 37372                                  
 37373                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37374                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 37375                                  ;
 37376                                  ;	mov	bl,al                   ; same cmd code this line
 37377                                  ;;else
 37378                                  ;;	xor	si,si
 37379                                  ;;endif
 37380                                  	; 02/11/2022
 37381 00002FE2 31F6                    	xor	si, si
 37382                                  
 37383                                  convloop:
 37384 00002FE4 AC                      	lodsb
 37385 00002FE5 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 37386 00002FE7 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 37387 00002FE9 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 37388 00002FEB 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 37389 00002FED 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 37390 00002FEF 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 37391                                  noconv:
 37392                                  
 37393                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37394                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 37395                                  ;;
 37396                                  ;;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 37397                                  ;;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 37398                                  ;;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 37399                                  ;;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 37400                                  ;;
 37401                                  ;       cmp     bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 37402                                  ;       jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 37403                                  ;       cmp     al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 37404                                  ;       je	short convdone		; yes
 37405                                  ;check_eol:
 37406                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 37407                                  ;       je	short convdone
 37408                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 37409                                  ;       je	short convdone
 37410                                  ;;endif
 37411                                  	
 37412                                  	; 02/11/2022
 37413 00002FF2 E2F0                    	loop	convloop
 37414                                  convdone:
 37415 00002FF4 1F                      	pop	ds
 37416 00002FF5 5E                      	pop	si
 37417 00002FF6 59                      	pop	cx
 37418 00002FF7 C3                      	retn
 37419                                  
 37420                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37421                                  ;
 37422                                  ; procedure : round
 37423                                  ;
 37424                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 37425                                  ; perform bounds check.
 37426                                  ;
 37427                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37428                                  
 37429                                  round:
 37430                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37431 00002FF8 1E                      	push	ds
 37432 00002FF9 0E                      	push	cs
 37433 00002FFA 1F                      	pop	ds
 37434                                  
 37435 00002FFB 50                      	push	ax
 37436                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 37437 00002FFC A1[DE03]                	mov	ax,[memlo]
 37438                                  
 37439 00002FFF E88FE0                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 37440
