 37518                                  
 37519                                  todigit:
 37520 00003063 2C30                    	sub	al,'0'
 37521                                  	;jb	short notdig  ; 02/11/2022
 37522                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37523 00003065 7203                    	jb	short notdig2
 37524                                  	;cmp	al,9
 37525                                  	;ja	short notdig
 37526                                  	;clc
 37527                                  	;retn
 37528                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37529 00003067 3C0A                    	cmp	al,10
 37530 00003069 F5                      	cmc
 37531                                  notdig:
 37532                                  	;stc
 37533                                  notdig2:
 37534 0000306A C3                      	retn

 37536                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37537                                  ;
 37538                                  ; procedure : getnum
 37539                                  ;
 37540                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 37541                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 37542                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 37543                                  ;
 37544                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37545                                  
 37546                                  getnum:
 37547 0000306B 53                      	push	bx
 37548 0000306C 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 37549                                  b2:
 37550 0000306E E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 37551 00003071 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 37552                                  
 37553 00003073 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 37554 00003074 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 37555                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 37556                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37557 00003075 B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 37558 00003077 F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 37559 00003079 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 37560 0000307A 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 37561 0000307C 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 37562 0000307F 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 37563                                  
 37564 00003081 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 37565                                  
 37566 00003082 E841FF                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 37567 00003085 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 37568 00003087 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 37569 00003089 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 37570 0000308B 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 37571 0000308D 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 37572 0000308F 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 37573 00003091 7417                    	je	short b15
 37574 00003093 2E3A06[2A03]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 37575 00003098 7410                    	je	short b15
 37576 0000309A 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 37577                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 37578                                  	;nop
 37579                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37580                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37581                                  	;nop
 37582                                  	;nop
 37583 0000309C 740C                    	je	short b15
 37584 0000309E 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 37585 000030A0 7408                    	je	short b15
 37586 000030A2 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 37587 000030A4 7404                    	je	short b15
 37588 000030A6 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 37589 000030A8 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 37590                                  b15:
 37591 000030AA 2EFF06[D203]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 37592 000030AF 2EFF0E[D603]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 37593                                  b1:
 37594 000030B4 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 37595 000030B6 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 37596 000030B8 5B                      	pop	bx
 37597 000030B9 C3                      	retn
 37598                                  badnum:
 37599                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37600                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 37601 000030BA 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 37602                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 37603 000030BC 2EA2[2A03]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 37604 000030C0 5B                      	pop	bx
 37605 000030C1 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 37606 000030C2 C3                      	retn

 37609                                  
 37610                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 37611                                  
 37612                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37613                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 37614                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 37615                                  ;	si = 0
 37616                                  ;	ax = country id
 37617                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 37618                                  ;	bx = file handle
 37619                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 37620                                  ;
 37621                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 37622                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 37623                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 37624                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 37625                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37626                                  
 37627                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37628                                  
 37629 000030C3 57                      	push	di
 37630 000030C4 50                      	push	ax
 37631 000030C5 52                      	push	dx
 37632                                  
 37633 000030C6 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 37634 000030C8 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 37635 000030CA B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 37636 000030CD E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 37637 000030D0 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37638                                  
 37639 000030D2 06                      	push	es
 37640 000030D3 56                      	push	si
 37641                                  
 37642 000030D4 0E                      	push	cs
 37643 000030D5 07                      	pop	es
 37644                                  
 37645 000030D6 BF[3A33]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 37646 000030D9 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 37647 000030DC F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 37648                                  
 37649 000030DE 5E                      	pop	si
 37650 000030DF 07                      	pop	es
 37651 000030E0 753A                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 37652                                  
 37653 000030E2 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 37654 000030E5 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 37655 000030E8 7532                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 37656                                  
 37657 000030EA 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 37658 000030EB 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 37659 000030ED 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 37660 000030F0 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 37661 000030F3 E81D01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 37662 000030F6 7224                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37663                                  
 37664 000030F8 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 37665 000030FA 81F9B601                	cmp	cx,438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 37666 000030FE 771C                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 37667                                  
 37668 00003100 46                      	inc	si
 37669 00003101 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 37670 00003102 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 37671 00003103 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 37672 00003104 5F                      	pop	di
 37673                                  
 37674                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 37675 00003105 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 37676 00003108 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 37677                                  
 37678                                  	;cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 37679                                  	;je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 37680                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37681 0000310A 09D2                    	or	dx,dx ; cmp dx,0
 37682 0000310C 7413                    	jz	short setdoscntry_any_codepage
 37683 0000310E 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 37684 00003111 7411                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 37685                                  
 37686                                  setdoscntry_next:
 37687 00003113 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 37688 00003115 46                      	inc	si
 37689 00003116 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 37690 00003117 E2EC                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 37691                                  
 37692                                  	;mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 37693                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37694 00003119 49                      	dec	cx ; 0 -> -1
 37695                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 37696 0000311A F9                      	stc
 37697 0000311B C3                      	retn
 37698                                  
 37699                                  setdosdata_fail:
 37700 0000311C 5E                      	pop	si
 37701 0000311D 59                      	pop	cx
 37702 0000311E 5F                      	pop	di

 37704

 37706 00003121 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]

 37709 00003124 2E8916[4233]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 37710 00003129 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 37711 0000312C 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 37712 0000312F B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 37713 00003132 E8DE00                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 37714 00003135 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail

 37724

 37731 0000314C B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 37732 0000314F F9                      	stc
 37733 00003150 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 37734 00003152 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37735

 37737 00003157 B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to

 37739 0000315C F9                      	stc

 37741 0000315F 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 37742

 37744 00003163 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 37745

 37749 0000316E F9                      	stc

 37751 00003171 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37752

 37754 00003174 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;get length of the data from the file
 37755 00003177 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]
 37756 00003179 5E                      	pop	si

 37758 0000317D 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself
 37759 00003180 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 37760 00003182 F9                      	stc
 37761 00003183 CD21                    	int	21h
 37762 00003185 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37763                                  
 37764 00003187 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 37765 00003189 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail
 37766

 37768 0000318E BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;si-> data buffer + id tag field
 37769 00003191 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the length of the file
 37770 00003193 41                      	inc	cx			;take care of a word for lenght of tab
 37771 00003194 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.
 37772 00003195 81F9F805                	cmp	cx,(2048-512-8)	; 1528	;fit into the buffer?
 37773 00003199 7781                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 37774

 37776 0000319B E83100                  	call	setdbcs_before_copy
 37777                                  	;endif

 37805 000031BE 268F4518                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen]

 37869                                  getcountrydestination:
 37870                                  
 37871                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37872                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 37873                                  ;
 37874                                  ;input: al - data id
 37875                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 37876                                  ;on return:
 37877                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 37878                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 37879                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37880                                  
 37881                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37882                                  
 37883 000031E8 51                      	push	cx
 37884                                  	;add	di,74
 37885 000031E9 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 37886                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 37887 000031EC 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 37888 000031EF 47                      	inc	di
 37889 000031F0 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 37890                                  
 37891                                  getcntrydest:
 37892 000031F1 263805                  	cmp	byte [es:di],al
 37893 000031F4 7413                    	je	short getcntrydest_ok
 37894                                  
 37895 000031F6 26803D01                	cmp	byte [es:di],SetCountryInfo ;was it setcountryinfo entry?
 37896 000031FA 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 37897                                  
 37898 000031FC 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 37899 000031FF EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 37900                                  
 37901                                  getcntrydest_1:
 37902                                  	;add	di,41
 37903 00003201 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 37904                                  getcntrydest_loop:
 37905 00003204 E2EB                    	loop	getcntrydest

 37907                                  	;jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 37908                                  getcntrydest_exit:

 37910 00003207 59                      	pop	cx

 37935                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37936                                  
 37937                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 37938                                  
 37939                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37940                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 37941                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 37942                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 37943                                  ;
 37944                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 37945                                  ;	 be moved.
 37946                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 37947                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 37948                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 37949                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 37950                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 37951                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 37952                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37953                                  
 37954 00003213 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 37955 00003214 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 37956 00003217 F9                      	stc
 37957 00003218 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 37958 0000321A 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 37959 0000321B 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 37960                                  
 37961 0000321D 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 37962 0000321F 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 37963 00003221 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 37964 00003223 F9                      	stc
 37965 00003224 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 37966                                  ricb_exit:
 37967 00003226 C3                      	retn
 37968                                  
 37969                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37970                                  
 37971                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !
 37972                                  ; Erdogan Tan - 04/08/2023 (Retro DOS v4.2)
 37973                                  %if 0
 37974                                  
 37975                                  set_country_path:
 37976                                  
 37977                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37978                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 37979                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 37980                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 37981                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 37982                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 37983                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 37984                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37985                                  
 37986                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37987                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 37988                                  
 37989                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37990                                  	; (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:36DDh)
 37991                                  
 37992                                  	push	si
 37993                                  
 37994                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 37995                                  	push	es
 37996                                  	pop	ds
 37997                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 37998                                  
 37999                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 38000                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 38001                                  
 38002                                  	mov	al,[si]
 38003                                  	inc	si
 38004                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 38005                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 38006                                  
 38007                                  scp_default_drv:
 38008                                  	mov	ah,19h
 38009                                  	int	21h
 38010                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 38011                                  
 38012                                  scp_setdrv:
 38013                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 38014                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 38015                                  	mov	al,[si]
 38016                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 38017                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 38018                                  
 38019                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 38020                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 38021                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 38022                                  	; 04/01/2023
 38023                                  	jne	short scp_path
 38024                                  
 38025                                  scp_root_dir:
 38026                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 38027                                  scp_path:
 38028                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 38029                                  
 38030                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 38031                                  scpath_exit:
 38032                                  
 38033                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 38034                                  	push	es
 38035                                  	pop	ds
 38036                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 38037                                  
 38038                                  	pop	si
 38039                                  	retn
 38040                                  
 38041                                  %endif
 38042                                  
 38043                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38044                                  
 38045                                  chk_drive_letter:
 38046                                  
 38047                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 38048                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 38049                                  ;carry set if not.
 38050                                  
 38051                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38052                                  
 38053 00003227 50                      	push	ax
 38054 00003228 803C41                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 38055                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 38056 0000322B 720C                    	jb	short cdletter_exit
 38057 0000322D 803C5A                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 38058 00003230 7706                    	ja	short cdletter_no
 38059 00003232 807C013A                	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 38060                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 38061                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 38062                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38063 00003236 7401                    	je	short cdletter_exit
 38064                                  
 38065                                  cdletter_no:
 38066 00003238 F9                      	stc
 38067                                  cdletter_exit:
 38068 00003239 58                      	pop	ax
 38069 0000323A C3                      	retn
 38070                                  
 38071                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38072                                  
 38073                                  move_asciiz:
 38074                                  
 38075                                  ;in: ds:si -> source es:di -> target
 38076                                  ;out: copy the string until 0.
 38077                                  ;assumes there exists a 0.
 38078                                  
 38079                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38080                                  
 38081                                  masciiz_loop:
 38082                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38083 0000323B F604FF                  	test	byte [si],0FFh
 38084 0000323E A4                      	movsb
 38085                                  	;cmp	byte [si-1],0	; was it 0?
 38086                                  	;jne	short masciiz_loop
 38087 0000323F 75FA                    	jnz	short masciiz_loop ; 10/09/2023
 38088 00003241 C3                      	retn
